story:
Six AM Comics Sticker Design

JOE BALL ART (colors coming soon!)

ALL BOOKS COME SIGNED BY THE CREATOR RANDY SIPLON!

THE COMIC

KILL REAVER is a 40 page, full color, epic fantasy superhero comic for lovers of old school heroic fiction featuring bad ass artwork that hearkens back to a time when comic books had balls! Do you yearn for comics with tons of action and adventure? Heroic fantasy with unyielding intensity? Amazing artwork that will blow your freaking mind? Look no further, KILL REAVER will satisfy that itch tenfold!

THE STORY

KILL REAVER is a story of revenge, redemption, and resurrection. The Kill Reavers were an elite group of mercenaries working for a corrupt king. The evil king turned on them and had all of them brutally executed except for one sole survivor who managed to escape. Now the last remaining Kill Reaver is on a mission of bloody vengeance and will stop at nothing to destroy the kingdom he once fought to protect!

THE CREATOR

My name is Randy Siplon and I am a veteran artist in the trading card industry and of underground independent comics. I published my first comic at 16 years old and have never looked back! I have worked on projects featuring licensed artwork for Star Wars, Lord of the Rings, Star Trek, and Marvel Comics to name a few. Now I am very excited to bring one of my creations to life in a new comic book series called KILL REAVER!!!! KILL REAVER is the culmination of a plethora of my creative influences including Dungeons & Dragons, Heavy Metal (the music and the magazine!), Fantasy art, movies & comics, and the master himself Frank Frazetta!

THE PITCH

Potential backers, I need your help!

I am writing and drawing KILL REAVER all by myself, but I will need funding to pay for colors , letters, production costs, and printing. Producing a high quality comic book isn't cheap and I want this book to stand out, spare no expense! This is where you come in, folks. I have a variety of reward tiers ranging from just the book to original art and even having your likeness immortalized in the pages of KILL REAVER getting eviscerated by his mighty blade!

STRETCH GOALS

  • $1.5K - Every backer will receive a Kill Reaver trading card! ****UNLOCKED!****
  • $3K - Every backer will receive a Kill Reaver sticker by Six AM Comics!
  • $5K - Every backer will receive a Kill Reaver mini poster by Joe Ball!

STRETCH GOAL #1 UNLOCKED! FREE KILL REAVER TRADING CARD FOR EVERY BACKER!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I don't see any real threats to KILL REAVER not fulfilling smoothly. I have a majority of the book drawn before the campaign launched. I will be updating weekly with sneak peeks at additional pages as they come in from the colorist. I will keep everyone 100% informed if there are any problems or delays  and you will have the option to back out and refund anytime BEFORE THE CAMPAIGN ENDS. Bottom line is nothing is going to stop this baby from seeing print!

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Please share this campaign with any of your friends and family interested in GOOD COMICS. Word of mouth and social media sharing does wonders. Thanks everyone for checking out KILL REAVER and I appreciate your support!

For fans of Ethan Van Sciver, EVS, SHI, Kamen America, Daym Drops, Cyberfrog, Earthworm Jim, Titan, Black Flag, Black Tide, Expendables, Cash Grab, Jawbreakers, Graveyard Shift, Starlight Cats,  Plot Holes, Thomas River, Dreamkeepers, Impossible Stars, Chenoo, Replicator, Gold Digger, Starblades, Reignbow the brute,  Alterna, rainbow brute, groken, brzrkr, alien alamo, fatl, war party, sovereign wolf, lost pages, rock 'n roll ninjas, lonestar, godlike, earthbound, knife-hand, scp foundation, jack the ripper vampire hunter, wraith of god, inglorious rex

story:
Best described as WHAT IF the Universal Monsters were the X-Men!

Jon Malin (Jawbreakers) and Mark Poulton (Hawkman) bring you the next chapter in  GRAVEYARD SHIFT as the team returns to Earth only to find a werewolf infestation has terrorized the world in their absence. Surrounded by enemies everywhere, they join forces with the dimension hopper BRAM and his commando unit of super-powered monsters. Welcome aboard Aaron Alfeche (Jawbreakers) as the new interior artist!

 

GRAVEYARD SHIFT VOL III

50 pages by Poulton, Alfeche, George!

This cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign!

 

GRAVEYARD SHIFT SUPPLEMENTAL

60 pages total (three- 20 page stories: RUINER(Malin, Willis, Patterson, Dalton, George, Weathers), NIGHTWALKER(Arnold, Ball, Dalhouse, Weathers) & LILTH(Narwhal).

This cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign!

 

VISIONS #1 (VIRGIN)

40 pages

Cover by Kenneth Rocafort

VARIOUS Artists include Rocafort, Tartamella, Snogans, Ritter, White, Romero, Keung Lee, O'Rowe, Acevedo, Kojiro, and more!

This VIRGIN cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign!

 

LIL GRAVEYARD SHIFT (ASHCAN)

20 pages by Poulton, Lee, George, Weathers!

This cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign!

 

GRAVEYARD SHIFT Collected  Edition

96 pages by Poulton, Malin, George, Weathers!

Catch up with this collected volume! Collects VOL I&II

 

STRETCH GOALS

$30,000 *UNLOCKED* All Backers will receive a Trading card, unique from the one built into the tiers and from any previous campaign!

$50,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers will receive a sexy LILITH print by Brian Denham!

$65,000 *UNLOCKED* All Backers will receive another Trading card, unique from the one built into the tiers and from any previous campaign!

$80,000 *UNLOCKED* All Backers will receive a sexy LILITH print by Clayton Barton!

$90,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers will receive and sexy LILITH Print by comics legend ART THIBERT!

$100,000 *UNLOCKED* VISIONS #1(Lilith Swimsuit) will be extended by 10 pages and become perfect bound if goal is hit in first 30 days!!

$110,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers will receive and sexy LILITH Print by Jon Malin!

$125,000 *LOCKED* All backers will receive a Kenneth Rocafort Lilith VISIONS cover poster(folded) with their order!

 

Any questions or concerns please contact us at Koniwaves@Gmail.com.

When the campaign closes, all sales are considered final so we can get our teams in action and produce these high quality books! All refunds during the 60 day campaign are welcome and will be honored!

story:
Space is a dark, dark place

A mysterious sickness has appeared in almost every system of the Milky Way. The galactic community implemented a strict quarantine and now millions of refugee-ships are stuck on reentry stations. Pirate activity is on the rise, zealots from the triumvirate empire have started a third expansion crusade, strange cybernetic monsters have been sighted on the edges of human territory. Space is a dark, dark place and it's about to get worse.

Redshift Express is written by David Feed (Red Eyes 1 and 2) and illustrated by Rafael Chrestani (Mrdr Wpn). It's a 60+ page, black and white, non-stop action Graphic Novel sprinkled with a little bit of body horror for good measure.

REGULAR COVER / UNCLE FEED COVER

Romina Jones is a thrill seeker, space pirate. One morning she's bored out of her mind and decides to steal her boyfriends ship and run away to sell contraband to an old acquaintance. All goes to hell when the station is attacked and Romina ends up with the genetic key that could save the entire galaxy from a mysterious plague.

Sample Pages

CHALLENGES + STRETCH GOALS

We need 5K to make it happen. Art, printing and shipping. We have a great flow with Rafael and if we meet our goal and pass it we can work on some cool extras before we go to fulfilment, like for example:

8'000.- USD + PAGES

We're adding 24 extra pages of either: a supplemental story, an ashcan preview of next issue or something else. We'll let the fans decide. Total of 84 pages.

12'000.- USD SPRUES!

I love miniature war games, the lore, the rules, the actual figures and the excitement of assembling them, coloring them. And of course, playing them, challenging another human in a match. I've been working on a game of my own design and with the SPRUES stretch goal reached we have the funds to include a small box with a miniature figure, to assemble and paint. Either an alien soldier or a flamethrower drone.

WIP of the MINIATURE DESIGNS

BASIC ENLIGHTED SOLDIER + FLAMETHROWER DRONE

story:
One price, one reward. A large part of our catalogue for a discount price.

CONTENTS OF THE PACK:

Vanadis is considered the goddess of love, beauty, earth and fertility. So what better deity to symbolize these 4 collections of 50 erotic stories, from 4 to 16 pages. Sensible, Brutal, Undreamt and Once more! bring togethergreat artists who will take you to the doors of pleasure.

SHAMELESS 1 (104 PAGES)

Entirely created by Joel Jurion, this great collection of short stories includes adult tales of all genres. The author takes you to different places, with nine naughty stories. 

JOEL JURION ARTBOOK 1 & 2 (140 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

Joel Jurion, in his two artbooks, presents us his most beautiful art. One-of-a-kind master-pieces of their own drifting between all kinds of genres: from historical to contemporary, Sci-Fi to fantasy, and even sensual... with his female warriors, his anthropomorphic characters and his life-like animals, Joel will take you to the brink of your dreams.

NO M(e)N'S LAND + NO M(e)N'S LAND SKETCHBOOK

Elise is making love to Yann after having had three weird dreams, which all had something in common: the appearance of a strange and mysterious being. As both lovers reach orgasm, Yann explodes into thousands of particles. As for Elise, she is swallowed by her own mirror, which leads her to a dreamlike world, the No M(e)n’s Land. There, she will have to follow a concrete, apparently endless road. On her way, she will meet several women who guide her to forbidden pleasures and allow her to come close to a disturbing truth...

STYLOIDE BOOK 1 AND 2 (140 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

A little jewel for Fine Arts lovers, Styloide Book 1 & 2 contain the most beautiful creations of Styloide. Between color illustrations sailing between realism and onirism, nymphs and young women with generous curves, black and white illustrations allowing to fully appreciate the author's line, 140 pages of dreams are waiting for you.

RAF BOOK (70 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

Raf offers us his first artbook and we can say that it will surprise you: between the octopod maid, the werewolf woman, the monkey girl, the Jackalope, the phoenix lady and many others, you will discover Monster Girls all more crazy than the others, all in an inimitable style. 

DANI BOOK (72 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

Dani Docampo, Imperfect's illustrator, offers us his first artbook with luscious women, plunged into dreamy and fantastic worlds. Creatures of dreams with generous forms, a treat for the eyes, 70 pages of pleasure by an exceptional artist.

ROOM 13 (72 PAGES)

Anaïs meets people without a tomorrow by surfing long nights on Internet dating sites, until one day she crosses the path of Nekoman who seems different by his language and his manners. One evening, he invites her to join him in Room 13 of the Kokoro Hotel. A disturbing face-to-face meeting will then take place. Who is hiding behind Nekoman's mask? A sensual and dreamlike story, a journey to the end of the dream...

HYGAN BOOK (70 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

FIGURES (72 PAGES)

Jena, Iris and Sally are trying to stop the threat of the Collector and Empress Virgule IV who is trying to conquer the multiverse. The Collector travels the multiverse to capture the strongest warriors and turn them into action figures that are then distributed to all the planets of the Empire. Freed by Daniel, Jena, Iris and Sally will try to recover the fragments of the Figure to regain their memory and free the other figures.

FIGURES (H)ERO(INE) BOOK (56 PAGES)

600 pre-orders, "All-In" unlocked with:

IMPERFECT SEASON 1 (296 PAGES)

Click on the banner for more informations about Imperfect:

ANACHRONY 1 (72 pages)

Click on the banner for more informations about Anachrony:

APPLE STRENGTH 1 - ENTWINED SOULS (96 PAGES)

Condemned to death, Naori Ketseuki is determined to disappear. However, he wakes up in a huge orchard covered with apples where he meets a lady trapped in a mirror that forbids her to eat one of the apples. Despite the warnings, Naori eats one and finds himself possessed by the soul of the terrible queen Snow-White threatening to take his place for good. 

BLOODY BOOK (70 PAGES OF ILLUSTRATIONS)

And more... To be continued.

story:
Short Summary

Hey there friends, I'm Buckethead. I am but a humble observer, but I've got quite the story to tell you. The story is 150+ pages long, but for now we will shoot for Part I, about 30 pages long. Here is a taste:

 

First, I need your help. Dark forces work toward preventing me from sharing this tale and exposing them. With your help, we can breath life into this quest of mystery, dark fantasy, and intrigue. In-fact, I found this ancient tablet, perhaps you can shed some light onto its meaning:

 

"In a time of ancient kingdoms, towering castles, and mighty dragons, prosperity was turned to calamity.

Ten Nephilim were born to bear the crowns of Kings.

Unbeknownst to them, their crowns were tainted,

And their powers turned wicked, dark... corrupt.

Like a moth to an everlasting flame, the darkness consumed all things

And what were once great kingdoms became lands of obscurity and despair.

The source of such malevolence remains shrouded, 

But there may be one who knows the truth.

However, long has his soul been lost, and he too corrupted by the dark."

 

Some of the information you find in this story may be shrouded in mystery, to keep the finer details a secret, I will tell you the tale in a cryptic form, by way of fragmented story telling. Those who would seek to close my lips are not smart enough to decipher such a tale, but I'm confident that you can. Pay attention to the details, however small, and you will surely understand the grand picture.

The story I aim to share is but a small fraction of a grander tale within a larger series that exists within a vast and expansive universe. For now though, let us take this tale one chapter at a time. Thus, I present to you Kingsblade: The Eldrahn Key, Part I.

You will follow Henryk, the Umbral Knight. His journey finds him lost within his own home, the Kingdom of Eldrahn, seeking a mysterious key said to unlock the Virtues of Beryfel. Such Virtues could save Eldrahn, and the entire world of Eos from the darkness that corrupts it, or in the wrong hands, be used as a weapon and destroy it entirely. However, everything aims to confuse and combat him. He finds himself in the Nectre Pool, a vast untime that shows him the unrecognizable faces of the familiar, a burning tree upon a mound of skulls, and a damselfly...

Henryk escapes the confines of a dungeon cell, only to be confronted by the Headsman, but he has been twisted by Moonfyre and the Undying. The bells toll and usher the Umbral Knight into a kingdom fallen to ruin and overrun by foul beasts.

Stick with me and we can unravel the mysteries of this tale, and so many others. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Before I can tell you this grand tale, I'll need your help; as mentioned above. To breath life into the blank pages of the story we will need to work together to come up with $6,725. This will cover all costs regarding penciling, inking, coloring, and lettering for 30 pages at $225 per page. If we were to simply use magic to bring this story forth then we would surely be caught by the dark forces aiming to stop us, don't be silly.

Don't worry though, I am not aiming to empty your pockets, you will be handsomely rewarded for your contributions... just be careful whom you tell, there is no telling who these fiends have embodied. What sort of rewards, you ask? Let me tell you, come closer.

There are 12 potential rewards for you to lay claim to:

- The featured Kingsblade Perk gives the most bang for your buck so keep a close watch out for this one. It even offers you a chance to have your name featured in the story itself by way of a "RANGR" Skull!

- Digital Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, These are the digital packages that will include a Digital Copy of the story, some Digital Art, and a unique prize indeed. You see, I have stumbled upon a Tattered Journal of sorts. I'm not sure to whom it belongs, but with your contribution I may be enticed to share a page, or even 3, with you. Bear in mind, you may not grasp the same pages as another of the same contribution, and thus we can work together as a community to uncover the secrets and perhaps the identity of whomever owns this relic.

- Physical Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, These are the physical packages that offer a more hands-on type of reward. Not only will you possess a Physical Copy of the story, but also a Custom Shirt made by the finest Tailor using the finest of hides collected in the Northern Territories. You may even find a Bronze Token in your pocket; this token grants you access to a lofty Digital Package as well.

- Legendary Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, Not satisfied with the previous rewards then consider these relics. I can offer you rewards of limited quantity, never to be produced again. Trading Cards, of sorts, featuring our story's hero; Henryk, the Umbral Knight. You may find yourself with a holographic card, or even one signed by the artisan who crafted such fine artwork. Still not satisfied I see, well what if I told you that I can also offer up a Custom Print of our hero? That sounds pretty good doesn't it? Well, of coarse you still get a Physical Copy of the story, don't be silly. Further your contribution and I can further my offers. Perhaps a Fractured Token can entice you? With it, you can collect a Digital Package as well. I can even speak to the Tailor and with a Silver Token, get you access to his back room where he keeps the truly epic, All-Over Shirts, and I bet if I looked hard enough I could even find a Shadow Henryk Plush in there.

- Moonfyre Collection, This is one of my most coveted rewards, but it comes at a cost most high. However, with it you will find one of grandest collections of relics such as a Signed Physical Copy of the story, all previously mentioned Trading Cards, the Shadow Henryk Plush, an All-Over Shirt, Custom Print, an additional Physical Copy of the story in case the dark forces steal away your other one, and 2 of the rarest prizes that I can offer.   - I can add your face to the story as well. That's right, your very face can be featured within the pages of Henryk's quest.   - However, the greatest gift of all I save for last. I've only 5 copies of the Tattered Journal and each is missing 5 pages. Lucky for us, no one Journal is missing the same 5 pages so perhaps together we can identify its owner and understand their story. Why does the owner have 5 copies of the same journal with different pages missing in each? Probably not a marketing ploy, that's for sure...

- The Umbral Collection, This package offers everything surrounding our hero. Over the years I have followed Henryk's journey and I can offer you much that he has stood close to. Among similar rewards form other packages I can offer you 2 unique rewards not found anywhere else.   - A Henryk & the Nectre Pool Holographic Trading Card. This is amongst the rarest of the offered cards and so it is not given lightly.   - An LED Backlit Print with Snap Frame, so you can let the Umbral Knight shine for all to see.

 

I must warn you, if our goal is not reached, if the dark forces prevent us from bringing this tale to life then I fear we will have failed. No, I will not allow it. They will not stop us, one way or another I will share this story with the world. Any contributions collected will be put forth to bringing this story to life, come blood, sweat, or tears I will not rest until this story lives. You have my word. How can you trust a man with a bucket on his head? What bucket...? Hey, look at these!

 

 

The Impact

I have been compiling Henryk's journey for years, and put myself on the line to protect his tale so that one day I could share it with the world. That day is nearing, and your contribution will make it so.

You will not find nothing more than the dark truth behind Henryk's quest. A life torn, a life forgotten, and new born sin. I cannot promise a happy ending, but I assure you it is one that you shall not see coming. 

We are on the precipice, and all it takes is a push. So, will you leap into chaos and watch this story unfold alongside me, or will you stand by and let it slip into the abyss? Either way, my bucket will remain sturdy and shine with an unbreakable fervor. What's that? I said nothing of a bucket... This artwork is amazing...

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The risk we face in failure is that time will condemn us. Henryk's journey will go unnoticed for an uncertain length of time and my struggle to breath life into this tale will increase. A single voice can be a powerful one, but this speaks to the nature of a thousand voices, each more powerful than the last. Together we can reshape the world.

I have bled for Henryk and his story, and should we fail I will continue to do so, but blood spilt is blood lost. Would it not be better served to pump life into fantasy and escapism? 

The world is full of resources and one can accomplish much if resourceful, but a mercenary does not work for free. A Tailor cannot draw life through thread without first possessing said thread. 

Do not concern yourself with your rewards, you shall see them. I am a man of my word, and by my bucket I will see your contributions rewarded, though it may take some time longer than expected should we not reach our goal. 

Alright, let the bucket thing go already.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not all have the coin to contribute; this is understandable. You may still assist me, and Henryk for that matter. Spread the word, make it known that Henryk exists and his story is clashing forth, fighting for its life, to be seen by the world. Do this, and you will have contributed to the Umbral Knight's untamed zeal.

There will be those seeking to silence you, to twist your words, and to bend your will. Hold fast, and speak true. There are many tools for sharing beyond only your voice as well. Utilize all at your disposal and we will see the sun shine on a new dawn, a dawn of Moonfyre and the Undying.

 

Oh, one last thing before you go. Further examination of the Tattered Journal has unveiled a hidden script. Perhaps you can illuminate what escapes me? It reads:

 

"Unto

Folkvangr

My

Damselfly"

 

Any ideas?
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hey there friends, I'm Buckethead. I am but a humble observer, but I've got quite the story to tell you. The story is 150+ pages long, but for now we will shoot for Part I, about 30 pages long. Here is a taste:
 


First, I need your help. Dark forces work toward preventing me from sharing this tale and exposing them. With your help, we can breath life into this quest of mystery, dark fantasy, and intrigue. In-fact, I found this ancient tablet, perhaps you can shed some light onto its meaning:
 
"In a time of ancient kingdoms, towering castles, and mighty dragons, prosperity was turned to calamity.
Ten Nephilim were born to bear the crowns of Kings.
Unbeknownst to them, their crowns were tainted,
And their powers turned wicked, dark... corrupt.
Like a moth to an everlasting flame, the darkness consumed all things
And what were once great kingdoms became lands of obscurity and despair.
The source of such malevolence remains shrouded, 
But there may be one who knows the truth.
However, long has his soul been lost, and he too corrupted by the dark."
 
Some of the information you find in this story may be shrouded in mystery, to keep the finer details a secret, I will tell you the tale in a cryptic form, by way of fragmented story telling. Those who would seek to close my lips are not smart enough to decipher such a tale, but I'm confident that you can. Pay attention to the details, however small, and you will surely understand the grand picture.
The story I aim to share is but a small fraction of a grander tale within a larger series that exists within a vast and expansive universe. For now though, let us take this tale one chapter at a time. Thus, I present to you Kingsblade: The Eldrahn Key, Part I.
You will follow Henryk, the Umbral Knight. His journey finds him lost within his own home, the Kingdom of Eldrahn, seeking a mysterious key said to unlock the Virtues of Beryfel. Such Virtues could save Eldrahn, and the entire world of Eos from the darkness that corrupts it, or in the wrong hands, be used as a weapon and destroy it entirely. However, everything aims to confuse and combat him. He finds himself in the Nectre Pool, a vast untime that shows him the unrecognizable faces of the familiar, a burning tree upon a mound of skulls, and a damselfly...
Henryk escapes the confines of a dungeon cell, only to be confronted by the Headsman, but he has been twisted by Moonfyre and the Undying. The bells toll and usher the Umbral Knight into a kingdom fallen to ruin and overrun by foul beasts.
Stick with me and we can unravel the mysteries of this tale, and so many others. 
 




 
What We Need & What You Get
Before I can tell you this grand tale, I'll need your help; as mentioned above. To breath life into the blank pages of the story we will need to work together to come up with $6,725. This will cover all costs regarding penciling, inking, coloring, and lettering for 30 pages at $225 per page. If we were to simply use magic to bring this story forth then we would surely be caught by the dark forces aiming to stop us, don't be silly.
Don't worry though, I am not aiming to empty your pockets, you will be handsomely rewarded for your contributions... just be careful whom you tell, there is no telling who these fiends have embodied. What sort of rewards, you ask? Let me tell you, come closer.
There are 12 potential rewards for you to lay claim to:
- The featured Kingsblade Perk gives the most bang for your buck so keep a close watch out for this one. It even offers you a chance to have your name featured in the story itself by way of a "RANGR" Skull!
- Digital Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, These are the digital packages that will include a Digital Copy of the story, some Digital Art, and a unique prize indeed. You see, I have stumbled upon a Tattered Journal of sorts. I'm not sure to whom it belongs, but with your contribution I may be enticed to share a page, or even 3, with you. Bear in mind, you may not grasp the same pages as another of the same contribution, and thus we can work together as a community to uncover the secrets and perhaps the identity of whomever owns this relic.
- Physical Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, These are the physical packages that offer a more hands-on type of reward. Not only will you possess a Physical Copy of the story, but also a Custom Shirt made by the finest Tailor using the finest of hides collected in the Northern Territories. You may even find a Bronze Token in your pocket; this token grants you access to a lofty Digital Package as well.
- Legendary Bronze, Silver, & Gold Tier, Not satisfied with the previous rewards then consider these relics. I can offer you rewards of limited quantity, never to be produced again. Trading Cards, of sorts, featuring our story's hero; Henryk, the Umbral Knight. You may find yourself with a holographic card, or even one signed by the artisan who crafted such fine artwork. Still not satisfied I see, well what if I told you that I can also offer up a Custom Print of our hero? That sounds pretty good doesn't it? Well, of coarse you still get a Physical Copy of the story, don't be silly. Further your contribution and I can further my offers. Perhaps a Fractured Token can entice you? With it, you can collect a Digital Package as well. I can even speak to the Tailor and with a Silver Token, get you access to his back room where he keeps the truly epic, All-Over Shirts, and I bet if I looked hard enough I could even find a Shadow Henryk Plush in there.
- Moonfyre Collection, This is one of my most coveted rewards, but it comes at a cost most high. However, with it you will find one of grandest collections of relics such as a Signed Physical Copy of the story, all previously mentioned Trading Cards, the Shadow Henryk Plush, an All-Over Shirt, Custom Print, an additional Physical Copy of the story in case the dark forces steal away your other one, and 2 of the rarest prizes that I can offer.   - I can add your face to the story as well. I've only 5 copies of the Tattered Journal and each is missing 5 pages. Lucky for us, no one Journal is missing the same 5 pages so perhaps together we can identify its owner and understand their story. Why does the owner have 5 copies of the same journal with different pages missing in each? Probably not a marketing ploy, that's for sure...
- The Umbral Collection, This package offers everything surrounding our hero. Over the years I have followed Henryk's journey and I can offer you much that he has stood close to. This is amongst the rarest of the offered cards and so it is not given lightly.   - An LED Backlit Print with Snap Frame, so you can let the Umbral Knight shine for all to see.

story:
The Book:

Enchantra, mistress of the mystic arts; Moonbird, the acrobatic sonic-voiced combatant; the Butterfly, size-changing wonder; Bellona, the strongest woman on Earth and All-American Girl, the patriotic young heroine.

The Guild of Augmented Law-Enforcement Specialists, codenamed the Super G.A.L.S. are currently the most prolific superhero team on Earth. Recently their ranks have increased as they've taken in new members. Times have been good and peace has been the general rule of the day. 

However, while some of their most experienced members are away dealing with a crisis on the other side of the planet, what happens when someone's irresponsible action goes on to threaten the very world itself? Will an ad hoc team of the Super G.A.LS. be enough to save the day?

Sometimes success comes at a high cost...

By the time the story is over, the Super G.A.L.S. will face far-reaching consequences!   

About Me:

Hi, I'm Bill. I'm a lifetime comic book reader and pencil slinger. I've worked on some smalltime comics in the past and I just completed my first ever graphic novel. 

This is inspired by the Bronze Age of comics I grew up reading and the 80's cartoons I watched voraciously. I always thought of my art style as a mix between the comics and cartoons I consumed as a youth. I've been told most of my superheroes look like action figures waiting to be made and at least some of that is due to my love of using primary colors, bold and vibrant.  In my opinion that's the way superheroes should look.

While this isn't a "kid book" per se, it is All Ages, meaning anyone, adult or child, can read it and hopefully enjoy the characters and story. I wanted the girls in my life to have superheroines they could look up to they way I aspired to be like the superheroes I followed the adventures of in my youth.  Also, I just enjoy drawing things like women and robots and stuff in space. 

I wanted to have the book complete before I crowdfunded it and after two years, now it is done! It's penciled, inked, lettered, it's been proofread and corrections made. I'm still playing with the colors throughout the book, tweaking things here and there. I don't see any problems with this being delivered on time in October. 

 

The Future:

It's my hope that this is but the first graphic novel of the Super G.A.L.S.! At the risk of being overly optimistic, I've already plotted six graphic novels and have begun work on the second book. Trust me, these books are all going to lead somewhere! I plan on  being in this for the long haul. I always wanted to create characters and stories to entertain others, so this is the fulfilment of a lifetime dream of mine.

With luck, each graphic novel will be better than the one before it and I'd love hire a colorist. With your help, I can make that happen!

story:
Written by : Larry Holder

Art and Lettering by : Rob Cannon

48 Pages B&W, Full Colour available with unlock-able perk

 

A Tale Spanning the First Ages of Time and Space   

The universe begins in chaos, a world forms at its centre and life springs forth upon it. The world of Ines.

After a thousands of years of peace, a darkness arises and threatens all life. It brings forth a plague that mutates the bodies of the dead and creates monsters which spread out with one mission: KILL ALL LIFE. 

The peoples of the world, the Homin and Orested, band together with their creators, the Dragi, to fight back the terror. Ultimately the Dragi defeat the evil creature at the cost of their lives.

 

Peace returns to the world and time winds forward through history until the Age of the Angelous, the new ruling race of the planet. A hybrid of the Homin and Orested, they inherit the power the Dragi once processed. 

The evil was not fully defeated and it now returns in a diminished, but no less dangerous form. After several lost battles against this new foe, the Angelous retreat to their flying cities and abandon the surface dwellers, betraying their role as protector.

 A secret group forms within the Angelous military bent on helping the surface and ridding the world of this ancient evil. This elite group of deeply spiritual and moral warriors is lead by the great High Judicar Phasenion.

His young, head strong,  but loyal student, Onixia, is tasked with the burden of finding the one thing that can save the world after a terrible tragedy.  As the events unfold, Onixia must complete this task or all life in the world shall perish.

“Of Time and Space” is a callback to the Sci-Fi and Fantasy tales I was influenced by as a child, with some inspiration from religion and myths.

The Lunar Rise is the first Chapter of the 5 chapter spanning saga that is Of Time and Space. There are 5 Chapters mapped out for the whole story that follow a linear progression over thousands of years on the planet Ines.

By helping to fund this you are helping to fund many more stories to come in this saga. 

 

What You Are Funding and What You Can Get

Your funding is very important to the completion of this book in a timely manner. The script, design and basic layout are all complete. The funding will cover the remaining sequential art for the book, 29 of the 48 pages are complete at this time. With your support, I can order the rest of the pages from Rob Cannon all at once. Once funded, we plan to ship in September of 2020. 

There are great perks available, besides the book itself, every copy will be signed by me, Larry Holder, on the inside cover.

Regular Cover Front:

Regular Cover Full Wrap:

Besides the regular full wrap cover there will also a second full wrap variant available, in limited quantity,  featuring the two concept posters by Andre Boulard and Daswhox. This version also comes signed of course.

Variant #1 Full Wrap:

The second variant cover features art done by me, Larry Holder,  also in limited quantity. The front (right) is a homage to one of the biggest inspirations for the book, the back(left) is a photo based recreation of one of the pages.  This version also comes signed of course.

Variant #2 Full Wrap:

Also there is a metal print available featuring the cover art. This is actually an image transferred directly onto a sheet of aluminum. This will be available in super limited quantity due to high production cost.

Metal Print:

Another premium item returning are the art prints. This time around there are three in the set, one is the full image of the main cover by Rob Cannon, the second is a beautifully edited piece of the mural found on page 21 of the book and the third is an exclusive item to this campaign, a poster of the character Selene done by the ever wonderful Miss Sashi! All posters in the premium tier will be printed on High Quality Photo Metallic Rag Paper in limited quanity, there is also a discount poster tier that will be printed thinner stock Crystal Archive Lustre Photo Paper. Posters are 11x14 inches in size.

Poster #2:

   

Poster #3:

The popular mugs return from the first campaign! These versions are not limited and come in two variants, the Rob Cannon cover art and the Miss Sashi poster art! Mugs hold 11oz of liquid.

Cover Art Mug:

Replacing the "Making Of" book from the last campaign is a new Art Journal. It covers much of the same ground as the previous book but is more of an historical "gallery". In it you'll see more work from earlier versions, more of the current work and some of the work that will influence the future books. It's light on text and heavy on images, perfect for anyone that wants to see a 20 year creative process step by step.

Art Journal:

Last but not least is the one of a kind Original Art tier! That's right original art! The art will be done by Rob Cannon in black and white, it will feature 4 different 4x5 inch character art images. The art will come packed in a synthetic leather bound folio, with the pieces pressure mounted into a matte. This folio is for both delivery and presentation, the pieces can be removed from the matte at anytime if you wish. Only one of these will be available for this campaign. The art is not yet completed but here's an image of how it will come presented.

Original Art Folio:

 

 

Stretch Goals

$4030 CND - Backer Pages! - Pages featuring backer names will be added as a thank you to everyone that made the book happen.

$5000 CND - Add Trading Cards! - Every backer gets a set of 12 collector cards featuring key art from the book, samples below.

 

$9000 CND - Add Colour! - Our most needed and wanted stretch goal is to put colour into the entire book, to do that we need to raise a little over double of our goal to finish the book. Rob's work deserves colour and I hope we can make this goal and have him add it in. You can see the difference in the samples below.

More unlocked as the campaign progresses!

 

How This Project Will Impact Me and You

By backing this project you will be funding the start of many more stories to come. This is but a mere drop in the pond of the grand story I wish to tell. It will be a thoughtful tale aimed at capturing the glory and feel of the classic Sci-Fi and Fantasy stories with a good helping of spiritual exploration. By backing this you will insure the completion, of what very well may be my life's work, and allow me to bring that story to a wider audience. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge faced by this book is raising enough to finish the artwork and pay for the printing and shipping. We failed to raise funds on the first run and really need to make it this time. It is a huge financial risk to myself but with the help of the backers we can make this happen.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help by sharing this page online and getting the word out to friends and family that may enjoy this type of story. Every little bit helps and word of mouth goes a long way. Thank you.

The art will come packed in a synthetic leather bound folio, with the pieces pressure mounted into a matte. This folio is for both delivery and presentation, the pieces can be removed from the matte at anytime if you wish. Only one of these will be available for this campaign. The art is not yet completed but here's an image of how it will come presented.Original Art Folio:  Stretch Goals$4030 CND - Backer Pages! - Pages featuring backer names will be added as a thank you to everyone that made the book happen.$5000 CND - Add Trading Cards! - Every backer gets a set of 12 collector cards featuring key art from the book, samples below. $9000 CND - Add Colour! - Our most needed and wanted stretch goal is to put colour into the entire book, to do that we need to raise a little over double of our goal to finish the book. Rob's work deserves colour and I hope we can make this goal and have him add it in. You can see the difference in the samples below.More unlocked as the campaign progresses! How This Project Will Impact Me and YouBy backing this project you will be funding the start of many more stories to come. This is but a mere drop in the pond of the grand story I wish to tell. It will be a thoughtful tale aimed at capturing the glory and feel of the classic Sci-Fi and Fantasy stories with a good helping of spiritual exploration. By backing this you will insure the completion, of what very well may be my life's work, and allow me to bring that story to a wider audience.  Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge faced by this book is raising enough to finish the artwork and pay for the printing and shipping. We failed to raise funds on the first run and really need to make it this time. It is a huge financial risk to myself but with the help of the backers we can make this happen.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute financially, you can still help by sharing this page online and getting the word out to friends and family that may enjoy this type of story. Every little bit helps and word of mouth goes a long way. Thank you.

story:
Fuggendo da un passato di sofferenza, Diego si trova a essere il bersaglio di una inaspettata caccia al ladro. Nell'Inferno sconvolto dalla lotta per il potere, il giovane diavolo Freccia accoglie il messaggio di speranza del suo Maestro. L'amore tra Diego e Alice rischia di essere annientato da un complotto infernale che ruota attorno a un tragico errore, e cambierà per sempre vita dei due ragazzi e dei loro amici. 

Una storia universale in cui redenzione e perdono devono fare i conti con il desiderio di potere e la possibilità di avere un futuro. Una girandola di personaggi, terreni e ultra terreni, alla ricerca della libertà, che rifiutano un destino ineluttabile e sono pronti a superare il limite per cui tutto è solo gioco.

Questa storia parla di noi, delle scelte che siamo chiamati a compiere ogni giorno e di come esse dicano, inequivocabilmente, chi siamo veramente: angeli o diavoli.

---

Running away from a past of suffering, Diego finds himself the target of an unexpected thief hunt. In Hell, which finds itself in the middle of a power struggle, the young devil Freccia is given hope by his Master.

The love between Diego and Alice is likely to be destroyed by an infernal plot that revolves around a tragic mistake, and will forever change the lives of the two lovers and their friends.

A universal story in which redemption and forgiveness must come to terms with the desire for power and the possibility of having a future. A whirlwind of characters, lives and afterlives, in search of freedom, refusing an inescapable destiny and ready to exceed the limit of everything being just a game.

This story is about us, the choices that we are called to make every day and how they say, unequivocally, who we really are: angels or devils.

Il progetto prevede di realizzare la Graphic Novel sia in lingua italiana sia in inglese.

La realizzazione delle Tavole della Graphic Novel è a opera di Edoardo Arzani; la traduzione, come quella del Romanzo, è stata affidata a Jasmine Nicole Fauteux (profili in fondo alla pagina).

La richiesta di fondi è finalizzata a

  • Realizzazione delle illustrazioni (tavole) della Graphic Novel
  • Stampa della Graphic Novel in italiano
  • Realizzazione dei formati elettronici della Graphic Novel in Italiano e in Inglese

oltre a coprire i costi della traduzione.

Il target di raccolta della campagna è di 9.000,00€ sulla base dei costi che saranno sostenuti appena evidenziati. La formula di raccolta fondi è "flexible" perché il progetto verrà realizzato anche se il target non sarà raggiunto: i sostenitori riceveranno in ogni caso quanto compreso nel perk sottoscritto. Lo scopo della campagna, infatti, è di consentire alla Graphic Novel di rimanere nei target di mercato ipotizzati per consentirle la maggiore diffusione possibile.

---

The project envisages the creation of the Graphic Novel both in Italian and in English.

Graphic Novel Tables is by Edoardo Arzani; the translation, like the novel, was entrusted to Jasmine Nicole Fauteux (profiles at the bottom of the page).

Fundraising is aimed at

  • Realization of Graphic Novels illustrations
  • Print the Graphic Novel in Italian
  • Realization of the electronic formats of the Graphic Novel in Italian and in English

as well as covering translation costs.

The campaign harvest target is € 9,000.00 based on the costs that will be borne just highlighted. The fundraising formula is "flexible" because the project will be implemented even if the target is not reached: the supporters will in any case receive what is included in the perk subscribed. The purpose of the campaign, in fact, is to allow the Graphic Novel to remain in the market targets to allow it to spread as widely as possible.

Emilio Alessandro Manzotti: Scrittore - Writer

La scrittura è stata una ispirazione, poi studio e infine passione tramite la quale esprimere la mia creatività e raccontarmi attraverso una storia. Freccia, il primo romanzo che ho deciso di pubblicare, è il risultato di un universo immaginario che ruota attorno ad alcuni valori cardine della mia esperienza: l’amicizia, la speranza e l’amore capace di superare la giustizia.

---

Writing was an inspiration, then a means to study and finally a passion through which to express my creativity and tell a story through.

Edoardo Arzani: Disegnatore - Cartoonist

Edoardo Arzani, nato a Codogno (MI) nel 1988, si è diplomato al Liceo Artistico e nel 2010 all’Accademia del Cinema di Bologna come operatore di ripresa e montaggio. Ha realizzato prima il cortometraggio “Prosit” (realizzato in collaborazione con L.I.L.A. Piacenza) in qualità di montatore e successivamente il mediometraggio “Madre” in qualità di operatore di ripresa e montatore.

Nel 2011 si è iscritto alla Scuola internazionale di Comics di Reggio Emilia al corso di fumetto. Finiti gli studi nel 2013, ha iniziato una collaborazione con Agata film realizzando le illustrazioni usate per il motion comics della web series “Nero – la serie” e nel 2016, la locandina che ha realizzato per questa serie, ha vinto il premio Miglior poster ai Rome web series award. Nel 2014 ha illustrato il libro di poesie “Scendea fischiando sorella morte” (Edizioni Scritture) e nel 2016 il libro “Il soffio del vento – Da Chernobyl a Caorso trent’anni dopo” (Edizioni Ponte Gobbo).

Dal 2016 collabora come colorista per Sergio Bonelli Editore.

---

Edoardo Arzani, born in Codogno (MI) 1988, he graduated from the Art School and in 2010 from a course for camera operators and editing  at the Bologna Academy of Cinema. He realized the short film “Prosit” (a collaboration with LILA Piacenza) as editor and the medium-length film “Mother” as cameraman and editor.

In 2011 he enrolled at the International School of Comics of Reggio Emilia in a comics course. After concluding his studies in 2013, he started a collaboration with Agata film realizing the illustrations used for the motion comics of the web series “Nero – la serie“, and in 2016, the poster he made for this series, won the award for Best Poster at the Rome Web Series Awards.

In 2014 he illustrated the book of poems “Scendea fischiando sorella morte” (Edizioni Scritture) and in 2016 the book “Il soffio del vento – Da Chernobyl a Caorso trent’anni dopo” (Edizioni Ponte Gobbo).

Since 2016 he collaborates as colorist with Sergio Bonelli Editore.

Jasmine Nicole Fauteux: Traduttrice - Translator

Jasmine Nicole Fauteux, nata nel 1987 sulla costa occidentale del Canada, si è trasferita in Italia nel 2010, dove lavora con successo come insegnante d'inglese professionista. È stata questa passione, sia per l'inglese sia la letteratura e per una forte convinzione nel libro stesso, che ha portato al suo coinvolgimento in Freccia. Ha sempre avuto un profondo amore per la letteratura inglese e, sebbene il suo principale obiettivo sia quello di condividere questa sua passione per l'inglese attraverso l'insegnamento, lavorare su Freccia è la realizzazione di un sogno.

---

Jasmine Nicole Fauteux, born in 1987 on the West Coast of Canada, moved to Italy in 2010 where she has since worked as a successful professional English teacher. It was this passion for both English and literature and a strong belief in the book itself that lead to her involvement in Freccia. She has always possessed a profound love of English literature and although her ambition is to share her love of English through teaching, working on Freccia is the realization of a dream.

Grazie per ogni vostro aiuto: anche il sostegno che verrà dalla promozione che vorrete dare a questo progetto facendolo conoscere ai vostri amici!

---

Thanks for all your help: also the support that comes from the promotion that you want to give this project to knowing it to your friends!

(Copertina del romanzo a cura di Alessandra Santelli --- Cover of the novel by Alessandra Santelli)

story:
Who are our characters?

  • Part-Time: After close to two decades of fighting the good fight, PT has grown weary of endlessly wandering from one town to the next. Despite his weariness, he's still trying to unravel the mystery of how his newly-discovered energy gloves actually work.
  • Rose: With an insatiable lust for adventure, Rose is anything but ordinary. Armed with her dual Walther P99 pistols and realm teleporter, she's the deadly dame you want by your side when danger comes a-knockin'.
  • Professor Phantom: Mischievous, inventive, and deadly, the Professor's polymathic skills know no limits. Coupled with her manipulative psionic powers and self-created Zyborgs, Professor Phantom is the very definition of a global threat.

What are the Realms? When traveling to the different realms, think Sliders (yes, that awesome sci-fi show from the '90's starring everyone's favorite actor Jerry O'Connell), and Rick and Morty. So parallel/alternate Earths.

Page 1 (colored by Robb Miller)

Page 2 (colored by Robb Miller)

Page 3 (colored by Robb Miller)

 

What We Need & What You'll Get

As the writer and artist of Realm Raiders, I'd like to thank you for helping me achieve my dream of publishing a comic book. All of the funds raised from this campaign will be dedicated to getting this book into your hands by Halloween. Your contribution guarantees the following:

  • The book will be fully colored by Robb Miller, printed on high quality paper, and shipped directly to you
  • All books will be signed and numbered
  • Every book will have a quick head sketch drawn by yours truly

Page 4 (inks)

Page 5 (inks)

Page 6 (inks)

Page 7 (inks)

Page 8 (inks)

 

The book is 100% laid out. All it needs it to be tightened up and inked, colored and lettered. After that, it's to be edited and off to the printer and into your hands!

 

Model sheet for Part-Time

Model sheet for the Zyborgs

Early cover designs and pages

Professor Phantom! Page 10 (pencils)

Sketch designs for a Carnotaurus (a little preview of the shenanigans to come)

story:
Illustrated by Kevin Steward    Colors by King Bola 

The Story

Our story is set in a modern day earth where Superheros are created by a secret government project named ORION to maintain peace through out the world. For decades,Utopia has been protected by The Guardians, led by the planet's greatest hero Apollo. However as the world begins to devolve with increased terrorist attacks and foreign goverments destablizing, Utopia must engage to keep the peace. Through devious plots played out by the evil Tyrannt, he is able to trap our hero and cast him deep into space and with blood on the hands of Utopia, they are forced to disband and depower the world's superhero forces. Leaving the planet powerless to fight back Tyrannt quickly takes over turning the world into a dystopian wastland ruled by fear and war. 

Apollo is 100 pages of pure Superhero goodness! Full of action, defeat, betrayal and everything you want in a REAL Superhero book! 

By supporting the completion of this book you are opening the door for a huge comicbook universe that is built upon our hero Apollo. This is only the beginning!

 

 

 

Goals

I am digitally penciling and inking the entire book and am currently 10 pages into the process. The book is completely scripted and ready to be drawn. It will be professionally lettered and once we reach our goals will be professionally colored.

The basic out-the-door book will consist of 100 luscious black and white pages fully inked wrapped in a perfect bound cover and each book is signed. So the intial funding goal is set for $4000.00 which covers the printing, packaging and production costs.

Upon reaching the initial funding goal of $4000 I will give a free hard copy or digital copy of my sketchbook to all backers. 

If we can reach $15,000.00 the book will get the color treatment, 100 full color pages!

If we can reach $20,000.00 I will extend the book with additional pages including character break downs/information and WIP sketches.

If we can reach $30,000.00 all editions of the book will be Hard cover with all the beauty of full color pages as well.

$40,000 *Locked*

$50,000 *Locked*

 

Motivation

I realized after illustrating books such as Corey the Zombie Killer, Night at the Living Tricon and The Man in the Kitty Coat that I had my own stories to tell.

I have always loved superhero comics so I sat down and poured my thoughts on paper along with a good friend we fleshed out this awesome universe of heros. Not being a natural writer I reached out to a talented young fella named Jay Rivera and he took this jumbled story and like a master he spun it into a wonderful script. If you love the classic hero's journey then this story is for you with twists,turns,tragedy and redemption its a must read!

 

Risks

Risks and Challenges. Well, with this being 100 pages and doing 80% of the work, time is an issue. I am giving myself enough to fully illustrate/edit and produce this graphic novel with  manageable rewards to get a great book in your hands. I will keep everyone updated with its progress from each angle as we go. This project is my passion and getting it completed and in your hands is my only focus.

If you want to help out

Hey and you know what is just as important as pledging? Sharing the good word of course! You can find us on Twitter @ApolloNovel. Tweet and share the love.

story:
In this section you will learn about mein client.  He was born to a family of meager means.  As his age progressed, he attempted a career as an underground brawler.  He frequently lost control of his bodily functions as a result of the beatings.  Shortly thereafter, he attended university. He frequently lost his bodily functions as a result of the testing.  Time progressed and his loneliness was cured by the attention of a (unbeknownst at the time) whore.  The hands of time began to spin faster and faster. Days became seconds. Seconds became years and months turned to red velvet cake.  My client was now sad and aged.  He decided to write. And write he did.  One day he wants to learn to read.

This campaign is a penultimate 'swing for the fences' moment in my clients life.  Everything has culminated to this point...

Contributors are needed however.

They will be responsible for the success of the movement. Yes, this is a movement. This project is needed as a counter-weight to the lack of impact of the counter-culture. Let's shatter the old tropes of 'sub-culture' and 'counter-culture'. This is merely a seed of the new style.

The funding to accomplish this totals $7,700.  This is to pay for:

-Illustrators

-The printing of the manga to my clients specifications

-Shipping and handling

-Promotional costs

-Translation

The perks for contributions are extraordinary. The first couple of funding tiers involve the images used for the initial campaign. The higher tiers involve more work by my client.  The second to highest tier, you get the vagrant copy.  Do not let the description fool you.  A great amount of work will go into crafting this.  At the highest level you will get a very elegant copy that involves intricate workmanship.  There's something for the aristocrats and commoners.
story_txt: In this section you will learn about mein client.  He was born to a family of meager means.  As his age progressed, he attempted a career as an underground brawler.  He frequently lost control of his bodily functions as a result of the beatings.  Shortly thereafter, he attended university. He frequently lost his bodily functions as a result of the testing.  Time progressed and his loneliness was cured by the attention of a (unbeknownst at the time) whore.  The hands of time began to spin faster and faster. Days became seconds. Seconds became years and months turned to red velvet cake.  My client was now sad and aged.  He decided to write. And write he did.  One day he wants to learn to read.This campaign is a penultimate 'swing for the fences' moment in my clients life.  Everything has culminated to this point...Contributors are needed however.They will be responsible for the success of the movement. Yes, this is a movement. This project is needed as a counter-weight to the lack of impact of the counter-culture. Let's shatter the old tropes of 'sub-culture' and 'counter-culture'. This is merely a seed of the new style.The funding to accomplish this totals $7,700.  This is to pay for:-Illustrators-The printing of the manga to my clients specifications-Shipping and handling-Promotional costs-TranslationThe perks for contributions are extraordinary. The first couple of funding tiers involve the images used for the initial campaign. The higher tiers involve more work by my client.  The second to highest tier, you get the vagrant copy.  Do not let the description fool you.  A great amount of work will go into crafting this.  At the highest level you will get a very elegant copy that involves intricate workmanship.  There's something for the aristocrats and commoners.

story:
The Tale of Anna

1873, seven years after the american civil war has ended . The land remains a wasteland, where chaos and destruction roam. The four horsemen of the apocalypse have the job of bringing order to this wasteland. They force the man known as the demon of dodge to serve as their collector of souls. Separated from his child, Rooker has no choice but serve the four horsemen. To be reunited and bring order back to these lands he must hunt down the damned souls who walk among the living. Follow Rooker's tale in the six issue run of Anna, each issue will contain 24 pages. 

                        Stretch Goals

$1,600-  Issue #2 production.

$2,000- Issue #3 Production.

$2,500- Issue #4

$3,200- Issue #5

$4,000-  Anna Volume one TPB.

      

                       Referral contest 

To celebrate I have launched a referral contest! To enter you must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools for our analytics to track their referral contributions. The top 3 users who have the most referrals will get a free limited edition copy! 

 

                        Preview of the comic!

 

Meet the Team

Noah: I am the writer and creator of this series. Writing has been a secret passion of mine, becoming a writer seemed like a pipe dream a year ago. Few months ago I decided to finally peruse my dreams and started the script.

Moimoi: A very talented artist who has been hired to the do the artwork of the Anna series.   

So Where is your money going?

I am paying for as much as I can to keep this project alive! The majority of your donations are going into the artwork of issue number one. I have teamed up with a very talented artist to bring this comic to life. The rest of donations are going towards  fees, printing and shipping.

 

 

The Impact

This is more then a project for me, this is my future. Not only will your donations be funding my comic but, my future career. Like mentioned before this has been a pipe dream of mine for years and now it's becoming the real thing. I am investing my own money into this project as well I've created this page to jump start this dream.

Risks & Challenges

The risks have been brought down to a minimum, the only major risk is delays. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate at this time that's fine, I would appericate it if you would share the good word or follow me on twitter!  Follow me at @NoahKSix !

story:
The Walking Backwards Comic Series

A heavenly and diverse collection of wonderfully conceived and drawn comedic masterpieces and dumbfounded tomfoolery!  So heavenly in fact, they even rival that of Michelangelo's 'Sistine Chapel'  -as both finished works prove to demonstrate nothing less than pure divine intervention, and artistic sacrifice.  And so what(!?!) if ours just happened to be inspired and conceived vertically instead of horizontally!?!  I mean, "po-tay-to" ~ "po-tah-to" right!?!  -on a beautiful church ceiling, or the stall doors of funky public toilets  ...really, what's the big deal!  :)

Truly though, we just hope to add some joy to each of your lives. And if you like, and kinda understand what your about to see (?)... don't worry! -because this is just a taste! Trust us! -there's plenty more cheese ball stupification where this came from!  :)  

Funding and Purpose

All hopeful and grateful funds, will be used to expand the 'Walking Backwards' series to greater mediums (e.g., a Walking Backwards website; the addition of water color(s); possible syndication, and/or publication, etc.).  Our basic goal is to share our hair-brain ideas with the world, while still being able to feed ourselves at the same time. In the end, we just desire to earn a living doing something we love, by hopefully creating something you'll love. And we don't need much, but a little training-wheels push start... to help get us on our way. Thank you!

The following content contains thirty "single-panel" style, black and white 'Walking Backward's' example comics, for your hopeful viewing pleasure. Our material is random and wildly diverse covering every and all things, and ranges from PG to PG-13 (and our paramount goal is to NEVER go beyond that). We certainly don't mind being labeled "irrelevant to a functional society" and/or "crap'tastic!" But we prefer to stay somewhere between "mildly offensive" to "Oh, my god!"

FYI, if by chance one of our lovely illustrations somehow ruffles your feathers or offends you... don't worry! Our creative minds are bias-free, and we proudly consider ourselves an equal-opportunity offender! So just sit tight... you'll soon see that vindication and tranquility awaits you just around the corner!  :)

Once your viewing is complete, feel free to either throw flowers and praises our way, or tomatoes and insults! We're big immature boys... we can take it! And now, let the madness begin... (legal disclaimer, a.k.a. "fine print": the following material was conceived and drawn by a couple of nitwits, and may prove to significantly lower your current said, "I.Q."  Therefore, 'Walking Backwards' is not responsible for any confusion, vertigo, and/or dumbing down you may experience!  -enter at your own risk!)...  :)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

(The billboard ad states: 'Biff's Fine Back Pocket Combs' - Since 1979 - Remember Our Motto: - "If It Ain't Biff's... You Gotta Stranger In Your Rear!")

 

 

 

 

(Dialogue: -left: "Great... there goes the neighborhood!" -right: "Yeeep!" -coffee cup: "#1 Dad")

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

...the end!  For now...   :)

story:
Introduction

Hinikarigi everyone, (that means greetings in HoChunk my native language) my name is Little Crow D. GreenCrow and I love to write stories! 

What I am bringing to this project is my COMIGA (the fusion of comic book + manga) called Magician’s Tribe.  I started writing the Magician’s Tribe after I graduated from highschool back in 2010. I came up with my characters and the world that they live in and had it just about completed in 2013. Unfortunately, I had to put it away because I couldn't find the right art style to bring this awesome story to life. It was put away and I sorta forgot about it until sometime around 2019 when I met a French artist named Ramy. We would talk for hours about comic books and Anime. One time while talking about our favorite stories and art forms I brought up my story Magician’s Tribe. We talked and discussed it’s incredible world and characters and how I thought his art style would be perfect. Ramy loved it as well, he said we should bring this alive and spread it across the world. So after a few months of rewriting and polishing it up, the old story has a new life and thanks to Ramy an incredible art style to illustrate it. I brought Magician’s Tribe to Indiegogo so it can get funded.

What is Magician's Tribe?

Darrin Ashfield a young Crow man from Montana has recently graduated from high school and doesn't know exactly what he wants to do with his life. For some much needed rest and relaxation and to contemplate his future he heads off to Canada to have a visit with his cousins. He decides to travel via ship believing the tranquility will help focus and calm his mind. After boarding the ship unaware of the danger before him, Darrin is attacked and captured. He has been captured by a group of renegades that calls themselves Matadors aka the Slayers.  They are an ancient order that have been battling against Magicians for centuries. Magicians are living beings with supernatural gifts, some possessing powers so great that they can even warp reality. After being captured Darrin was experimented on with a new biological weapon that was made to eradicate magic. His body endured, it changed him, it triggered his dormant gifts and it awoke his power of Lightning. He struck down his captors with his new profound power, freeing himself and others who had been captured. But despite Darrin now being free, his body has changed and now he is no longer a normal human but instead a fully awaken-Magician. Slayers will start to come after him because Darrin now knows of their secret of starting a Holy War across the world. He decides that he will face the Slayers head on, preparing to stop their upcoming holy war with his new powers.

 

What We Need & What You Get

What we need to fund this project is an estimated amount of Fifteen Thousand dollars. When we reach our goal, every buck that you give will be put to good use such as making the chapters, printing the copies and shipping them out to you our gracious donors. Including paying my artist to draw and ink each page and panel. Next is to send you guys our printed COMIGA book with your goody bag. Also the funds will be used for research, materials and publishing for future chapters. A lot of hard-work has been put into making this COMIGA series and I want to deliver you guys the best story that you can have to read and love!

 

The Challenges

One of the biggest challenges will be producing and delivering everything to you on time. When it comes to shipping and communicating, I will be on top of things and get the orders out as quickly as possible. Once the chapters are finished, then all I need to do is send it off to the printers. I will keep everyone updated on progress and on delivery. So everything is in place as much as possible to ensure smooth production and delivery by the end of Summer (August) or end of 2020. I also want to let you know my donors sometimes an unexpected problem or delay may arise. I will deal with it and find a way to get the job done.

Thank you all for supporting me and my goal.

Sincerely yours, LITTLE CROW

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

P.S - If you can’t donate that’s fine. There are other ways to help. You can follow me and my friend~artist Ramy on our social media. Like, share and even retweet them.  Also please share the link of my Indiegogo with everyone you know which will greatly help me. Thanks again for checking out my project. 

 

Ramy_ (@Clarity_Ink)

https://twitter.com/Clarity_Ink?s=03

https://instagram.com/clarity_ink?igshid=1bqqm0...

 

Check out Little Crow

https://twitter.com/TheTenguKingOfS?s=09

https://www.instagram.com/alittlegoldcrow/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKhYNqvmtlcU-Y...

https://twitter.com/CrowTwin?s=09

https://discord.gg/dWc9aKH

story:
Ever wonder what happened to comic books featuring superheroes doing stuff like taking on Bank robbers? 

In this age of reboots, retcons, and multi-issue cross-over events that span the multiverse, many in the comic book industry today would say a superheroes vs. bank robber comic is too hokey to work. However, with Isis: All that Glitters, I wanted to show that it’s possible to put a  fresh take on the classic superheroes vs. bank robber story and make it fun and exciting for comic book readers in the 21st Century.

Isis: All That Glitters will be 62-page perfect bound graphic novel featuring an action packed adventure where the goddess next door takes on a bikini clad bank robber in a family friendly all-ages superhero story filled with action, adventure and a little humor. It’s the kind of comic book I used to used to pick up as a kid at the grocery store, and the newsstand back in the late 1980s and shared with my family and friends. I'd love to share that comic with you but I need your help.

To publish the Isis: All That Glitters graphic novel, I need your help to raise funds to pay:

  • Bill Walko to pencil and ink all 62 interior pages, 
  • A colorist to color Bill's finished pages and flatten them,
  • A letterer to lay out the dialogue of the story and the sound effects,
  • and the cost to print and ship the finished paperback and digital editions to readers along with any indiegogo fees.

I've been writing and publishing Isis series books since  2012. And I've been working with Bill Walko to design covers for the Isis series since 2014. With the first Isis graphic novel I want to give readers an action packed oldschool all-ages comic book just like the ones I used to pick up at the newsstands, the grocery stores, supermarkets and drugstores in the 1970s, 1980s, and 1990s. 

As the publisher of the SJS DIRECT imprint I have over a decade of experience in indie and digital publishing and I've written and published over 60 paperbacks and ebooks on a semiannual publishing schedule on digital platforms like Lightning Source, Amazon's Kindle, Barnes & Noble Press, and Smashwords since 2009.  In the past I have run successful Kickstarters  to pay for cover art and I maintained transparent communication with all my backers and got all the rewards out to all my readers in a prompt fashion. This is my first time working with a creative team on a project, and I believe we can get the graphic novel out to backers quickly once it's funded. 

Right now the script and the cover for Isis: All That Glitters are finished, and you can read the first ten pages of the script.  And I definitely plan on keeping all the backers updated on the progress of the project as we go along!

story:
WELCOME TO MISFIT CORNER COMICS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN!

The Story

On the day he emerges from his winter hibernation, it is foretold that this small woodland creature will be 'the greatest HERO our world has ever known", hence his mother named him HERO.

When he grows up, HERO is short and small and doesn't look anything like what you might think a Hero would look like... But that's the point.  Being a Hero has nothing to do with what you LOOK like.

HERO Book One begins the journey of HERO and his best friend Pudge as they head out into the world to find adventure and to discover what being a HERO is really all about.

Unknown to HERO and Pudge, evil forces are forming and have begun following the duo on their journey.

"[HERO Book One] is an all ages Graphic Novel the takes you on a journey of discovery, innocence and what it takes to become a Hero. I can't wait for volume 2. The book has a lot of heart and you will fall in love with Hero and Pudge. I also have a fondness for Granny Ora! You will not be disappointed." -Michael Meyers, Geek Brunch Podcast

About Us

Hello.  My name is Andrew Charipar and I am the Co-Founder of Misfit Corner Comics, LLC and I am Super Proud to introduce our IndieGoGo project, HERO Book One, the  FULL COLOR Oversized Edition.

HERO Book One is the first in a series of Kid-Friendly Original Graphic Novels that I Co-Created with my children Michael and Ayla.  Michael and I wrote the stories and I illustrated the series. The cover and all interior pages were colored by Avery Butterworth. 

HERO Book One Cover by Andrew Charipar and Colored by Avery Butterworth

The Book

HERO Book One contains the full 150 page story, a 4 page Epilogue and an 8 page backup story for a total of 162 FULL COLOR Story Pages.  It also includes several pinups by series Artist Andrew Charipar for a total of 176 pages.  The book is Oversized and measures 8.5 x 11.

Book One is completely DONE. All the art.  All the colors.  All the lettering.  Is done.  As a matter of fact, we have already completed the art and lettering for HERO Book Two and have started illustrating HERO Book Three.  Avery has also begun coloring HERO Book Two (check out his YouTube Channel ComicandIllustrationStudio7.62 to see videos and Live Streams of his coloring process).  It was important to us to have everything done before we started the campaign.  We wanted to bring the book to our backers as soon as possible and hope everyone enjoys it as much as we have enjoyed creating it.

Also, we are working on a Brand New Wraparound Cover for this release of HERO Book One... Here's the Black and White Inks so far and stop by our YouTube Channel at Misfit Corner Comics and follow along as we work on the new cover... It's really, really cool!

For this Campaign we are offering 2 additional ADD ONs that you might enjoy... An All New 48 page Sketchbook and a Brand New HERO Ashcan.  The Sketchbook will include some never before seen sketches by series artist Andrew Charipar of HERO and HERO Related Characters.  The Ashcan will include an All New 8-10 page backup story, a sneak peak at the first chapter of HERO Book Two as well as some additional 'behind the scenes' art.  The Sketchbook will be a 7.44 x 9.68 perfect bound book and the Ashcan will be a 5.5 x 7.12, 24 page stapled comic .

NOT FINAL COVER for HERO Sketchbook

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

NOT THE FINAL COVER for the HERO Ashcan

SAMPLE SKETCHBOOK PAGES

SAMPLE ASHCAN PAGES (Preview of HERO Book Two)

The IndieGoGo Campaign

I love drawing and I love drawing HERO.  More than anything, I love sharing my art with friends, family and fans.  I have created several different options for fans to get an original piece of HERO Art.  There are options to get a copy of the book plus an original 6x9 sketch by Series Artist Andrew Charipar as well as ADD ON perks where you can get a 9 X 12 Sketch of HERO or HERO related characters.  See Some Examples below...

One of the things I do with the art is draw each character (as well as the backgrounds) on separate piece of art paper.  I plan to do a lot of the next book on the 6x9 pages.  This means some of the 6x9 sketch rewards may also be actual panel art for the next book.  An original sketch and a published piece of art... A win-win for everyone.

We are also offering a Perk for a Limited Amount of  Original 9x12 Full Color Illustration draw by Andrew and colored by Avery on thick Illustration Board with watercolors and more!

PREVIEW PAGES
story_txt: WELCOME TO MISFIT CORNER COMICS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN!The StoryOn the day he emerges from his winter hibernation, it is foretold that this small woodland creature will be 'the greatest HERO our world has ever known", hence his mother named him HERO.When he grows up, HERO is short and small and doesn't look anything like what you might think a Hero would look like... But that's the point.  Being a Hero has nothing to do with what you LOOK like.HERO Book One begins the journey of HERO and his best friend Pudge as they head out into the world to find adventure and to discover what being a HERO is really all about.Unknown to HERO and Pudge, evil forces are forming and have begun following the duo on their journey."[HERO Book One] is an all ages Graphic Novel the takes you on a journey of discovery, innocence and what it takes to become a Hero. I can't wait for volume 2. The book has a lot of heart and you will fall in love with Hero and Pudge. I also have a fondness for Granny Ora! You will not be disappointed." -Michael Meyers, Geek Brunch PodcastAbout UsHello.  My name is Andrew Charipar and I am the Co-Founder of Misfit Corner Comics, LLC and I am Super Proud to introduce our IndieGoGo project, HERO Book One, the  FULL COLOR Oversized Edition.HERO Book One is the first in a series of Kid-Friendly Original Graphic Novels that I Co-Created with my children Michael and Ayla.  Michael and I wrote the stories and I illustrated the series. The cover and all interior pages were colored by Avery Butterworth. HERO Book One Cover by Andrew Charipar and Colored by Avery ButterworthThe BookHERO Book One contains the full 150 page story, a 4 page Epilogue and an 8 page backup story for a total of 162 FULL COLOR Story Pages.  It also includes several pinups by series Artist Andrew Charipar for a total of 176 pages.  The book is Oversized and measures 8.5 x 11.Book One is completely DONE. All the art.  All the colors.  All the lettering.  Is done.  As a matter of fact, we have already completed the art and lettering for HERO Book Two and have started illustrating HERO Book Three.  Avery has also begun coloring HERO Book Two (check out his YouTube Channel ComicandIllustrationStudio7.62 to see videos and Live Streams of his coloring process).  It was important to us to have everything done before we started the campaign.  We wanted to bring the book to our backers as soon as possible and hope everyone enjoys it as much as we have enjoyed creating it.Also, we are working on a Brand New Wraparound Cover for this release of HERO Book One...
