story:
Greetings we appreciate you taking out the time to come this far and get more information on our campaign. Your one step closer to being apart of the family as a backer. As previously stated we decided to push the boundaries of the norm & package it in a way the people would love it. We met that goal and more and since we appreciate the love we wanted to reciprocate by stepping it up a notch and create a cartoon based off of our 1st comic series. We believed it was important  to help give a voice to a sect of The underrepresented in the comic industry so we made a statement when our very 1st comic series was about all women. We feel Art is supposed to positively progress mankind and you’ll be aiding our mission of love,art & creative control by joining the A.I. Comic family as a backer.

We are seeking $15,000 for this project. This covers the cost for us to pay our animators to produce professional quality work. 

If we do not reach our goal funds will be saved in a separate account and our ram will launch another campaigns to raise the difference.

The only challenge we would have to conquer after that point would be a vigorous casting call for voice over opportunities for the cartoon. By making it to CBS NEWS,Radio Promotions, podcasts we feel every challenge is worth it when your creating art for change.

If you believe in our vision and want to be apart of a professional team using their art as a message for change then becoming a backer today will make sense. Then make sure you tell like minded individuals so we can grow the community together.

story:
Read Issue 1 For FREE - CLICK HERE 

It's Jaws if the shark were the hero. It's Robocop if the cop were a shark. After a massive bioengineered shark escapes a secret military lab, he makes himself the law of the sea. Able to fly, bullet proof, and armed with guns and teeth, he cuts a swath thru the bad guys. But the Mob and the evil scientist who created him have a plan to stop him - make even more dangerous creatures.

  • First issue of exciting five issue story arc of the world's first shark (anti)hero
  • The dark humor of Robocop
  • More shark action than all the Jaws movies combined
  • 28 interior pages
  • Saddle stitched with gloss paper and cover
  • 2 variant covers
  • Digital deluxe pdf full of extra content  (at least 60 pages of content)
  • 100% complete
  • BONUS - All backers receive a personalized thank you with an exclusive backer only animated GIF

 

Meet The Creator

I've been an engineer for 30 years and have degrees in nuclear, aerospace, and mechanical engineering. I've used this to integrate actual science into over the top science fiction in the technology used to power a cyborg shark.

I've wanted to write comic books all my life, but I didn't know any artists and didn't know how to draw. But I've always been good with computers. So when I had the idea for Shark of War, I knew I had to get it made no matter what. I spent the last year learning the different digital drawing and modeling programs that let me create exactly what I envisioned.

Character Profiles

story:
Do you love comic draws and want to express yourself? Create your sentence, choose your draw and I will give what you want! Contribute with this campaign and win incredible t-shirts or posters just the way you want! You choose what to write, the place in reference of the draw (above, below or at the backside of the t-shirt) and even if you want your draw instead of mine printed!

   Your t-shirt can be S, M, L, XL, XXL, and the poster will be 42cm x 30cm.

  Looks how it´s awesome!

 

THIS CAMPAIGN IS ALL OR NOTHING, IF I CAN´T ACHIEVE 500,00 YOU WILL GET YOUR MONEY BACK. PLEASE, HELP THIS CAMPAIGN SHARING IN FACEBOOK AND TWITTER!

  My name is André Lima and I work as 2D and 3D artist, since 2013 , at Globo Television, the biggest telecomunication group of Latin America.

  With Indiegogo I espect to be able to create creative content for a creative community. Now I need the money of the Indiegogo project to prove myself that I can invest my work and time exclusively to a pioneer indie community, and to help the construction of my house (I really need this help).

  I have experience creating t-shirts, I did a lot for my small branding Diversidade Mix. Look below some of this creations..

What are you waiting for? Win a unique t-shirt, help the indie community and give me a opportunity to dive in this segment and to construct my house!

story:
THE LOW DOWN:

Hello, my name is Juan Navarro, I'm an Artist/Writer/Comic Book Shop Owner who is working/living out of Hialeah Florida, part of the Greater Miami area. I've been making comics for some time now and this particular book, TOMMY, a story about a little kid with an imaginary friend… except his imaginary friend is a serial killer!

It has have been an insane bit for me to do for the last 4 years I've been working on it. I'm looking to expand on it a  bit, and the next 3 issues are coming out next year, but we also have cool covers and side bits we wanted to do for it and one of them is the "CEREAL KILLER" parody covers we did for issue 1.

These have been huge hits here at the shop and on the road, so now we wanted to do something cool: BIG OL' STICKERS to slap on stuff! We found a great place to do die-cut stickers and tried out the idea and we really dug the quality and coolness of them so bam, we are here.

This of course was inspired by WACKY PACKAGES and GARBAGE PAIL KIDS, but with our own unique CREATURE TWIST!

This is a chance for you to get some really cool particular items from TOMMY, and to also help us make more product to get more people into TOMMY and his world, than ever before. You can also get exclusive art and exclusive work from me the artist, and more!

 

The Deal:

Each sticker will be $3 plus shipping and handling, the sets of all 5 will be $10 and from there all the extras will be listed. Pretty easy right? 

  • 9x12 original art by yours truly
  • Collectors box for all the stickers inside, signed by me
  • Comics Books supplied by Creature Entertainment, with special signature by me. 
  • Sketch cards!  

The Plan:

We have the printer lined up and the estimate on price so it's all ready to go! 

  • If you dig weird comics, indie comics, or just comics in general and having a unique laugh, these stickers are for you! 
  • We've made comics before, various Kickstarters and such, this our first IndieGoGo to get the word out and try another platform on a different type of product our selves. 
  • This will help keep TOMMY afloat while we work on the next series arc, coming next year! 

Risks & Challenges

  • We have the majority of design done, and other drawing and the making of the final packaging, we only have the hurdle of cost to over  WE'RE ASKING FOR ONLY $700 WHICH WOULD COVER:
  • PRINTING, which arrives around the 555.00 mark or so, though we gave it room for additional stickers to be made, past what we deliver here to sell at shows and online. 
  • DRAWING, which is in-house, but it's good to cover the cost of even the material and such, around $45.00
  • MAKING The collectible boxes and separate packaging for sets and putting them away too. Material and time cost plus going to print those at a local printer is about $50 
  • SHIPPING which for these isn't much but depending on how it goes can easily rack up, in our experience. $50 cost. 

Oh, you're broke like me? Well then: 

if you want to help, SPREAD THE WORD! Take money out of your mom's wallet and... wait, no... not yet anyway. 

  • Spread the word it means more coming from you than from me! 
  • HIT ALL THE SHARE TOOLS! All the Share tools? ALL THE SHARE TOOLS!!!

story:
GOD SEES EVERYTHING…BUT WHO’S WATCHING HIM?

The time period in which these events took place is not disclosed.  Five very talented and ambitious Scientists asked themselves an age-old question. “Where do our souls go after we die?” The question was posed, not in the esoteric sense, but in a geographical one. They committed themselves to find out the exact physical locations of “Heaven and Hell”. 

However, their research gave them more than they bargained for. What you’re about to experience is a dramatic departure, from the norms of Science Fiction and popular faith-based understandings. The GOD Maps is written by author Yvette Kendall. She delves into the clockworks of the afterworld, by means of creative and disruptive scientific experiments. 

The mediums that the laboratory operates in, are not bound by moral limitations. Not until the line is drawn for them by opposing forces. Located in the sub-level of a well known Ivy League University. The lab is run by Ameerah Mahar, a seasoned Cryptologist.  She is joined by four other accredited scientists. Together they create the fringe science team of Lab-J71. Their ultimate goal is to unlock the mysteries of life, death and God’s reality on a more tangible scale. 

Their research and experiments have opened the Universe to the likes which have never been seen or heard of before. What we once had to wait for, can be experienced today, in real-time. They may be on the verge of witnessing the impossible with their own eyes. 

Science can fill the gaps in extraordinary ways…if you know how to use it! The innovative scientific processes that the team has developed, will not only earn them a place in the history books; but the implications of their findings, will undoubtedly garner them a revised spot in the Good Book as well!

 

Short Summary

My name is Yvette Kendall, I'm from the SouthSide of Chicago and the author of GOD Maps SciFi Series, is a fantasy writer and inventor. GOD Maps is the first in a series of novels that surrounds the fringe scientific team of LAB-J71. The team's leader, Dr. Ameerah Mahar is the head of the lab, therefore the story begins with her. The category in which the series is written is a new sub-genre, "Biblical Fiction/Biblical Futurism". The themes are heavy in Science/Technology-driven Innovations, which are dramatically paired with Religion and Philosophy. The content can be extreme and is filled with quotes that are reminiscent of great minds through history.

The birth of this story conceived another creation. A Comic Book Series that is an adaptation of The GOD Maps. I feel that a Comic Books Series is a natural next-step due to the Superhero/Villain overtones sewn into the novel. I'm especially proud of the cover, since the main character (Dr. Ameerah Mahar) is modeled in my daughter's likeness. You can catch a glimpse of the cover at (www.thegodmaps.com). Many may find my work controversial, but I ask that readers to remember "It's only SciFi!"

Sure....Comic Books are everywhere and done by just about everyone. However, there's one group in particular that is not as well represented as we should be. Women of Color as writers of comic books and appearing as the lead in comic books are slim to none, and I want to change that (with your help).

What We Need & What You Get

The funding that were requesting is straight forward and crystal clear. We need to pay artists, pencilers, inkers, writers for the adaptation, printing and some marketing. That's It & That's All!

For everyone that contributes to this production, we will list them on the last page of the 1st ever edition, with an equally cool Comic Book Character Name (Chosen by you! But no vulgar names please lol). Also an obligatory copy of the 1st edition.

If we don't reach your entire goal, we will take whatever funds achieved and do as much of the work in the book as possible. If need be, we will created a sampler, with less content and images until the full edition can be done properly. Either way, the contributors will still have their names in the book and will receive their copy of the edition.

The Impact We Hope To Have

There's a dynamic story waiting to be told in the fantastic medium of the Comic Book World. Not to mention that this achievement will open up a new universe of content and images, that would enrich our lives exponentially!

Challenges Are Few

We have limited the risks by focusing on the one edition. The other benefit we have is that the newly released literary novel for "The GOD Maps". It's is doing well and people are excited at the fact that a comic book is on the way!

If You Can't Contribute Financially Then We Understand.

That doesn't mean you can't help:

Let's get the word out and make some noise about "The GOD Maps" Comic Book Series.

Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
THE BOOK FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY, FOR EVERYONE

I thank God for those who have already started making their donations, and pray for those who perhaps still not sure about this issue, that they might find faith for it. Look how much around the harmful, hostile information for the human heart and mind. Give yourself a chance, to your children, and especially those who have not yet known God in this world and His way of salvation, to bend again to the source of the pure principles of life in the history of the creation of Christian America. These life-giving principles give health to the mind and body.

I am here for the first time, I have weak English, so I will be glad to any help, advice or suggestion from you. My bad English has nothing to do with translating the manuscript of this book, the translation of the book was done by a professional. The book consists of 260 pages of illustrations.

For a generous investment, there is another PERK FOR $ 30,000, it has a special offer for you. To get it, you need to write to me. All other investors who will make their donations will not suffer from this, but on the contrary they will be guaranteed what I offered in the Perk, which they chosen.

The book will be published even if the "price limit of 50,000" does not reach its goal, but not less than 15,000 dollars. In any case, each investor will be sent the book.
The system is, if donations are at least 15,000 dollars, you get guaranteed one book (shipping is free, you and so paid for it with your donation 300$ selecting Perk - 300 USD). If donations are 35 thousand dollars, then guaranteed - 2 books, and so on.  For me, while it is difficult to calculate, but with this state of affairs, I will be able to guarantee everyone the fulfillment of what is written in the conditions of their chosen Perk, when they make their donation. But I would like the system to be such that those who donate more help those who donate less (from their opportunities), so that they can also have a book. In any case, the whole situation will depend on the sacrifice of everyone.

Oleg Konyk are the author of this a believable historical books in comics, but he is not a professional artist. He has drew this book with the goal to visually convey to their children the true values of American freedom, the birth of the Constitution. So it is based on important historical events took place in the past and will be interesting for both children and their parents, and youth.

The content of this whole book is filled with spiritual reflections about salvation, preaching about Christ and His sacrifice.

The author this book reveals the confrontation of religious intolerance of the old world that moved to the American Continent against the new world of religious freedom, equality and fraternity living in the heart of the main hero of the book - John Conor.

The prototype of the book's hero became Roger Williams (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Williams) and Joseph Wolf (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Wolff).

In 2005 the book was published in St. Petersburg in Russian for the money of one sponsor who heard from the author of this book the good news of God and invested 25 thousand dollars in this project.

Now this book is sold both in Ukraine and in Russia.

1. Russia: http://vcennosti.ru/brat-velikogo-duha-roman-v-...

2. Ukraine: http://knigionline.com/catalog/knigi/hudozhestv...

Sorry! My name is Andrew. I am a friend of author of the book Oleg Konyk. I live in Ukraine.

I intend to publish the book through the service: https://www.bookbaby.com/

For me personally, this draft book was never a project from which I would like to benefit. I want children, young people, and especially their parents, to have in their hands a serious and inspired work for the upbringing of their offspring.

See the video with a brief content of the book and let God bless you and arrange your heart to make this book project come true in the English-speaking world!

Photo Excursion
___________________________________________________
Approximately 2003. The author with images files of the book:



Work on the book:



 Kiev, TV studio "The House of Living Histories":



My son in the process make-up of this book:



"The Legends of the Wild Field" (my second book) This book about the "Great Northern War" betwen Sweden and Russia. (1700-1721) The book is not yet ready... Oleg Konyk ©:

 

Little bit history...

I want to share with you the story about my friend, who now serves in the Ukrainian army as a volunteer in a war with Russia.

In the 80s, this man, his name is Oleg Konyk (the surname from the Ukrainian sounds like a Horse), was an ordinary country boy, but in the eyes of local residents, he was also a rebel and leader of peers similar to him. His father had a criminal record. Mother was an ordinary woman who loved her son and raised her in a spirit of freedom, as she it understood.

In the 1990s, when the "Iron Curtain" collapsed between the West and the Soviet Union, for the people of this large, multinational country, appeared a possible to taste the values of a closed world for us. For some people this became opportunity to leave abroad, for others who have experienced spiritual hunger - this is an opportunity to get acquainted with the Bible, with a book that was forbidden in every way.

At that time Oleg was already married and had the first child is Andrew. Once he have heard a Christian preacher and was fascinated by the nature of that life, which the Bible spoke about and eventually became a preacher in a small church in the city of Skadovsk (this is on the "Black Sea"). Gradually, in his mind has grown the idea to convey to their children the history of real, non-Hollywood heroes who are not with a sword in their hands, but

"through faith subdued kingdoms, wrought righteousness, obtained promises, stopped the mouths of lions, quenched the violence of fire, escaped the edge of the sword, the aliens ... others were tortured, not accepting deliverance; that they could have got a better resurrection: And others had a trial of cruel mockings and scourgings, yea, and of bonds and imprisonment: They were stoned, they were sawn asunder, they were tempted, they were slain with the sword: they were wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins; being destitute, afflicted, tormented; Of whom the world was not worthy: they were wandered in deserts, and in mountains, and in dens and caves of the earth. And these all, having received a good report through faith, received with some better things for us, that they should not be made perfect "(He.11: 33-40).

About these heroes told the Bible, such a hero was Christ himself - the eternal God, who became a man. But Oleg, wanted to discover for his children are Andrew and Vitale, more modern Christian heroes and since he was a little bit able on drawing, he decided to start creating a book that, along with the growth of his children every day opened a new page of Christian-American history. The basis of the narrative was taken by real Christian heroes who, with the feat of their lives, in love of God, in the true principles of life and in the love of freedom, laid the foundations of the American Constitution. Basically, it's Roger Williams, the founder of the State of Rhode Island, and a Jewish Christian Joseph Wolf, who in his childhood was expelled from the house for believing in Christ. He became a great missionary traveler who carried the knowledge of God in that corners of the earth, which he could achieve by his travels. Eventually, in August 1837, Wolff arrived in New York, and in Washington under President John Adams, he delivered a sermon in the US Congress on the Sabbath day.

But the book tells a little about them at the end only, giving a conception to readers about those heroes whose life became the inspiration for the creation of the main character of the book John Conor. This is a collected character in the life story whom other heroes of the faith are reflected also, the Puritans, who fled to Holland at first and then to America because of persecution of the English crown and the Anglican church, which showed intolerance to people who more trusted the sacred Scripture than the decrees of the church, which by force of civil law forced people to believe in God.

The book is called "The Great Spirit's Brother" because the hero of the book John will have many meetings with the Indians, live with them and talk about the biblical God who became the Brother for all people and that those Englishmen who crossed the ocean with the cross in their hands, but oppressing the natives of the American land, not treating them with due respect, cutting down their forests and destroying the bisons, they do not carry the true Light of God.

Oleg loved horses from his childhood, and also read books related to stories about Indians, so in his book some part of the Christian history of the great country of America and his love for Indian culture have come together. Everyone who has already read this book received strong impressions from the book. The book "The Great Spirit's Brother" was published in Russian in 2006, but in our environment, it did not get proper propagation. Nobody did this. I decided to resume this project ten years later. I translated this book into English for my own money. My son made a book layout (make-up) to prepare it for printing. Now all the hope for God, to His wise providence to find sponsors for the publication of this book, and most importantly its spread there wherever people speak English.

I started the project of this book for the sake of my friend Oleg, the author of this story. And not only, the book really deserves attention. At some point, he desperate, meeting certain disappointments on the way... Oleg volunteered for the army. I with a prayer to God began to promote the project of his book, which was create by Oleg for 6 years, to show him that God lives... I know and I believe that this book will spread. It is important for children, young people, and for all who believe in the value of true freedom that God has given to people.

I'm looking for people who could help in any capacity. I know that God has all the possibilities for this, but He for our own sake does not want to do what we have to do on our own. This is the law of life.

Thanks for watching!

story:
The SAV - is a Native American spirit warrior who's tribe was massacred in the late 1870's by Army soldiers but before he became "The Sav" he was Kohl of the Forest. Kohl was raised by grizzly bears after his tribes demise until the day him and his grizzly brothers faced off against the Alpha bear which ended with Kohl and his oldest brother dying by the Claws of the Alpha bear... but it wasn't Kohl's time to meet his maker, instead the spirit apparition of his tribes fallen chief appeared, embracing Kohl's soul and turning his energy into a seed to plant in the blood soaked soil where his fallen tribe was massacred... the tree grew over 100 feet tall with the cocoon of "The Sav" growing inside of tree, but then on a quite day in the forest the tree suddenly exploded like a bomb freeing "The Sav" and releasing him into the crazy world to watch over his people and their sacred lands. (READ HIS ORGINS STORY IN ISSUE #1)
 

 
 Sistine The Sick​ - is a blood thirsty tyrant with a powerful dimension shattering ancient artifact in his possession connected to one of the most monstrous entities in the universe.  Sistine hails from the Black Sands Kingdom in central Africa, a place they say is hotter then the depths of hell.  

A PREVIEW OF FINISHED PAGES FROM THIS ISSUE!



THE CREATIVE TEAM

Javan Jordan aka Illest Uminati - I'm a national touring Hip-Hop artist (www.illestuminati.com) and a long time Comic Book enthusiast.  As far as comics goes I was heavily influenced by Todd McFarlane's Spawn, Mike Mignola's Hellboy and Early 90's Image Comics.  I wrote my first comic book in 2015 that resulted in the successful Kickstarter campaign for "The Sav" issue #1.  I wrote the script for this issue, and teamed up with African artist Chinedu Campbell.

Chinedu Campbell -  is a comic book artist hailing from Lagos, Nigeria


STRETCH GOALS

THE COVERS!

  Main Cover by: Rafael Flores

 Mignola Homage Cover by: Matteo Santos

 Hulk 181 Homage Cover by: Aury Arts

With your pledge not only will you get this brand new One shot issue “The Sav vs Sistine The Sick” but you will be helping us get the ball rolling in a major way on the art for the next 3 issues of The Sav's origin story arc (already written) returning back to Montana in 1890’s where the original fully funded Kickstarter issue #1 left off!

Risks and challenges

There is very minimal risks with backing this project! This One Shot issue is already finished and ready to hit the printers so we can get it in your hands a few weeks after this Campaign ends... P.S. the next 3 issues for the 4 part origins arc are already written and ready to be sent to the artist!

story:
CHROMOSOME 96

A group of scientists give hunt to an anthropomorphic virus, that mutated and escaped from one of their bold experiments. Aided by an array of exotic and lethal beings the clock is ticking not only for the geneticists, but as the virus becomes more dangerous and more powerful, for the whole of Mankind.

So What's The Pitch?

CHROMOSOME 96 is an over the top thrill ride filled with super-human antics, monstrous creatures and  multilayered characters. There's no time to stop and discuss current affairs or other boring matters. It's all edgy fun and classic comic book action from beginning to end. As the arc progresses not everything is as it first seemed, and by the end of the series you will be truly surprised not only by the plot twists, but at the new way you'll reread the whole story. 

But Who Am I?

My name is Miguel Ferreira (AKA Lewis Michael) and this is my creation. I've also doubled as penciller and inker. Colours by Ross A Campbell. I have toiled away since the early nineties in indie and underground comics. Now I want to offer something more commercial and super exciting. CHROMOSOME 96 is that book!

Any Risks? And What Are The Funds For?

This crowdfunding will cover a first high quality print run plus all the work done on this issue. There won't be much waiting time once the campaign is over as the book is complete and ready for print. Neither for the exciting follow ups, as issue #2 is in the last stages of colours and lettering, while #3 inks are almost done. Issues #4 and #5 pencils are being worked back to back.

All issues put together work as one long graphic novel, but this is also a concept book with each chapter stylized in a different fashion. With the same amount of fun and high quality throughout.

Now all we need is YOU to become a fan and order your copy. Or copies. Guaranteed you'll love them. If we go above our funding goal not only there will be surprise stretch goals, but you'll also be helping the ongoing work on the next issues.

 An Extra Reason To Support Our Book

 While big publishers are producing mostly boring stories that are more concerned with pushing one agenda or another, we believe in creating an ultra fun adventure, with no restrictions in narrative and complex but grounded characters. Our story takes bold and unexpected turns and the art is off the wall and full of soul. The objective is to offer a great book you can indulge in over and over again, instead of the copy and pasted tomes on the shelves of rapidly closing down comics shops. 

Time to shine a spotlight on the underdogs!

 

The Perks

 Because this is my first campaign all perks are kept simple and as affordable as possible, mailed in back boarded envelopes:

  • At £3 you get the digital version of the full colour comic. Done deal!
  • At £8 and you get the digital version AND the print version. Both full colour.
  • Back that down a bit- for £6- and it's the digital colour version + a print version of the book in black & white. This one has no text, just the art. It's a version for true aficionados of the medium. 
  • At £13 you'll be getting both colour versions ( print and digital ) + a print of your choice- these are glossy mini-posters 8x11 inches- for you to choose from: print of issue #1 front OR back cover. OR an amazing poster with most of the characters squeezed in.

  • For £25- Digital format of both colour and B&W versions, a print copy of the colour version, 2 mini-posters of your choice and a bookmark.

  • Top perk at £40 you'll get everything: the digital versions (colour and B&W), the print copies (colour and B&W), the 3 mini-posters in splendorous colours (all 8x11in), bookmark +exclusive sticker AND a digital sneak peak at issue #2. A special thank you letter will also be in the envelope.

 If we are lucky to hit a stride I will certainly add new perks with planned merchandise such as baseball caps representing our fictitious teams (heavily featured on issue #1), badges, trading cards (plenty of great characters to collect in here) plus other surprises. We will get to those if and when that moment arrives. But be sure that any new addition will definitely be unique and awesome.

Mini-Prints (8x11 inches) to choose from: Front Cover; Back Cover; Characters Poster

 

And now get a refreshment, seat back and check out some pages of the finished book:

 

 

And A Bit More Just For You

As this book will be offered in both colour and black and white versions, here's some more pages of inks only:

 

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR TAKING AN INTEREST IN OUR PAGE. IF YOU LIKE WHAT YOU SEE AND HAVE THE TIME, GIVE US A SHOUT OUT ON YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA. EVERY SUPPORT IS TRULY APPRECIATED.

HAVE A WONDERFUL DAY!
story_txt:
CHROMOSOME 96A group of scientists give hunt to an anthropomorphic virus, that mutated and escaped from one of their bold experiments. Aided by an array of exotic and lethal beings the clock is ticking not only for the geneticists, but as the virus becomes more dangerous and more powerful, for the whole of Mankind.So What's The Pitch?CHROMOSOME 96 is an over the top thrill ride filled with super-human antics, monstrous creatures and  multilayered characters. There's no time to stop and discuss current affairs or other boring matters. It's all edgy fun and classic comic book action from beginning to end. As the arc progresses not everything is as it first seemed, and by the end of the series you will be truly surprised not only by the plot twists, but at the new way you'll reread the whole story. But Who Am I?My name is Miguel Ferreira (AKA Lewis Michael) and this is my creation. I've also doubled as penciller and inker. Colours by Ross A Campbell. I have toiled away since the early nineties in indie and underground comics. Now I want to offer something more commercial and super exciting. CHROMOSOME 96 is that book!Any Risks? And What Are The Funds For?This crowdfunding will cover a first high quality print run plus all the work done on this issue. There won't be much waiting time once the campaign is over as the book is complete and ready for print. Neither for the exciting follow ups, as issue #2 is in the last stages of colours and lettering, while #3 inks are almost done. Issues #4 and #5 pencils are being worked back to back.All issues put together work as one long graphic novel, but this is also a concept book with each chapter stylized in a different fashion. With the same amount of fun and high quality throughout.Now all we need is YOU to become a fan and order your copy. Or copies. Guaranteed you'll love them. If we go above our funding goal not only there will be surprise stretch goals, but you'll also be helping the ongoing work on the next issues. An Extra Reason To Support Our Book While big publishers are producing mostly boring stories that are more concerned with pushing one agenda or another, we believe in creating an ultra fun adventure, with no restrictions in narrative and complex but grounded characters. Our story takes bold and unexpected turns and the art is off the wall and full of soul. The objective is to offer a great book you can indulge in over and over again, instead of the copy and pasted tomes on the shelves of rapidly closing down comics shops. Time to shine a spotlight on the underdogs! The Perks Because this is my first campaign all perks are kept simple and as affordable as possible, mailed in back boarded envelopes:
At £3 you get the digital version of the full colour comic. Done deal!
At £8 and you get the digital version AND the print version. Both full colour.
Back that down a bit- for £6- and it's the digital colour version + a print version of the book in black & white. This one has no text, just the art. It's a version for true aficionados of the medium. 
At £13 you'll be getting both colour versions ( print and digital ) + a print of your choice- these are glossy mini-posters 8x11 inches- for you to choose from: print of issue #1 front OR back cover. OR an amazing poster with most of the characters squeezed in.
For £25- Digital format of both colour and B&W versions, a print copy of the colour version, 2 mini-posters of your choice and a bookmark.
Top perk at £40 you'll get everything: the digital versions (colour and B&W), the print copies (colour and B&W), the 3 mini-posters in splendorous colours (all 8x11in), bookmark +exclusive sticker AND a digital sneak peak at issue #2. A special thank you letter will also be in the envelope.
 If we are lucky to hit a stride I will certainly add new perks with planned merchandise such as baseball caps representing our fictitious teams (heavily featured on issue #1), badges, trading cards (plenty of great characters to collect in here) plus other surprises. We will get to those if and when that moment arrives. But be sure that any new addition will definitely be unique and awesome.Mini-Prints (8x11 inches) to choose from: Front Cover; Back Cover; Characters Poster And now get a refreshment, seat back and check out some pages of the finished book:  And A Bit More Just For YouAs this book will be offered in both colour and black and white versions, here's some more pages of inks only: THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR TAKING AN INTEREST IN OUR PAGE. IF YOU LIKE WHAT YOU SEE AND HAVE THE TIME, GIVE US A SHOUT OUT ON YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA. EVERY SUPPORT IS TRULY APPRECIATED. HAVE A WONDERFUL DAY!

story:
The Story -

A dead body.

A stolen map.

A notorious outlaw.

A thorny situation for some, but for Sheriff Mark Pendleton it's Tuesday. He's used to murders and claim jumping in Hexwood but the murder of Sam Jenkins quickly turns into more than he bargained for. Frank Dugan and the Red Band Gang, the most successful train robbers in the West, are on his doorstep and up to some sort of mischief.

And unfortunately for Mark a big name like Frank Dugan won't keep lesser bad men away. Even as he chases Dugan's gang and tries to unravel his plans things in Hexwood are going badly awry. With only two deputies he's short handed and behind the ball. Something's bound to give.

Life is never easy for a small town in the West. But if Mark can't get things sorted out there'll be nothing left of Hexwood save dust and ashes.

Hexwood: Dust and Ashes is a simple tale of magic and vengeance in the Columbian West. It brings you action, adventure and the promise of bigger things to come! Dust and Ashes is the first of the three parts of the Hexwood story and offers 85 pages of story.

I'm Nate Chen, a life long story teller and artist. I've spent the last decade and a half writing stories and drawing illustrations to go with them. This is my first attempt at drafting illustrations for a full length story and I hope you're willing to invest in it with me. If you're curious what the story will look like, here's the cover and first eleven pages of raw art for your viewing satisfaction (art and lettering is not final):

What We Need & What You Get

Hexwood: Dust and Ashes is fully written and drawn, all funding collected in this campaign will go towards printing costs for final perks and funding the next portion of the story. In the event that this campaign doesn't reach its goal all contributions will be refunded.

As this is my first campaign I'm keeping perks as simple as I can. There are two perks just for books - you can get a single book or buy two at a time to save on shipping, if you and a buddy want to go together and save a few bucks that way. There's also a perk that adds the wanted poster for Stovepipe Nick, and a perk that includes the poster and a hand drawn sketch by yours truly of a character from the book, drawn on the inside of the front cover.

The Impact

The lifeblood of culture today is independent media. It's where all the great, creative and entertaining stuff is happening and I hope to contribute my own thrilling tales and join the growing indie movement to revitalize our pop culture and entertainment.

Risks & Challenges

As all the art and writing is finished the only major risks in this project come from mistakes in business along the way. Fortunately I have wonderful friends like Narwhal of 499 fame who have offered me advice and will, hopefully, keep me from the worst mistakes. At the worst I'd hope the biggest dangers of this campaign would be the campaign fulfilling 6 months overdue and I hope that the time I've built into this campaign will let me avoid those possibilities.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute please share this on all your social media platforms! Every little bit of word of mouth helps.

story:
DORK EMPIRE INK publishes wall to wall action adventure comics! We've been described as '90's Image with better writing.' Our goal is FUN ENTERTAINMENT.

It's in our motto: 'MAKING COMICS FUN AGAIN!' We have a shared universe spanning two distinct eras featuring the MODERN ERA with AGENT WILD and the 2308 FUTURE ERA with REAPER CORPS.  Now, we introduce our newest future era book...

NOTE: This book was fully funded on Kickstarter and will head to the printer shortly after this campaign ends.

 

STORY

The year is 2308. Dreadlock and his crew traverse an unforgiving desert landscape of  a war torn plant Earth. What's left of the nearly extinct human race resides in three Mega Cities, 'protected' by a race of sentient cyborg warriors known  as the Reaper Corps. A cyborg army that saved mankind from total annihilation at the hands of the alien Zartori Empire.

Society now consists on Humans, Cyborgs and Cloned humans who, like the Cyborgs were created by the artificial intelligent named FATHER, as soldiers in the inter galactic BORDER WAR with the Zartori. Now, 80 years into Mankind and Earths rebuild, the cyborg protectors have become more like human jailers leading thousands of humans to flee the mega cities to create their own, cyborg free, settlements out in what was later coined The New West.

Neither hero nor villain, Dreadlock lives by his own rules. Yearning to express his human individuality. Control his own destiny. Living free, in search of adventure! Heaven help anyone who gets in his way. NOTE" Reaper Corps #0 is available in this campaign.

THE CREW

Don Walker - insta@don_spaceknight

Publisher at Dork Empire ink. Creator, writer, penciler of Agent Wild, Reaper Corps and now Dreadlock the Barbarian. He's also one of the Co-Founders of the nationwide comic creator group, The Sketchy Bug Group (est.2012). The groups mission is to create and celebrate all things comics. All that and he still finds time to be a husband and Dad.

Silas Dixon - Inks

Jeff Graham - Inks

Bryan Valenza - Colors

Robert Nugent - Colors

Ed Dukeshire - Letters

My crew and I love making comics. Fun comics. Comics for comics sake and between us there's nearly 30 years of experience. We know what we're doing and that's giving you a kick-butt action adventure comic that's GUARANTEED to come out because again, we've already been funded.

This is the 'in case you missed it the first time' campaign.

FUNDING

Again, we've been funded and this campaign if for those of you who missed the first one, BUT, while this campaign is stripped down with less rewards, most of the good ones are still present as well as a NEW variant cover by MIKE GUSTOVICH (Creator, writer, illustrator of the 80's and 90's hit, The Justice Machine, Comic Comics, Innovation). If we hit $1,500, we'll unlock that variant for ALL backers at a physical reward.

Funding will also be used for rewards and shipping of this campaigns backers.

REWARD HIGHLIGHTS

DREADLOCK cvr (A) by DON WALKER

DREADLOCK cvr (B) Virgin pencils variant. Cvr featuring Don Walker's pencils, sans logos.

(6) 4" x 6" trading card set featuring Dreadlock and crew.

REAPER CORPS #0. Dreadlock's 'brother' book. Both books share the future era timeline of the Dork Empire Ink universe.

AGENT WILD #0 and AGENT WILD #1. Our lead 'modern era' book.

Original 11x17 penciled pgs. There will be 10 pgs for the book up for grabs.

DREADLOCK  preview pgs

REAPER CORPS #0 (ONE-SHOT) preview pgs

AGENT WILD #1 (OF 5) preview pgs

WHO'S WITH US? You want FUN COMICS? We've got you!! Pledge, SHARE!!! Share's are worth their weight in gold!!

 

Risks & Challenges

Life. While we have the best intentions life can get in the way, slow down and sometimes hualt production. We've got a huge head start so we don't think that will be an issue. Again, we're already funded. The campaign is 'gravy.'

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Outside of pledging, SHARING, SHARING and SHARING on all your social medias. Don't let your friends miss out on a sure thing.

story:
"The Leaf of Lost Dreams"

Hello everyone, I'm C. B. Alan. I'm a comic artist from Georgia. I've been working on this comic for the past three years and over 2500 hours, and now I'm ready to bring it to life. 

I love the comic book medium, and by contributing to this campaign you will be helping me achieve a life long dream. This comic is my way of giving back to a community that has meant so much to me. I hope to one day inspire others with my works the way I was inspired by all the great artists before me. 

The story will focus on a young woman who seeks to avenge her brother's death, but finds herself swept into an adventure she didn't expect. How can she achieve her goal of finding justice for her brother while also contending with the threat she has attracted to her? Can she overcome her loss? What is the "Leaf of Lost Dreams"? 

You can expect lots of action, intrigue, and mystery on this journey, as well as plenty of wonderful heroic fantasy goodness. I hope you are looking forward to it! 

 

 

Why your donation is important

I can't bring this comic to life without you. I understand that you have many choices for where your money goes. I want you to know that this comic means the world to me and I'm committed to making it happen. So if you can't make a donation today I understand. I'll still be here at the end of the campaign if you decide you would like to donate. Thank you! 

Please share this campaign with your friends and relatives. Everyone is welcome here. 

 

 

What You Will Get

My goal for this comic is 10K. I chose fixed funding so that means that this is an all or nothing deal. If I don't hit my goal, I get nothing. If I make it, you get 1000 pages of heroic fantasy adventure, plus you will get the perk you donated for. I want this to succeed so that it can benefit all of you lovely people who have donated. A story in my head isn't as fun as a story that is shared with others. This is why I need your donation as well as for you to share this campaign. If you love the comic medium like I do then let's make this comic a reality so it can be enjoyed by as many people as possible.

It always fun to have someone to share with, right?  

 

 

I Don't Love Art 

Wait, what? Is that a mistake? Nope. That isn't a mistake. I don't love art. I'm in love with art, and I'm going to take art out to a restaurant and tell it that so it won't cause a scene. It's a reverse break up! 

Art isn't my hobby, or something I only kinda care about. It's something I'm in love with. It's a necessity. Like breathing air, or drinking water, or eating food. I have to create art to survive, and I want to create this comic for you. I want to funnel the passion I have for art into something I can share with all of you. Will you join me on this artistic endeavor? 

Let's make this comic a reality! 

 

 

Thank you very much!

story:
The graphic novel will be between 140-150 pages long

100 pages have been inked so far

86 have been colored

All the writing, pencils, inks and colors are done by me (Floran Bailey)

The story is predominantly NSFW (gore) and intended for a mature audience. 

If you like psychological thrillers, detective stories, cop dramas, transgressive fiction and high-concept sci-fi then this story is for you. This will be book one in an ongoing series.

If you're primarily into mainstream milktoast comics, my hope is that this will be an enjoyable breath of fresh air. The story was loosely inspired by Those Who Walk Away from Omelas by Ursula Le Guin.

https://www.utilitarianism.com/nu/omelas.pdf

I don't like watering things down to appeal to morality police so I'll understand if some of you find aspects of the story offensive. Life is offensive. And what is art if not a distorted reflection?

That being said don't expect pure unadulterated grim-dark cynicism. That shit gets old pretty quick lol.

Since this is my first attempt at writing, inking and coloring so much as a 4 panel comic strip, expect the art style to change and improve a bit throughout the book. I'm still refining my craft.

Since the first book is mostly done any profit will go towards taking time off to work on the next book. (Ideally I'll crank that out next summer.)

Here are some more black and white pages. I do all the ink traditionally and scan it into the computer where I color it digitally in corel painter.

 

No particular order. Just trying to find pages that don't give too much away.

story:
The Golden Age of Comics Return to the Modern Era!

Legendary comic book writer Chuck Dixon (Batman, Birds of Prey, Airboy) is joined by writers Clint Stoker (Downcast) and David Furr (Exciting Comics, Crimson Scorpion) in this revival of a golden age classic. Thrilling Comics: Murder and Mayhem  features three full length stories, each one inspired by the heroes of the 1940's, with art by Preston Avesedo (Rockabilly Road Trip, Jungle Comics) and Jospeh Olesco (Exciting Comics, Crimson Scorpion) in a 72 page graphic novel.

Painting by Preston Avesedo
 

Cover by Karl Moline
 

Cat in Black page by Joseph Olesco and Gerilou Smith

Black Terror

Story by David Furr and art by Preston Avesedo

Decades after his death the Black Terror is back, but now he is terrorizing the very city he once swore to protect and the only person who can stop him is... the Black Terror???  Who are these two Black Terrors, and what are they after?  The mystery begins to unfold in 'Twice the Terror!'

 

Cat in Black

Story by Chuck Dixon and art by Joseph Olesco

'Murder in Turnaround!'  Actress Linda Allen has just landed the role of a lifetime playing  the famed comic book superhero Cat in Black.  But as members of the film crew are murdered one-by-one fiction blurs into reality.  Is Linda the next target?  The only way to find out and stop the killer is for her to step into the role and become the true Cat in Black.

 

Silver Streak

Story by Clint Stoker and art by Preston Avesedo

'Precious Metals'  Just weeks after Silver Streak rose from the grave with super-human abilities he's on the trail of a criminal cult obsessed with silver. He's hunting for answers while being haunted by his old life. Even if his new-found speed and strength don't fail him, his fragile psyche is about to meet it's match in a new enemy. 

$15,000 STRETCH GOAL- New perks to be added.

$20,000 STRETCH GOAL - A new 24 page story written by IndieGoGo comic book superstar Von Klaus, featuring the Black Terror, will be added bringing the total page count to 96 full color pages!! 

$40,000 STRETCH GOAL- A new 24 page story starring the Heap will be added bringing the total page count to 120 full color pages!! Written by Shannon Smith and drawn by Dell Barras.

New stretch goals to be added as needed.

Silver Streak page by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith

 

Black Terror splash page by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith

 

Cat in Black panel by Joseph Olesco and Gerilou Smith

Exclusive and very limited manga style print by artist Ben Dunn (available only with deluxe perk bundles)

 

Pencils by Preston Avesedo

 

Black Terror panels by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith
story_txt: The Golden Age of Comics Return to the Modern Era!Legendary comic book writer Chuck Dixon (Batman, Birds of Prey, Airboy) is joined by writers Clint Stoker (Downcast) and David Furr (Exciting Comics, Crimson Scorpion) in this revival of a golden age classic. Thrilling Comics: Murder and Mayhem  features three full length stories, each one inspired by the heroes of the 1940's, with art by Preston Avesedo (Rockabilly Road Trip, Jungle Comics) and Jospeh Olesco (Exciting Comics, Crimson Scorpion) in a 72 page graphic novel.Painting by Preston Avesedo Cover by Karl Moline Cat in Black page by Joseph Olesco and Gerilou SmithBlack TerrorStory by David Furr and art by Preston AvesedoDecades after his death the Black Terror is back, but now he is terrorizing the very city he once swore to protect and the only person who can stop him is... the Black Terror???  Who are these two Black Terrors, and what are they after?  The mystery begins to unfold in 'Twice the Terror!' Cat in BlackStory by Chuck Dixon and art by Joseph Olesco'Murder in Turnaround!'  Actress Linda Allen has just landed the role of a lifetime playing  the famed comic book superhero Cat in Black.  But as members of the film crew are murdered one-by-one fiction blurs into reality.  Is Linda the next target?  The only way to find out and stop the killer is for her to step into the role and become the true Cat in Black. Silver StreakStory by Clint Stoker and art by Preston Avesedo'Precious Metals'  Just weeks after Silver Streak rose from the grave with super-human abilities he's on the trail of a criminal cult obsessed with silver. He's hunting for answers while being haunted by his old life. Even if his new-found speed and strength don't fail him, his fragile psyche is about to meet it's match in a new enemy. $15,000 STRETCH GOAL- New perks to be added.$20,000 STRETCH GOAL - A new 24 page story written by IndieGoGo comic book superstar Von Klaus, featuring the Black Terror, will be added bringing the total page count to 96 full color pages!! $40,000 STRETCH GOAL- A new 24 page story starring the Heap will be added bringing the total page count to 120 full color pages!! Written by Shannon Smith and drawn by Dell Barras.New stretch goals to be added as needed.Silver Streak page by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith Black Terror splash page by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith Cat in Black panel by Joseph Olesco and Gerilou SmithExclusive and very limited manga style print by artist Ben Dunn (available only with deluxe perk bundles) Pencils by Preston Avesedo Black Terror panels by Preston Avesedo and Shannon Smith

story:
The Story

The tech-savvy Martians have been repelled! All is back to normal on the savage, jungle world of Venus! Or is it?

Taking place not long after the events in Mars Invades Venus, Mandika of the Mountain Tribe soon finds herself thrust into an adventure that will test her bravery and skill as a warrior!

Amazon of Venus is the brainchild of Canadian Writer/Artist Larry Nadolsky. The book has been edited and lettered by Mark Stanislawski, who publishes it under his Good Ideas Comics self-publishing banner.

This is a 52 page black & white book with a color cover. Similar to Mars Invades Venus, this book comes with 7 pin-up illustrations by Larry Nadolsky included within the book! After these copies sell out, any further printings will NOT have these pin-ups! This is a Kickstarter exclusive!

And...

As an additional reward tier, we are offering print AND digital copies of Mars Invades Venus! These copies will contain the pin-ups from the first Kickstarter book! If you missed out on MIV the first time, now is your chance to get BOTH chapters at the same time!

The book DOES contain nudity so be aware and please be over 18!

Our First Campaign!

Mars Invades Venus blasted the doors off Kickstarter for Good Ideas Comics, garnering  118 backers and raising almost $2500! Such great support begged for a sequel!

And here it is!

Creator Larry Nadolsky brings us back to wild, dangerous Venus! He expands on the world he created with the first book, showing us new creatures, new areas and new history on this fantastical world! Check out these fantastic (censored) pages below!

Stretch Goals

Every physical backer will receive a cool Amazon of Venus die-cut sticker! Look below for the (censored) design!

All physical backers will get a second mini print! This one by Peter (AKAPAD) DeLuca! You can catch Peter on YouTube (AKAPAD) & Instagram (akapad13)!

If we can get to $2400, every physical backer will receive a special Good Ideas Comics coaster! I'm looking at 80 pt pulpboard coaster! The design is below! Some place you can set your drink on while reading some great comics!

EPILOGUE

As you can see, Larry Nadolsky is a talent and one we are excited to have working with Good Ideas Comics! Make sure to follow us on  Facebook  (https://www.facebook.com/GoodIdeasComics/)&nbsp... visit www.goodideascomics.com where we usually post exclusive stuff not seen anywhere else!

Thanks for reading comics and thanks for liking Good Ideas Comics because if it's from us, then it MUST be a good idea!

Risks & Challenges

The book is done!

This is Good Ideas Comics first foray into Indiegogo. We realize that some people prefer one crowdfunding platform over another and we don't want to leave ANYONE out! The only risk is if we don't reach our goal, but, I believe we can not only reach our goal, but completely crush it!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back us, that's okay. Spread the word about this great project. Share the url, talk us up! Every little bit helps! We would appreciate it!

story:
Hi, I am Yaddar.


 

  • Some (most... all) of you SURELY have no idea who am I, so here's a quick introduction:
    I am a Mexican freelance Industrial  designer, photographer, illustrator, writer and artist.
    I've worked in 3D design and modelling as well as animation and book writing.
    I've pitched ideas to Cartoon Nework and I will be working on a 1 minute pilot to show them.

    ...but most importanly, I really like to make Polandball comics, to the point I've been lucky enough to win some Hussar wings at /r/Polandball (specially lucky given how many talented comic creators are within the Polandball community) and have some of my comics translated into many languages. (well, like 3 or 4 languages, tops).

    You can find my Polandball comics IN HERE:


    (Art Sample)
     

  • So... WHAT is Polandball?

    Polandball is a webcomic genere that focuses on Political satire where the characters are balls that represent countries (or states or regions) and it uses a very absurd and silly sense of humor. Since everyone can join into Polandball comicmaking, the stories range from the most realistic and serious and thought-provoking stories to the most nonsensical or political incorrect or fantastic.


    (Another sample of my artstyle)

    That's why, given how passionate I am about Polandball comics in general, (and also a history nerd/aficionado) I'd really like to put all that nerdiness into a Graphic novel about the most dark of all Europe's ages... the Dark Ages.

    "Yaddar's World History: The Dark Ages (Polandball Style)" is meant to be a (semi-educative), humorous take on the history of Europe, from AD 1 to AD 1,000, the millenia where the Roman Empire fell and Europe was REALLY not a very nice place to live.
    Without Rome, there were no safe roads (or even roads at all), without roads there was no commerce, without commerce there was no progess and everyone just descended into darkness.

    The Book will cover history events such as:

  • The Barbarian invations and the Fall or Rome
  • The Gothic Kingdoms
  • The Muslim invations of Iberia
  • The Invations form the North and the East
  • The Rise of the Franks
  • The Holy Roman Empire
  • The Transition to the late middle ages

    All with the characteristic silly Polandball Humor along with the best art I can make.

    Since this is a flexible-goal campaign, two complementary side-projects will also be funded:
  • A mini Comic about the Vandals and how they went from humble beginings being abused by everyone to ending up traumatizing Rome forever before claiming Carthage.
  • A Comic about the very Scoruge of God, The Huns! and how they manage to almost wipe out Europe... at least on the minds of everyone.

    The preliminary script for the book contemplates around 80 pages, (plus the pages of the Vandals and Huns Comics) but the project might as well go up to 100... it's a large graphic novel covering a lot of history!

    With your help, you'll be able to help me making this book a reality, with some cool perks and rewards in return. 


    (Another Art Sample, of course the book will be set on the Dark Ages and may or may not include Zero figher planes.)
 

Where does the money go.

 
  • Well, as a freelance living in Mexico, sometimes is quite hard to spend a lot of time in a project that is not essential to, you know,luxury stuff like eating and paying bills.
    So the goal of 6,000 USD would REALLY help to achieve 4 things:
    1.- Helping me with those luxury goods like food and services for a few months (5-7 months) so I can get to work in the book full time without having to hunt for other projects.
    2.- Upgrade to a propper PC so I would be able to work on something better than an Intel 2Ghz with 4 RAM (sigh).
    3.- Helping fund the printing  of the book and other rewards for those who donate the reward ammount stated in the rewards tier.
    4.- Covering the Fees of the campaign.

    Rewards and Goals.

 

(Another Art Sample, featuring China and Japan... I really like swords and stuff)
 

Risks and Challenges:

 
  •  While I am confident in my ability to write and draw a comic, (as well as my obsessive level of historical research), this is still my first crowdfunding project, so it might be a bit of a learning curve at the begining to learn how indiegogo works and it also might a bit of time to set a specific time for completion and delivery, which at the moment I'm setting for mid-2018.

    But as long as I keep my backers updated and open to feedback and/or suggestions, I am positive all the challenges will be conquered.

     (yet another Art Sample)

    I have less money than Greece, how can I help?
     
  • Any dollar helps, it really does, but in the case you don't have the oportunity to contribute, there is still a GREAT way you can help, and that is by sharing this project with all your friends, family, your dog's vet, your coworkers, people on campus, random people on Twitter or Facebook, with that crazy guy at the supermarket, your neighbors, broadcast it into space for aliens to see.

    Any share would be also deeply appreciated, and don't forget to tell your friends to share it as well.

    That is all... I think... (I will keep updating and imporving the project page).

    Thank you!

Any dollar helps, it really does, but in the case you don't have the oportunity to contribute, there is still a GREAT way you can help, and that is by sharing this project with all your friends, family, your dog's vet, your coworkers, people on campus, random people on Twitter or Facebook, with that crazy guy at the supermarket, your neighbors, broadcast it into space for aliens to see.Any share would be also deeply appreciated, and don't forget to tell your friends to share it as well.That is all... I think... story:
We have partnered with Japanese comic writer and creative director Akihiro Miyazaki to create an epic universe of dark and medieval fantasy that is inspired by many of his comics but with an American vision and subtle touches in the Japanese style. Darkness for Honor is the first of a planned trilogy that follows Aron on his journey through this ruthless universe. A work published only in Japan with limited editions, now expands to the world. This is an epic story full of universal themes, universe, its ancient medieval universe and a lot of fantasy that reminds us of our good friend J. R. R. Tolkien. Heroes that fit perfectly into the American style that seeks to capture a fantastic and realistic universe at the same time, an era of heroic myths and legends await you to discover how Aron begins his path to greatness.

Overview of history

(# 12 in Adventure on September 6, 2017) in Wattpad.

A very old story, long before the first humans and even before many gods, the base of your universe is governed by a brutal power that grows in the hearts of all beings, if it is experienced and exploited to the fullest it can become a great power. This great power is called "Bestiality" and is used by all kinds of creatures, such as giants, humans and exiled gods to fight in fierce battles, more than an art of war is also a way of life, as well as gold and precious minerals. , there is a method to trade with the hearts of the creatures that harbor this great power, from colossal dragons, angels, trolls, nomos to the most grotesque aberrations of human thoughts, falling into the craziest and most unbridled addictions that derive from this bloody lifestyle.

The story begins in a great battle where our protagonist Aron, a very strong human warrior and great military strategist with his soldiers defeats the army that attacks them, but the story does not take long to twist and in a second everything that Aron had conquered, all what he had loved and known is destroyed by one of the greatest and feared giants of this universe, a great wizard and swordsman but more bloodthirsty than any other being and with a great burden of bestiality, he has lived eternally and beyond his biological immortality He is a warrior who has not lost a fight, therefore, it becomes almost impossible to win. Aron's thirst for vengeance will put him back on a bloody path to maybe just stand in front of him and be crushed as if he were nothing. the plot of this work is profound and each character has its own life and problems, the depth of the words and the way we have told this story make each of the characters familiar and their pain or happiness invade you in every second .

Printed art 33x48

Each volume will have its own closed history. The book will have 100 pages, and each chapter will contain an important part of the story. The book also has full-page color images. We will make sure you get a high quality print to show all the works of art in the best possible way.

Printing and shipping are a challenge. Fortunately, we have done it once in Japan. Now we have studied the international shipping and we will carry out advance delivery tests with the first 20 sponsors, we already have a revised strategy to obtain the best possible result.

REWARDS

The story is written and all the creative work is completed. We have our print and shipping partners aligned, so we are basically ready to print.

However, we expect things to work without problems. If there is any setback along the way, we will communicate with all of you, making sure you know what is happening. If you want to have a continuous contact with us, you can download the free Android Dark by Honor app with this direct download link.

http://files.appsgeyser.com/oscuridad%20por%20h...  

Here you will receive all the news and we will give screen backgrounds to all your users and information about how the process of finishing the work will be and when the shipments will begin in advance, the support of the whole process will be in video or images and direct conversations with the sponsors . , that's you.
Keep in mind that we ship from Colombia. What may imply national taxes when receiving them, which unfortunately is beyond our control.

Again, thanks for your help!

            LOOK FOR ME ON FACEBOOK                 

                              CESAR MONTENEGRO LEIVA

story:
Summary

The story of Willie Mooch will (hopefully) continue in this second edition of the Willie Mooch series. In order to make that happen I need your help with funding. There were some really great reactions to part 1 of this series and I am excited to continue to sharing Mooch's journey with you in part 2. Please help me produce part 2.

 

What We Need & What You Get

- So for transparency the total cost of production for chapter 1 was beyond $1,500. But there were some great lessons learned during that process and I think I can keep things to a minimum going forward.

- I'd like to ask for $500 of funding or whatever you can share.

- These funds will go towards production, which includes, the time it takes produce the artwork and the cost of printing.

- I plan to have some pretty cool perks available for donors:

* Willie Mooch Character Pins

* Stickers

* And exclusive artwork of Willie Mooch perform some famous cons.

 

- Some of the challenges I foresee with producing this chapter is with printing and shipping. With chapter 1 I used KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing), Amazons publishing platform with print on demand services. But with this I chapter release I went a different route by starting my own publishing company and website in hopes of retaining a higher percentage of revenue in order to reduce the cost it takes to produce these.

This process is much more streamlined and should see a quicker turnaround for part 2 of this comic series. Join us on the journey #bigmoochcampaign

story:
What You Can Get:

  -A fully colored 20 page digital pdf copy of the first issue of Relevant Saxon for 2$.                            -A fully colored printed copy mailed straight to your door for 6$ or 5$ if you sign up early.              -IF YOU TELL ME TO INCLUDE BONUS TRADING CARDS AS A REWARD TIER OPTION, I WILL!     The trading cards are a really fun idea to me and I am very much excited about how they look, but I need to know if people actually WANT them. 

 

My Entire Tragic Life Story:

  I am Piglice, and Relevant Saxon is the comic I've been drafting up for the last several months. It's the story of a medieval warrior adventuring through the near-future, in New York. This book has everything. It has blood, It has swords. It has buff men. It has buff women. It is scratch-and-sniff (every single page).
  If you like to support Indie comics, or by chance you actually think this comic book looks flipping epic and would like to gift it to everyone you know (coworkers, family, police officers, your lawyer, your therapist, your FBI agent, your victims, etc.), then please do consider buying a copy.
  Supporting this comic book will enable me to pay people to help me make this comic book better and faster. I am an all around decent artist and write and can cover each role in a comic book, but it is not easy by any means. Even being able to pay a guy to color a few panels or ink 3 tiny pixels here and there greatly helps me push each issue to it's final stage.

What I Want Right Now & What You Give Me Because

I Want It Right Now:

  My evil goal with this first issue of the book is to raise 500 dollars. If more people buy it, then awesome. If not, 500 will help me on my way to making the next issues better.

  I have never funded a comic for money so no you can absolutely not trust my long track record of being a professional Indiegogo comic artist. I have however printed and given my comics out for free so I do feel familiar and comfortable with shipping and printing and everyone's books out to em on time. The last book I did this with was called Red Meat and the art was horribly embarrassing. Since then I have been working in animation, concept art, and storyboarding.

  Every dollar given to Relevant Saxon: The Comic Book makes me grow an inch taller improving my sexual relationship with my wife. 

Risks:

 Everything. I'm risking everything. You? You risk nothing here. You are guaranteed to receive a beautiful 20 page work of art in the mail. Me? I'm risking my long term romantic relationship. I'm risking my health. I'm risking a beautiful full head of hair as the stress gets to me, corroding me, the money corrupting me, making me appear on the outside the way I am on the inside. I am risking my relationship with Jesus Christ our lord and savior as my heart hardens, turning away from him as I simply do not have the time. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

  If you do not have the funds or interest necessary to buy this comic book either digital or in print, that is VERY OKAY. If you want a peak at some of the pages before jumping in and buying a copy, just email me at guntherakers@gmail.com.
story_txt:
What You Can Get:
  -A fully colored 20 page digital pdf copy of the first issue of Relevant Saxon for 2$.                            -A fully colored printed copy mailed straight to your door for 6$ or 5$ if you sign up early.              -IF YOU TELL ME TO INCLUDE BONUS TRADING CARDS AS A REWARD TIER OPTION, I WILL!     The trading cards are a really fun idea to me and I am very much excited about how they look, but I need to know if people actually WANT them. 
 
My Entire Tragic Life Story:
  I am Piglice, and Relevant Saxon is the comic I've been drafting up for the last several months. It's the story of a medieval warrior adventuring through the near-future, in New York. This book has everything. It has blood, It has swords. It has buff men. It has buff women. It is scratch-and-sniff (every single page).  If you like to support Indie comics, or by chance you actually think this comic book looks flipping epic and would like to gift it to everyone you know (coworkers, family, police officers, your lawyer, your therapist, your FBI agent, your victims, etc.), then please do consider buying a copy.  Supporting this comic book will enable me to pay people to help me make this comic book better and faster. I am an all around decent artist and write and can cover each role in a comic book, but it is not easy by any means. Even being able to pay a guy to color a few panels or ink 3 tiny pixels here and there greatly helps me push each issue to it's final stage.

What I Want Right Now & What You Give Me Because
I Want It Right Now:
  My evil goal with this first issue of the book is to raise 500 dollars. If more people buy it, then awesome. If not, 500 will help me on my way to making the next issues better.
  I have never funded a comic for money so no you can absolutely not trust my long track record of being a professional Indiegogo comic artist. I have however printed and given my comics out for free so I do feel familiar and comfortable with shipping and printing and everyone's books out to em on time. The last book I did this with was called Red Meat and the art was horribly embarrassing. Since then I have been working in animation, concept art, and storyboarding.
  Every dollar given to Relevant Saxon: The Comic Book makes me grow an inch taller improving my sexual relationship with my wife. 

Risks:
 Everything. I'm risking everything. You? You risk nothing here. You are guaranteed to receive a beautiful 20 page work of art in the mail. Me? I'm risking my long term romantic relationship. I'm risking my health. I'm risking a beautiful full head of hair as the stress gets to me, corroding me, the money corrupting me, making me appear on the outside the way I am on the inside. I am risking my relationship with Jesus Christ our lord and savior as my heart hardens, turning away from him as I simply do not have the time. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help:
  If you do not have the funds or interest necessary to buy this comic book either digital or in print, that is VERY OKAY. If you want a peak at some of the pages before jumping in and buying a copy, just email me at guntherakers@gmail.com.

story:
Overview

Set in a world torn by war where tech and magic coexist. The ruthless Red King decides to covertly send a peace envoy to an opposing nation. She is stalked and attacked by mysterious, powerful, unknown forces. Her survival and the lives of millions of people depend on a drunken ronin mercenary and his little robot sidekick.

I invite you into the world of Soulbreaker, a work of boundless imagination filled with highly dynamic and complex characters that are entirely relatable. So strap yourself in and brace yourself. It's going to be one hell of a ride!

Soulbreaker is currently a 24 page full color comic book. With more funding, we can unlock stretch goals that will turn this into a stunning 48 page full color comic book.

 

Variant Covers

 

 

Sample Pages

 

WIP Pages

 

Character Concepts

 

Campaign Stretch Goals

1. 16,000 USD - 48 Pages Total 

 

 

About the Creator

Hi, I'm Rav Vann, and I'm the artist/writer/creator of Soulbreaker. Early in my career, I've been featured in Tokyopop's Rising Star of Manga anthology as well as DC's Zuda Comics. Other than that, I've been grinding in the Creative Agency world working with clients like Netflix, Hulu, Disney, Paramount, Apple, and many more. I was a child of the '90s, so I grew up with a healthy dose of Image comics and anime. Art and storytelling was always a passion of mine. That's why I'm happy to share with you my labor of love, Soulbreaker.

 

Risks & Challenges

COVID-19 and unforeseen life circumstances can delay fulfillment, but I will do everything in my power to deliver quality products to you on time.

Refunds will be honored during the live campaign. After the campaign ends, all sales are considered final.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this with everybody you know! With more funding, I can add more content to this book and offer more rewards! Everybody wins!

 

MASSIVE THANK YOU!

Thank you for your time! We hope you enjoyed everything you saw today. Feel free to reach out to us for any questions!

story:
Raising Ripley is a comic following Charlie, a 30 year old burnout punk. He's unemployed, a high school dropout, and still living at home with his parents with no real sense of direction for his life. This is until he's suddenly pushed into a position of responsibility when he learns that he's a father, and is left to raise his infant daughter, Ripley, on his own. With a small network of family and friends, Charlie navigates the highs and lows of being a parent and bettering himself for his daughter, while also trying to understand how not to lose touch with the parts of him that make him who he is.

These characters have been near and dear to my heart for years now, and I wasn't fully set on sharing them with others until a year ago. Since then, I've been working on the story giving energy to this project when possible. With Your help and donations, I'll be able to give these characters and their story the full brain power they deserve, and share their story with you!

I'm looking to produce physical copies of Raising Ripley, as well as fund various perks for backers. To do this, I'd like to raise $6,000 to properly deliver these perks, and have you all feel you're getting the most high quality product that you can get.

My name is Oakley. I'm an illustrator, musician, sugar addict, Dog Father of One(1), and discerning metalhead. When not working and focusing on the comic, I'm spending time with my dog, Theta, or enjoying playing tabletop games with my friends. Ever since I was a child, it's been my dream to be an artist and work with comics and animation. I've dedicated years of my life to bettering my craft to have the  opportunity to do what I've dreamed of doing since I was a 7 year old. While I don't have any notable career (yet), I can assure you my skills are up to par!!

Stretch Goals!!

  • $12,000- Quality Of The Comic Is Upgraded! Book Goes From Simple Saddle Stitch to Softcover
  • $18,000- Custom Patches! Patches based off in world designs for every contribution
  • $20,000- One Shot Comic! A short bonus comic telling the story of how Charlie met his daughter's mother

​

The challenges will be many, but I assure you there will be no risk involved. The biggest purpose is to handle printing cost more than anything. Meaning you, the contributor, will get to be a part of production.
