story:
What is Xenoga?

* Traduction disponible sur l'onglet Mises à jour!

*アップデートセクションの日本語訳

*更新选项卡中提供中文翻译

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/xenoga-read-...

 

Do you want to read your favourite foreign manga/manhua/manhwa/webtoon/comic from around the world but you are checking every other hour to see if your App has been updated with Scanlations?

 

Would you rather pay to see a steady stream of updates for interesting Comics, Mangas, and Webtoons from around the world in your own language?

Imagine being able to read the "Weekly Shonen Weekly Jump" in English, Spanish, French, or whatever language you want to read it in.

Xenoga is an instantaneous multilingual/multilanguage subscription service for online manga and comics, that offers print-on-demand for your favourite online comics. We aim to be the Netflix for Comics and Mangas.

We have just started and are offering incredibly affordable subscriptions that cost from 80% to 50% less than our competitors! Not only that, but our unique subscription model also makes sure to reward those who are long time subscribers!

If you want to follow us please subscribe for our newsletter for updates at: 

http://signup.xenoga.com

 

Introduction

Xenoga is an evolution of traditional publishers. Publishers have been slow to move to a digital format, and even then they are sticking to traditional publishing pipelines. This is more apparent in the comic and manga industry.

I started the Xenoga project because I like reading comics and mangas. The problem is that language localisation is slow and sometimes non-existent. This is due to the "traditional" nature of publishers. 

Xenoga is a streamlined integrated publishing platform that allows for instant multilingual/multilanguage support. This means that any content published can immediately be consumed by anyone in the world in any language. It also offers print-on-demand for comics and mangas.

It has a tremendous value proposition for subscribers and artists/authors alike. And this combination creates a positive feedback loop. More artists/authors means more IP content, which means more subscribers, and vice-versa.

 

Subscription Model

Currently, we are filling up subscriptions as follows:

The first 500,000 can subscribe for US$ 10 per year. 

The next 1,000,000 can subscribe for US$ 20 per year. 

The next 1,500,000 can subscribe for US$ 30 per year. 

The next 2,000,000 can subscribe for US$ 40 per year.

After 5,000,000 million subscribers we use a percentage method following the 1-2-3-4 subscription model as follows:

  • Tier 1 - 10% of Subscribers at US$ 10 annually.
  • Tier 2 - 20% of Subscribers at US$ 20 annually.
  • Tier 3 - 30% of Subscribers at US$ 30 annually.
  • Tier 4 - 40% of Subscribers at US$ 40 annually.

Who gets to go on to the next Tier is determined by seniority (in sequential subscription date order). So if someone at Tier 1 cancels their subscription then the oldest subscriber at Tier 2 gets promoted to Tier 1, the oldest subscriber in Tier 3 get promoted to Tier 2, the oldest subscriber in Tier 4 get promoted to Tier 3.

But also the more subscribers the more people at higher levels with better-discounted subscriptions. Ex. 10 subscribers mean 1 person at Tier 1. But 100 subscribers mean 10 subscribers at Tier 1. And 100,000 subscribers mean 1,000 subscribers at Tier 1.

 

ON-DEMAND Printing

We are planning to partner with top on-demand printing services like Gelato.com, Blurb, Ingramspark, KDP Print, to offer our subscribers to also purchase physical copies in their own language.

 

Revenue Share Model

All profits from print-on-demand (POD)  purchases go to the authors/artists.

We will run a leaderboard system like football leagues where we will share a percentage of the annual profits to authors/artists (excluding POD Revenue).

On top of that, we will also offer monthly salaries to our authors/artists.

 

OUR Offering

We will recruit authors/artists from all around the world to deliver unique comics and mangas. Language will no longer be a barrier as our service aims to offer multi-language support for all our comics and mangas.

Currently, we are in talks with authors/artists from China, Japan, South Korea, Europe, US, and Brazil. If you have suggestions or favourite authors/artists you would like to see featured, please provide information in the comments section.

 

Risks and challenges

The current funding goals is the minimum needed to create the system and starting contents.
Anything beyond that can be used to kickstart more content so that when the service starts there will be a lot of content to choose from.

Thus a challenge is getting the momentum necessary to quickly grow and scale Xenoga.


Since this is an internet-service/software-based there is a much lower risk when compared to other projects selling physical products.

The service will be provided and only the quality and depth of the service will depend on the goals and milestones achieved.

story:
Introduction

  • This project is intended for mature readers. Follow me on Instagram at mister_gruff for more content.

PLOT

  • The Liberated Nation is the setting of the story. It's a sectioned off portion of a larger city that was created by government officials to protect a black community that had experienced intense hate fueled violence. It prohibits guns and police, has no governing body, and is closed off by a fence. It was an experimental endeavor meant to serve as the blueprint to a better future. The angry and fearful people were all too willing to participate. Everything was going fine until the night an invasion of hate mongering hoards infiltrated and looked to burn the Nation to the ground. Enter Andre, the man in the mask.  And in his own words, "I am a monster, I just kill the right people." His haunting origins are revealed in flashbacks. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need about $3,000 to help pay the artist, colorist, and letterer for the first issue.
  • If I'm provided with enough money I'll provide the completed first issue (digitally) as well as some alternate artwork from an artist I previously collaborated with.
  • If I don't reach my goal I'll use whatever money I do receive to start the comic, and I'll start another campaign in hopes of getting the rest of the needed money.

The Impact

  • This is something I've been waiting to do for a very long time. I would love it if I exceed the goal so I can get started on issue #2 (there's 6 in total). 

Risks & Challenges

  • Some people will likely be turned off by the premise, as it appears overtly political. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you feel strongly about this project but don't have money to contribute, you can spread the word by posting the link across different social media platforms. All forms of support will be greatly appreciated. 
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Introduction
This project is intended for mature readers. Follow me on Instagram at mister_gruff for more content.
PLOT
The Liberated Nation is the setting of the story. It's a sectioned off portion of a larger city that was created by government officials to protect a black community that had experienced intense hate fueled violence. It prohibits guns and police, has no governing body, and is closed off by a fence. It was an experimental endeavor meant to serve as the blueprint to a better future. The angry and fearful people were all too willing to participate. Everything was going fine until the night an invasion of hate mongering hoards infiltrated and looked to burn the Nation to the ground. Enter Andre, the man in the mask.  And in his own words, "I am a monster, I just kill the right people." His haunting origins are revealed in flashbacks. 



What We Need & What You Get

I need about $3,000 to help pay the artist, colorist, and letterer for the first issue.
If I'm provided with enough money I'll provide the completed first issue (digitally) as well as some alternate artwork from an artist I previously collaborated with.
If I don't reach my goal I'll use whatever money I do receive to start the comic, and I'll start another campaign in hopes of getting the rest of the needed money.


The Impact
This is something I've been waiting to do for a very long time. I would love it if I exceed the goal so I can get started on issue #2 (there's 6 in total). 

Risks & Challenges
Some people will likely be turned off by the premise, as it appears overtly political. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you feel strongly about this project but don't have money to contribute, you can spread the word by posting the link across different social media platforms. All forms of support will be greatly appreciated. 
Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Who is the Fist of Justice?

Fist of Justice was the super-heroic defender of Charm City until he made a fatal mistake that ended his career. Beaten and locked away by his arch-nemesis, he was eventually all but a faded memory.  But his power -- though dormant and forgotten -- did not fully leave him. Now that the power has fully returned and resurrected Fist of Justice, he has to adjust to a new era AND deal with the villains of the 21st century. Villains who are tougher, stronger, and meaner than ever.

First time? No sweat! We got you covered!

Are you a first time Fist of Justice reader? This is a great jumping on point. But if you want the whole experience, we're also offering both trade paperbacks (Volumes 1 and 2) and single issues (#7) to bring you up to speed! There have been 15 issues so far which span through Digital Webbing Presents and continued into his own ongoing series, so we're pretty serious about this.


 

Old school. New attitude.

This issue has a great old school flashback sequence bringing you back to the 70s/80s where Fist of Justice originally came front.

Drawn by the talented Dario Carrasco Jr (Star Wars, Alpha Flight) who also drew a Fist of Justice story for us when we first started in Digital Webbing Presents. We were also able to bring in our  previous collaborator Matt Webb (The Mask, Hawkman) to color these awesome pages. Matt was the first guy to ever color Hellboy when the character first appeared in John Byrne's Next Men. 

Our main story is illustrated by Mark Robinson who drew the BloodRayne series for us back in the day. He's also worked for Marvel on titles like Hulk and Ghost Rider plus a ton of others. The main story will be inked by the very talented Stacie Ponder who has worked on Star Trek: The Next Generation and BloodRayne. She's the perfect inker for Mark's pencils! Finally we have Paul Little dropping colors! Paul has colored popular titles like Sons of Anarchy and Bomb Queen.


 

The Team

Creators: Mike Imboden (Fubar, Living Corpse) and Ed Dukeshire (Hulk, Once & Future, Power Rangers) -- Mike writes, Ed letters, and together they hold the tag-team championship. Our team also consists of artist Mark Robinson (BloodRayne, Ghost Rider, Hulk), inker Stacie Ponder (BloodRayne, Star Trek) and colorist Paul Little (Sons of Anarchy, Bomb Queen).  For the  "Flashback" scene we have Dario Carrasco Jr (Star Wars, Alpha Flight) on art and Matt Webb (The Mask, Hawkman) on colors! 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is a no risk campaign since we've been fully funded on another platform. We brought it here in case you missed the first campaign (or prefer this platform) as Fist of Justice is now a direct-to-consumer series. Crowd-funding is the only way to get the new single issues!

Most of the issue is already completed with only half the comic needing inks and colors. Once it's ready, it shoots off to the printer and then into your greedy little hands to enjoy!

Thanks for checking out the campaign!

story:
Hi! I am Fang Liu, aka Hiro and this is Modern Life of the Immortals (MLTI)!

My art has many similarities to East Asian styles of art, including the signature Chinese style of landscapes, use of white space, and watercolour techniques. I have been able to finish the first volume of the comic and have now started with the second one, and I am very excited!

Firstly, let's have a look at some examples of the pages of the comic.

The story begins with Luan, a divine bird who takes the shape of a man and enters a life in modern human society. All of the ancient fantastic animals take human shape and live ordinary, quiet lives among us. As the lives of humans become more and more fast-paced, the relationships among them grow cold and calculated. Under the manipulation of the forces of evil, negative emotions grow in abundance. These emotions, at first without form, begin to take shape and turn against the humans that created them. Will the humans and the divine creatures of antiquity join forces to defeat the evil energies? Will they be able to defeat the monsters formed by greed, jealousy, anger and the other seven negative emotions? In the end, will truth, kindness, and beauty defeat the evil that lies within the hearts of men?

You can discover some of the characters of the comic below, but there are a lot more still to meet! 

Check out the video gallery to learn more about the story. If you want to read it in depth you can view the whole comic on our Facebook page or Tapastic page.

To draw the characters I use a lot of Chinese-based techniques such as the use of white space and watercolours, and I also use salt to provide my drawings with a sense of movement.

Below you can see a video of the process of drawing one of the characters with the use of salt.

 

Below you can see the photos of the different rewards of the campaign. I will be very grateful if you can support us.

If you aren't able to submit a pledge, I will be equally grateful if you can help me by sharing the campaign in your social media network to help spread the word! Or even taking the time to write me a message with your feedback!

I would like to express my gratitude and appreciation to the platform NOWDO for their help in the publication and promotion of the comic. They have been an invaluable part of this whole process. You can learn more about NOWDO below or by checking out their webpage.

At this moment, our main project consists of raising funds to do the print edition of the first volume of the comic Modern Life of the Immortals (MLTI).

We think that this comic is the perfect example of how a precious culture, in this case, Chinese, can expand to other parts of the world thanks to the community on the web. Currently, we have been able to translate it online in English and we are now starting with Spanish. We want now to go a step further and be able to provide the fans with the print edition of the comic, as well as with other special rewards.

This campaign is meant to raise funds for this project so we can print the volumes and other special materials and send them to our beloved fans and contributors.

At this moment I can't think of any potential risks that could occur during the process.

The advantage of this project is that I have already created the comic and the prototypes of the rewards. I have to advise that the images of the rewards are only prototypes and the design may slightly change at the end, in particular with the teddy bear. If that is the case, I will immediately notify you and give you the opportunity to decide whether to continue supporting me or not.

The other thing would be the editing process, as it may take a while. The shipping will take a while as well.

Last but not least, I have the huge help of the NOWDO team behind me who is going to help me if needed.

story:
The Enceladus Anomaly is a comic about space horror written and drawn by José Avilés. This work is divided into three volumes and they will be produced through crowdfunding. In this first campaign we're focused on the first book:                        The Enceladus Anomaly - Book 1: The awakening.

 

La Anomalía de Encélado es un cómic de terror espacial escrito y dibujado por José Avilés. Esta obra se compondrá de tres tomos sucesivos que serán producidos a través de la financiación colectiva. En esta primera campaña nos enfocaremos en el primer volumen: La Anomalía de Encélado - Libro 1: El despertar.

 

 

 
 

 

 
 

 
 

 

 

 
 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

In the not too distant future, the mankind has reached high levels of technological, scientific and social developments. After overcoming the challenges of earlier times, as the energy supply or natural resources issues, the new generations have achieved to relieve the differences and conflicts betweens nations of Earth. Because of this new context, the space research has revived as never before.

 

En un futuro quizá no muy lejano, la humanidad ha alcanzado altas cotas de desarrollo tecnológico, científico y social. Superados por fin los desafíos de épocas anteriores, como el problema de las fuentes de energía o de los recursos naturales, las nuevas generaciones han conseguido mitigar las diferencias y conflictos entre los países de la tierra. Esto ha provocado, entre otras cosas, un resurgimiento sin precedentes de la exploración espacial.

 

 

Our story begins with the Táwros II spaceship orbit insertion around Saturn, which resumes the Saturn research mission that was started by its predecessor, the Táwros I spaceship, more than a decade before. The tragic end of the Táwros I, mysteriously crashed on the Enceladus surface, and the strange anomaly that surrounds this Saturn's satellite will be some of the enigmas that the crew of this new spaceship will try to reveal.

 

Nuestra historia arranca con la inserción en la órbita del planeta Saturno de la astronave Táwros II, la cual reemprende la misión de exploración de este planeta y de sus satélites que iniciara su predecesora, la astronave Táwros I, más de una década atrás. El trágico final de la Táwros I, que misteriosamente acabó estrellada en la superficie helada de Encélado, y la extraña anomalía que envuelve a este singular satélite de Saturno, son algunos de los enigmas que la tripulación de la nueva astronave tratará de desentrañar.

 

The Main Character of this work is Audra Bissette, the only daughter of Táwros I failed captain and one of the members of the large and trained Táwros II crew. Audra and her companions will face the horror in Enceladus, the dark and unexpected sides of the reality on the space that won't fit with the advanced scientific paradigm of this new mankind.

 

La protagonista de esta obra es Audra Bissette, hija única del capitán de la malograda Táwros I y uno de los miembros de la nutrida y dispuesta tripulación de la Táwros II. Audra y sus compañeros de exploración se enfrentarán en Encélado al terror, a inesperados y oscuros aspectos de la realidad en el espacio para los que el avanzado paradigma científico de esta nueva humanidad no estará preparado.

 

 

 

The Enceladus Anomaly - Book 1: The awakening is a comic-book of 52 pages (48 pages of story) that will be printed in full color on silk coated paper of 150 g/m2, 22 x 29,5 cm size, in softcover of 300 g/m2 gloss laminate. Both print and digital version (.pdf file) of the book can be chosen between two languages: English or Spanish.

 

La Anomalía de Encélado - Libro 1: El despertar es un cómic de 52 páginas (48 páginas de historia) que será realizado a todo color sobre papel estucado mate de 150 g/m2, con un tamaño aproximado de 22 x 29,5 cm y con encuadernación en rústica (tapa blanda) de 300 g/m2 laminado brillo. Tanto en la versión impresa como en la versión digital (archivo .pdf) se podrá elegir entre dos idiomas: Inglés o Español.

 

 

 

 

 

 

These are the main items offered in this crowdfunding.

Estos son los principales artículos ofrecidos en este crowdfunding.

 

 

 

All the perk prices shown below do not include the shipping costs. For more information, go to "shipping costs" section.

Los precios de las recompensas a continuación descritas no incluyen los gastos de envío. Para más información, ve al apartado "gastos de envío".

 

 

 

The shipping costs are not included in the price of the perks. These costs will be paid apart, during the shipping preparation work and after getting in contact with all of you to ask for your shipping address and indicate you the payment methods. In this way, we'll all have a higher control about the landed costs, and also, you'll be able to ask for combine shipping: If you are interested in buying more than only one perk or more quantities of the same one, the shipping costs will be adjusted as much as possible.

Feel free to contact with me in any moment to ask for more info about the combine shipping cost that you could be interested in.

 

Los gastos de envío no están incluidos en el precio de las recompensas. Estos se pagarán aparte, durante la preparación de los envíos y tras contactar con todos vosotros para solicitaros la dirección de destino e indicaros las formas de pago. De este modo, todos podremos tener un mayor control sobre el coste de los portes y, además, podréis beneficiaros de los envíos combinados: Si pensáis en adquirir más de una recompensa o varias unidades de la misma, los gastos de envío se ajustarán todo lo posible. 

Puedes contactar conmigo en cualquier momento para recibir más información sobre el coste del envío combinado que te pueda interesar. 

 

 

                                          - Certified mail  /  Envío certificado -

 

 

The backers that have purchased the print version of the comic-book will receive additional and exclusive rewards by goal reached. By the contrary, the bakers that have only purchased the digital version of the comic-book (PERK 1 - PERK 2) will not receive these rewards.

 

Todos los contribuyentes que soliciten el cómic en versión impresa recibirán recompensas adicionales y exclusivas por cada meta alcanzada. Por el contrario, los contribuyentes que soliciten únicamente el cómic en versión digital (PERK 1 - PERK 2) no recibirán estas recompensas.

 

 

 

 

 

I'm sure that some of you will agree with me about we are living one of the most refreshing and astonishing age of our short history in this wonderful planet. These times are full of changes, doubt, progress and regression, but above all, opportunities. Internet, the social network and specially the crowd funding platforms are changing everything. They are establishing a new paradigm, a new way to make real our more personal ideas and projects. Being able to accomplish a project like The Enceladus Anomaly with all the quality that is required, without intermediaries, nor interferences in the work, neither unnecessary pressures that could harm the quality of the pages… it's an unthinkable luxury before. Dealing directly with the final client, the comic-book reader who is searching for quality works constantly, is a dream becoming true. An exciting journey that I hope to achieve with your help and your company. Also, one feels very lonely in the cold blackness of the space!  :)

 

 

 

 
As a comic-book author, the quality of my work is my main priority. Because of this, excluding the english translation and the printing, I take on personally all the creative aspects of this work (plot, designs, script, drawings, coloring, lettering, etc…) as well as the necessary logistics to carry out successfully this exciting project.
 

So that, with some of the first pages just finished, I consider essential to take in the whole 2016 year to complete all the work, being able to send away the books (along with the other items) to everyone during the early months of 2017.

Anyway, as living in the space is always risky and unpredictable, I'll try to keep the communication with all of you as fluid as possible, so you'll be able to be aware of any advance or delay that could arise during the "mission".   :)

The total quantity of money contributed to this campaign will go to the production, translation and printing of the comic-book, as well as all the extras like: postcards, bookmarks, posters, needlework badges, commissions, shipping materials, Indiegogo and PayPal commissions and fees, etc…

 

 

 

Se que muchos de vosotros estaréis de acuerdo conmigo en que estamos experimentando unas de las etapas más sorprendentes e interesantes de nuestra corta historia por este hermoso y vibrante planeta. Son tiempos llenos de cambios, de incertidumbres, de avances y retrocesos, pero sobre todo, de oportunidades. Internet, las redes sociales y, en especial, las plataformas de financiación colectiva, lo están cambiando todo. Están generado un nuevo paradigma, una nueva forma de hacer realidad nuestros proyectos e ideas más personales. Poder llevar a cabo un proyecto como La Anomalía de Encelado con toda la calidad que se requiere, sin intermediarios, sin injerencias en la obra ni presiones innecesarias que mermen la calidad de sus páginas, es un lujo antes impensable. Poder tratar directamente con el cliente final, el lector de cómics, que busca incesantemente trabajos de calidad, tanto en su concepción y diseño como en su realización final, es un sueño que se va haciendo realidad. Un viaje excitante que espero poder llevar a cabo con tu ayuda y compañía. ¡Además, uno se siente muy solo en la fría inmensidad del espacio!  :)

 

 

 

Como autor de cómics, la calidad de mi trabajo es mi mayor prioridad. Es por ello que, exceptuando la traducción al inglés y la impresión de los ejemplares, yo soy el único encargado de afrontar todos los aspectos creativos de esta obra (argumento, diseños, guión, dibujo, color, rotulación, etc…) y de controlar toda la logística necesaria para llevar a buen puerto este emocionante proyecto. Solo así puedo asegurarme de que el trabajo resultante será fiel a su concepción original. 

Así pues, y con algunas de las primeras páginas del cómic ya terminadas, sería indispensable abarcar todo el 2016 para la completa realización del trabajo,  pudiendo enviar el cómic impreso (junto con el resto de artículos) a cada uno de vosotros durante los primeros meses de 2017.

De todas formas, como la vida en el espacio es siempre arriesgada e imprevisible, trataré de mantener la comunicación con todos vosotros lo más fluida posible, y así podréis estar siempre al tanto de cualquier avance o retroceso que pudiera surgir durante la "misión".  :)

La cantidad total de dinero aportado a esta campaña irá destinado a la producción, traducción e impresión de la obra, así como a todo tipo de añadidos y extras, como postales, marcapáginas, pósters, insignias bordadas, commissions, material de envío, pago de las comisiones de Indiegogo y PayPal, etc…

 

José Avilés is a spanish comic-book artist who has worked on series like "CSI MIAMI Smoking Gun", written by Jeff Mariotte, "2 to the Chest", written by James Hudnall, "Monarch of Manhattan", written by Edward C. Sellner, "Worlds of Dungeons & Dragons - The Great Hunt" written by Elaine Cunningham,  etc… His first lonely work was "Desde la Oscuridad", a compilation about his horror short stories published in "Cthulhu" magazine. He's also been working as inker for american publishers like DC Cómics, IDW, etc…

 

José Avilés es un dibujante de cómic español que ha trabajado en series como "CSI MIAMI Smoking Gun", escrito por Jeff Mariotte, "2 to the Chest", escrito por James Hudnall, "Monarch of Manhattan", escrito por Edward C. Sellner, "Worlds of Dungeons & Dragons - The Great Hunt" con guión de la escritora Elaine Cunningham, etc… Su primera obra en solitario fue "Desde la Oscuridad", álbum recopilatorio de las historias cortas de terror que publicó en la revista "Cthulhu". Ha trabajado también como entintador para editoriales norteamericanas como DC Cómics, IDW, etc…

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can see more images at "Gallery" section (above).

Puedes ver más imágenes en el apartado "Galería" (arriba).
story_txt:
The Enceladus Anomaly is a comic about space horror written and drawn by José Avilés. This work is divided into three volumes and they will be produced through crowdfunding. In this first campaign we're focused on the first book:                        The Enceladus Anomaly - Book 1: The awakening. La Anomalía de Encélado es un cómic de terror espacial escrito y dibujado por José Avilés. Esta obra se compondrá de tres tomos sucesivos que serán producidos a través de la financiación colectiva. En esta primera campaña nos enfocaremos en el primer volumen: La Anomalía de Encélado - Libro 1: El despertar.         
 

          
In the not too distant future, the mankind has reached high levels of technological, scientific and social developments. After overcoming the challenges of earlier times, as the energy supply or natural resources issues, the new generations have achieved to relieve the differences and conflicts betweens nations of Earth. Because of this new context, the space research has revived as never before.
 
En un futuro quizá no muy lejano, la humanidad ha alcanzado altas cotas de desarrollo tecnológico, científico y social. Superados por fin los desafíos de épocas anteriores, como el problema de las fuentes de energía o de los recursos naturales, las nuevas generaciones han conseguido mitigar las diferencias y conflictos entre los países de la tierra. Esto ha provocado, entre otras cosas, un resurgimiento sin precedentes de la exploración espacial.

  
Our story begins with the Táwros II spaceship orbit insertion around Saturn, which resumes the Saturn research mission that was started by its predecessor, the Táwros I spaceship, more than a decade before. The tragic end of the Táwros I, mysteriously crashed on the Enceladus surface, and the strange anomaly that surrounds this Saturn's satellite will be some of the enigmas that the crew of this new spaceship will try to reveal.
 
Nuestra historia arranca con la inserción en la órbita del planeta Saturno de la astronave Táwros II, la cual reemprende la misión de exploración de este planeta y de sus satélites que iniciara su predecesora, la astronave Táwros I, más de una década atrás. El trágico final de la Táwros I, que misteriosamente acabó estrellada en la superficie helada de Encélado, y la extraña anomalía que envuelve a este singular satélite de Saturno, son algunos de los enigmas que la tripulación de la nueva astronave tratará de desentrañar. 

The Main Character of this work is Audra Bissette, the only daughter of Táwros I failed captain and one of the members of the large and trained Táwros II crew. Audra and her companions will face the horror in Enceladus, the dark and unexpected sides of the reality on the space that won't fit with the advanced scientific paradigm of this new mankind.
 
La protagonista de esta obra es Audra Bissette, hija única del capitán de la malograda Táwros I y uno de los miembros de la nutrida y dispuesta tripulación de la Táwros II. Audra y sus compañeros de exploración se enfrentarán en Encélado al terror, a inesperados y oscuros aspectos de la realidad en el espacio para los que el avanzado paradigma científico de esta nueva humanidad no estará preparado.
 

 
 
The Enceladus Anomaly - Book 1: The awakening is a comic-book of 52 pages (48 pages of story) that will be printed in full color on silk coated paper of 150 g/m2, 22 x 29,5 cm size, in softcover of 300 g/m2 gloss laminate. Both print and digital version (.pdf file) of the book can be chosen between two languages: English or Spanish.
 
La Anomalía de Encélado - Libro 1: El despertar es un cómic de 52 páginas (48 páginas de historia) que será realizado a todo color sobre papel estucado mate de 150 g/m2, con un tamaño aproximado de 22 x 29,5 cm y con encuadernación en rústica (tapa blanda) de 300 g/m2 laminado brillo. Tanto en la versión impresa como en la versión digital (archivo .pdf) se podrá elegir entre dos idiomas: Inglés o Español.
 
 
  
  
These are the main items offered in this crowdfunding.
Estos son los principales artículos ofrecidos en este crowdfunding.
 
 

 
All the perk prices shown below do not include the shipping costs. For more information, go to "shipping costs" section.
Los precios de las recompensas a continuación descritas no incluyen los gastos de envío. Para más información, ve al apartado "gastos de envío".
 
 
 
The shipping costs are not included in the price of the perks. These costs will be paid apart, during the shipping preparation work and after getting in contact with all of you to ask for your shipping address and indicate you the payment methods. In this way, we'll all have a higher control about the landed costs, and also, you'll be able to ask for combine shipping: If you are interested in buying more than only one perk or more quantities of the same one, the shipping costs will be adjusted as much as possible.
Feel free to contact with me in any moment to ask for more info about the combine shipping cost that you could be interested in.
 
Los gastos de envío no están incluidos en el precio de las recompensas. Estos se pagarán aparte, durante la preparación de los envíos y tras contactar con todos vosotros para solicitaros la dirección de destino e indicaros las formas de pago. De este modo, todos podremos tener un mayor control sobre el coste de los portes y, además, podréis beneficiaros de los envíos combinados: Si pensáis en adquirir más de una recompensa o varias unidades de la misma, los gastos de envío se ajustarán todo lo posible. 
Puedes contactar conmigo en cualquier momento para recibir más información sobre el coste del envío combinado que te pueda interesar. 
 

 
                                          - Certified mail  /  Envío certificado -

 

 
The backers that have purchased the print version of the comic-book will receive additional and exclusive rewards by goal reached. By the contrary, the bakers that have only purchased the digital version of the comic-book (PERK 1 - PERK 2) will not receive these rewards.

story:
"The New Belfast Chronicles"  is in the tradition of the great crime sagas like "The Godfather", "Sons of Anarchy", "Mean Streets", "The Yards" "100 Bullets", "Scalped"  & "Southern Bastards". However, "The New Belfast Chronicles" approaches this from the perspective of a female protagonist. 

What would it be like if Fiona Gallagher from "Shameless"  was the head of the Irish Mob.

Creator Greg Beck wants to do with "The New Belfast Chronicles" what "Game of Thrones", "Dune" and "Star Wars" did in terms of elevating their genres to a mythology.

With the murder of Hardy Gang boss, Mickey Hardy, his wife Martina takes on the job of being "the boss". Martina must deal with the responsibility she has to her family and community by trying to preserve Mickey's legacy.  Despite the efforts of long-standing Hardy enemy, the Falzone family, led by newly-made boss Mark Falzone. Martina must also deal with the efforts of the police to bring an end to organized crime.

We are right now in the midst of production on issue 1. While we are going to release it digitally we have interest from many to produce  a hard copy run through Greko Printing.

This first arc will be told over the first 4 issues under the subheading "Hardy's Trade". Going forth we hope to tell another 6-8 story arcs which will culminate in the definitive ending around issue 40. After that, we have plans for prequels and a number of one-shot stories told in the New Belfast mythology.

The writer of "The New Belfast Chronicles", Greg Beck received a second-rounder status at the Austin Film Festival's screenplay competition with an early version of "The New Belfast Chronicles" called "Martina Hardy". That script got noticed by Oscar & Emmy-winning producer Mark Johnson ("Breaking Bad", "Bugsy" & "Rain Man") along with praise from film industry story analysts associated with Sony Pictures. 

The illustrator/artist of "The New Belfast Chronicles", Beth Varni, has a track record in the indie comic scene. A freelance illustrator of six years, Beth has worked in indie video games, book covers, comics, and mural painting. A graduate from VCU Arts in Richmond, Virginia, Beth is a big lover of video games and comics with a focus on sequential images. She has worked on many indie comics: "Marked", "Joshua Black", "Home", "Aztecman", "The Witch", "Poseidon", "Rough Ice", and many more! Her art can be seen at www.bethvarni.com .

"The world of New Belfast and the character of Martina are very special to me. Everyone who has read the story loves the world of New Belast and to them the character of Martina is already an icon. Martina was created out of my annoyance about the lack of strong female anti-heroes in our culture; the female equivalent to Tony Soprano, Jax Teller & Dashiell Bad Horse." Greg Beck

story:
The Listener

Let's begin with the Death of a man...always a good way to tell a story, right? My great uncle Les died not long ago. He was a quiet man, but when he spoke, I listened. It was always worth it. Les talked about being a Native American soldier in WW2 frequently and the hardships he went through. There was no regret in his stories, there was, however, horror in his words. 

There are a lot of stories that don't see the light of day. With The Listener, I'd like to bring to light numerous stories that we as people dismiss. From war stories to horrifying tales passed from individual to individual. The Listener follows Aditsan (or Adi as we'll refer to him going forward). Adi is a Native American soldier who'll be our primary protagonist. Many of Adi's experiences are ones that actually occurred to my uncle, as well as other vets. Alongside the factual events, I've woven a world of horror based around myths and religion. What would it be like if the spiritual realm was literally only separated by a thin veil from the living? What if you woke up one day and could see the dead? Gods? Demons? There's a bit of truth in every scary story you've heard throughout your life.

What You Get

I've gathered some brilliant talent together to bring Adi's story to life. Eric Viola's interior artwork lends a beautiful aspect to the story (24 pgs, cardstock cover!!)  Whether it's a bloody battlefield or Chinese spirits flitting through a market, his pages are absolutely stunning.

 

I also couldn't ask for a better group of comrades/friends to do the covers for The Listener Book 1. With covers by Gabriella Ramos, Adam Fields, Kyle Willis, Mike DeBalfo, Marissa Pope and Eric Viola.

What We Need

We're trying to raise 2,000$ USD to continue developing the story and releasing it to a larger audience. That being said the book is done and Book 1 will go out to every backer, so back with confidence.

 

The Impact

Every backer helps us get stories that are often brushed aside out to more people. Native American soldiers and their stories need to be told just like any other and we know people are Listening. If stories aren't told they fade away and Les's story needs to be told. We successfully met our goal for Book One on Kickstarter and have sold a substantial amount of copies. We want to invite you all into the world of The Listener, a world where someone is always Listening when you're alone in the dark.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks only gains. The book has been published through Cow-Abunga comics and the team is solid. We all believe in the product.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize in this trying time that Covid has made things tight for people. Any help is appreciated, mention the project to a friend or share on your social media outlets. If you'd like a copy but just cant do it right now, please message me and I will set aside a copy of cover A for you. When you're ready we can get it to you. The entire team appreciates your support!

Dustin Brunell-Writer/Creator
Eric Viola-Interiors/Cover Art
Kyle Willis-Letterer/Cover Art
Heather Brunell-Editor
Gabriella Ramos-Cover
Artist Adam Fields
Cover Artist Marissa Pope
Cover Artist Mike DeBalfo

We realize in this trying time that Covid has made things tight for people. Any help is appreciated, mention the project to a friend or share on your social media outlets. If you'd like a copy but just cant do it right now, please message me and I will set aside a copy of cover A for you. When you're ready we can get it to you. The entire team appreciates your support!
Dustin Brunell-Writer/CreatorEric Viola-Interiors/Cover ArtKyle Willis-Letterer/Cover ArtHeather Brunell-EditorGabriella Ramos-CoverArtist Adam FieldsCover Artist Marissa PopeCover Artist Mike DeBalfo

story:
What's Band of Warriors about?

Around 1,500 BC one of the most catastrophic volcanic eruptions in human history occurred just off the coast of Crete on the island of Santorini. Known as the Minoan Eruption, it caused absolute devastation in the immediate area and set the stage for the Late Bronze Age collapse.

Merging actual historical events with Celtic and Greek mythology, Band of Warriors is an epic tale of adventure, betrayal and vengeance that begins by following King Minos at the height of his reign, in the palace of Knossos, on the island of Crete. Where it will lead, only the Gods know...

Who will enjoy Band of Warriors?

  • Fans of epic action/adventure comics.
  • If you like the idea of a comic that merges Celtic and Greek mythology.
  • Readers of comics such as 300, Birthright, Green Valley, Kill the Minotaur and Vikings.
  • Collectors of high quality independent comics for mature readers. (Contains mild nudity, strong violence and sexual references.)

What do Band of Warriors backers get?

  • All reward backers receive a 28 page digital copy of Band of Warriors. Plus a PDF of the original script and a creation commentary video by Samuel George London.
  • All physical reward backers receive a 28 page, staple bound, US standard size comic with the option for either economy (30 days) or express (7 days) delivery.
  • Above the print copy reward level you can also get a Band of Warriors enamel pin based on an actual historical artefact from 1,500 BC known as The Ring of Theseus.

Hello there, my name is Samuel George London. I'm a 6-time successful crowdfunding comic creator from Hampshire in the UK and the writer of Band of Warriors.

Now, although this isn't my first comic book, Band of Warriors was the first that appeared in my head over 4 years ago when I started this crazy journey. My mother has a house on the island of Crete and when I visited there for the first time in 2016 I was enthralled by the history it had. Both fairly recently (WW2) and even further in the past, especially the bronze age (3,000-1200 BC).

That same year, I visited my wife's family in Brittany, France. Of course, I had visited them before but this time we visited a megalith that was next to an old tin mine. For those of you not in the know, bronze is made up of copper and, you guessed it... tin.

When investigating all of this further it turned out that bronze age tin from France and Britain (my own homeland) had been found among bronze age artefacts on and around Crete. This trading relationship between France, Britain and Crete that was happening in the bronze age got my imagination fired up and the idea of Band of Warriors began.

I'm going to be honest, it hasn't been easy trawling through all the history and mythology surrounding all of those regions to create a coherent story but I think (if I don't say so myself) I've created a rather epic story that begins by following King Minos at the height of his reign at the palace of Knossos, on the island of Crete.

To get you started, below are 5 pages from the first issue. And if you enjoy them, it's with pleasure to invite you to write to our letters page that will be published in each issue, aptly titled Fans of Warriors. Please submit your letters via email on samuelgeorgelondon [at] gmail [dot] com using the subject line "Fans of Warriors".

*** If you'd like to read these pages in more detail please click here to download a PDF version for your viewing pleasure.***

Following on from those pages you probably noticed that we censored a few bits out. This is because we've tried to be as historically accurate as possible, and at that time and place both men and women were mostly bare-chested, which you can see below in the form of some Minoan statues as well as from this enlightening Wikipedia article. However, just so you know, when we publish and send out the comic, obviously there won't be any censorship on the art. What I'm also trying to get at is that this is a comic for mature readers, as it features mild nudity, strong violence and sexual references.

Moving on from that clarification, I'd like to introduce you to some of the main characters of the story; King Minos (leader of the Minoans of Knossos), Prince Giorgos (King Minos' son), King Agamemnon (leader of the Mycenaeans) and Theseus (a tribute sent to King Minos from Athens)... 

We have an initial 6 issues planned for Band of Warriors but with the right level of support it has the scope for becoming an on-going series that would indefinitely be released every 3 months. Speaking of which, let me introduce you to the creative team behind Band of Warriors...

You know me a little already but as I mentioned before I've had 6 successful crowdfunding campaigns, which includes my best-known series about a Victorian space adventure titled The Milford Green Saga. However, I've also had a series published with Action Lab - Danger Zone called The S Factor, which is about a superhero dating reality TV show. You can follow me on Twitter here and check out my titles on Etsy here.

Federico, is a freelance artist originally from Argentina but now lives in Lisbon, Portugal. He's published two books in Argentina and three issues of an ongoing series in the US. Plus various short stories on various types of independent media. You can follow Federico on Instagram here and check out his work via his website here. 

Nicole works as a freelance writer and editor specialising in comics. She is the creator/writer of Road Trip to Hell, her first creator-owned project. She adapted Peter David's Artful and Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir to comics. Currently, Nicole works as a freelance comic editor for Tapas Media and writes articles for Comic Book Resources (CBR), Comic Frontline, and Never Ending Realm. You can follow Nicole on Twitter here and find out more on her website here. 

The script is written and edited, the artist is on board, the printers are ready and as long as we're fully funded we'll be able to deliver all of your rewards by March 2021.

The digital pack reward level includes a 28 page digital copy of Band of Warriors. Plus a PDF of the original script and a creation commentary video by me, Samuel George London.

The print copy reward level of course includes the digital pack. Plus you'll get a 28 page, staple bound, US standard size comic in the post, alongside an A4 poster of the front cover to hang up on your walls and a BoW bookmark to put in your books.

Lastly, the enamel pin reward level includes the digital pack and the print copy rewards. Plus you'll receive a 1 inch-sized enamel pin based on an actual historical artefact from 1,500 BC known as The Ring of Theseus.

On top of all this, you have two delivery options. First, is the economy option, which means that after we dispatch your rewards it can take up to 30 days to arrive. Alternatively, if you'd like your rewards a bit quicker then you can go for the express option, which means that after we dispatch your rewards it can take up to 7 days to arrive.

  •  For the UK, economy delivery is £2 and express delivery is £3.
  •  For the rest of the world, economy delivery is £5 and express delivery is £7.

We've got some stretch goals planned but until the time comes we'd like to keep them as secret as King Agamemnon's plans...

Thanks for reading, and if you have any questions at all please be sure to get in touch, as I'm more than happy to help!

Hoping that you're able to help us make our dreams become a reality :) SGL

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Brandon Kitchen. I've been writing this story for a couple years. It's a comic book about a superhero all based on the Gods and Goddesses of Olympus! The protagonist is a simple man, a little out of shape who gets into a horrific car accident and nearly dies only to wake up and realizes he has the powers of the God of Gods, Zeus! The protagonist gets powers too from Hades but his come with a twist! I'm incredibly excited about the possibilities and the ideas I have floating around in my nugget. Just so we're clear and potential contributors know I'm not blowing smoke, I do have an issue and a half written and have since started writing more frequently. If you're unsure about it and want to know more my email is bkitchen@sbcglobal.net. contact me there with any comments, questions, or concerns.

What We Need & What You Get

Judging by who ive spoken to and what ive gathered is I will need at least $300 to get just the logo and a couple sketches of some concept art for the protagonist and if someone is generous enough, the antagonist as well

       Any proceeds received from this campaign will go directly to paying an artist to render concept drawings and logo ideas

  • I have the creativity, the tenacity and the drive to get this written and it will be my absolute best effort. I come from a music background and I was stalling there so I chose to redirect that creative effort towards something that can not only reach more people but also be more intriguing. 
  • If I do not come up with enough to come up with at least a logo I will redistribute funds back to contributors and the ones who do not want to receive that money back will be donated to publicly chosen cause. However, I will not stop writing or trying to come up with the money myself

The Impact

Now, let's get into some of those ideas I have. The protagonist not only receives the powers of Zeus but what he doesn't know is that he's being trained to replace him, via a transference of consciousness. hey, even gods need breaks. The antagonist doesn't know he's an antagonist. He is the son of hades as well, Hades found a way to pass through the trap door he kidnapped Persephone from. I'm sure I don't have to explain where babies come from haha. Hades tricks his "demi-devil" son as I elected to call it, that he's meant to be a superhero. He's been given these gifts to punish the wicked of the world. Little does he know he's only feeding his father more souls. Eventually the more he unbeknownst to him uses his powers for evil it slowly corrupts him...making him gradually the antagonist to this story.

  • This is incredibly important to me how this pans out. I want this to be something special and I know any potential contributors will want the same thing.
  • This is my very first project like this but I wouldn't waste my time or yours to set this up if I didn't feel like I was making any headway on.
  • I will provide updates and progress reports via email or facebook if you have me on there. if not. feel free to add me.

Risks & Challenges

I also feel I need to be transparent. As I've stated, this is my very first project of this kind and I need potential contributors to know what I'm after.

  • Some of the hurdles I will run into is finding an artist who believes in this project as much as I, and my potential contributors do.
  • I plan to overcome this by stronger networking and persistence

Other Ways You Can Help

I cannot stress this enough. Do not hesitate to share this campaign even if you cant contribute. The more people this reaches could potentially be worth more than the funds raised.

story:
UDON presents RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS, an original graphic novel from the mind of Jeffrey 'Chamba' Cruz!

The Veuniverse is a strange location full of daft and dangerous denizens. This place isn't always the friendliest, so it takes a particular type of brave buffoon to be a courier, especially when there are equally rash rival couriers competing for the same jobs!

Join the pompadour-styled Raimundo and his witty cohorts Bloob & Melody (the One Dimensional Couriers) in a race against time to deliver what could be the biggest package of their careers-- all in service of a quizzically questionable client!

If you're a fan of dynamic, action-based anime and random humor from down under, you can't go wrong with RandomVeus ODC!

 

Behind the Book:

Jeffrey “Chamba” Cruz is a wildly kinetic Australian artist best-known for his work on the Street Fighter comics. Chamba has also illustrated for properties such as Marvel’s Venom, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mega Man, Power Rangers, Big Trouble in Little China, and Tatsunoko VS Capcom.

UDON Entertainment is a publisher of art books, comic books, and manga. Some of our best-known projects showcase video game and anime properties such as Street Fighter, Mega Man, Neon Genesis Evangelion, Yu-Gi-Oh!, Dark Souls, Gears of War, Monster Hunter, and many more. In 2020 we are celebrating the studio’s 20th anniversary.

 

Our Heroes:

 

Book Preview:

Read a fully lettered 20-page preview of RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS! Meet the heroes! See them deliver packages, fight baddies, and run from explosions!

Download Preview PDF here:
http://www.udonentertainment.com/randomveus/RandomveusODCIndiegogoPreview.pdf

 

Interior Previews:

 

Reward Tiers

STANDARD TIER - $30

You get:

  • RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS 160-page graphic novel
  • 1 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Card (Raimundo)

The  RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS Graphic Novel. Created and illustrated by Jeffrey “Chamba” Cruz, and scripted by Leonard Bermingham. This 160-page, full-color paperback book includes 124 pages of story, plus bonus material!

You'll also get the first RANDOMVEUS Trading Card, character #001 - Raimundo himself! Flip it over to see his One Dimensional Couriers employee ID card!

 

DELUXE TIER - $60

You get:

  • RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS 160-page graphic novel
  • HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE Bonus Comic Book
  • RANDOMVEUS ODC #1 Comic Book - Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover
  • 5 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Cards
  • RANDOMVEUS Bookmark
  • RANDOMVEUS Poster

The Deluxe Tier includes the RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS Graphic Novel, plus a ton of extra goodies!

HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE is a bonus 24-page comic by Chamba starring Henshin Hero, the Veuniverse’s premiere manga/anime champion!

You’ll also get the RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS #1 Comic Book - Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover. Featuring front and back cover art by Chamba, this extra special 32-page single issue features the first chapter of RandomVeus: One Dimensional Couriers.  It is exclusive to this campaign and will never be sold elsewhere else!

More goodies - 5 Limited Edition Trading Cards of the main RandomVeus crew: Raimundo, Melody, Blood, Abraxas, and Ethel. Plus a RANDOMVEUS 13x20” Poster. The poster will ship double-folded to fit with the graphic novel.

 

ULTIMATE TIER - $300

You get:

  • RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS 160-page graphic novel
  • HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE Bonus Comic Book
  • 5 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Cards
  • RANDOMVEUS Poster
  • RANDOMVEUS #1 Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover
  • You or your original character drawn into an issue of RANDOMVEUS: ODC!

The ultimate RandomVeus package! Get everything from the Deluxe Tier, pluuuuuus...

… YOU or YOUR ORIGINAL CHARACTER, drawn into RANDOMVEUS: ODC!

The world of RandomVeus is strange and diverse, and it has room for almost any type of inhabitants. At the Ultimate Tier level, Chamba will draw your character into a panel in RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS!

Chamba will create his own interpretation of the character based on reference provided by the backer. So as not to spoil any story elements, the backer character art will not be revealed until the book is released. UDON reserves the right to turn down a character if deemed inappropriate, and offer a refund to the backer.

 

EXTRA ADD-ON - $20

It's the RANDOMVEUS: SNEAKY SHIPMENTS Hardcover Graphic Novel! For just $20, you can add this additional adventure to any tier!

This 144-page, oversized hardcover graphic novel tells the story of the very first adventure of the One Dimensional Couriers. Raimundo, Bloob, and Melody run up against octopus ninjas, thieving pirates, samurai fungus, one giant furry squid monster, and more!

RANDOMVEUS: SNEAKY SHIPMENTS Preview Pages:

 

Risks & Challenges

This is UDON’s first ever crowd-funded project, so we’re sure to run across a few surprise bumps along the way. We’ve made comfortable estimates for printing and shipping times, but it’s a complicated world these days. Sometimes minor delays do happen.

That said, we’re also an experienced publisher. We’ve been working as a creative services studio for 20 years, and have been publishing comic books since 2003 with Street Fighter #1.

Additionally:

  • All artwork for the comics, and bonus items in the campaign has already been completed, with the except of backer characters from the Ultimate tier.
  • Rewards will be fulfilled through the good folks at FocusAttack.com. Focus Attack has fulfilled UDON’s webstore orders for three years now. They’re a dedicated and experienced crew.

 

Estimated Shipping Costs

Below are the estimated shipping cost by region. These ship costs are only ESTIMATED and will be paid AFTER the campaign is closed via BackerKit. We hope to bring these costs lower with international shipping partners in the near future.

 

 

You Can Help This Campaign Succeed!

We’ve love if you would help spread the word about this campaign, by using the share buttons at the top of this page for Twitter or Facebook!

Or just share the campaign URL "randomveus.com" itself on your social media of choice.

1 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Card (Raimundo)

The  RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS Graphic Novel. Created and illustrated by Jeffrey “Chamba” Cruz, and scripted by Leonard Bermingham. This 160-page, full-color paperback book includes 124 pages of story, plus bonus material!
You'll also get the first RANDOMVEUS Trading Card, character #001 - Raimundo himself! Flip it over to see his One Dimensional Couriers employee ID card!
 


DELUXE TIER - $60
You get:

RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS 160-page graphic novel
HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE Bonus Comic Book
RANDOMVEUS ODC #1 Comic Book - Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover
5 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Cards
RANDOMVEUS Bookmark
RANDOMVEUS Poster

The Deluxe Tier includes the RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS Graphic Novel, plus a ton of extra goodies!
HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE is a bonus 24-page comic by Chamba starring Henshin Hero, the Veuniverse’s premiere manga/anime champion!
You’ll also get the RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS #1 Comic Book - Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover. Featuring front and back cover art by Chamba, this extra special 32-page single issue features the first chapter of RandomVeus: One Dimensional Couriers.  It is exclusive to this campaign and will never be sold elsewhere else!
More goodies - 5 Limited Edition Trading Cards of the main RandomVeus crew: Raimundo, Melody, Blood, Abraxas, and Ethel. Plus a RANDOMVEUS 13x20” Poster. The poster will ship double-folded to fit with the graphic novel.
 

ULTIMATE TIER - $300
You get:

RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS 160-page graphic novel
HENSHIN HERO: THE MOVIE Bonus Comic Book
5 Limited Edition RANDOMVEUS Trading Cards
RANDOMVEUS Poster
RANDOMVEUS #1 Indiegogo-Exclusive Bloob 2-sided cover
You or your original character drawn into an issue of RANDOMVEUS: ODC!

The ultimate RandomVeus package! Get everything from the Deluxe Tier, pluuuuuus...
… YOU or YOUR ORIGINAL CHARACTER, drawn into RANDOMVEUS: ODC!
The world of RandomVeus is strange and diverse, and it has room for almost any type of inhabitants. At the Ultimate Tier level, Chamba will draw your character into a panel in RANDOMVEUS: ONE DIMENSIONAL COURIERS!
Chamba will create his own interpretation of the character based on reference provided by the backer. So as not to spoil any story elements, the backer character art will not be revealed until the book is released. UDON reserves the right to turn down a character if deemed inappropriate, and offer a refund to the backer.
 

EXTRA ADD-ON - $20
It's the RANDOMVEUS: SNEAKY SHIPMENTS Hardcover Graphic Novel! For just $20, you can add this additional adventure to any tier!
This 144-page, oversized hardcover graphic novel tells the story of the very first adventure of the One Dimensional Couriers. Raimundo, Bloob, and Melody run up against octopus ninjas, thieving pirates, samurai fungus, one giant furry squid monster, and more!
RANDOMVEUS: SNEAKY SHIPMENTS Preview Pages:


 

Risks & Challenges
This is UDON’s first ever crowd-funded project, so we’re sure to run across a few surprise bumps along the way. We’ve made comfortable estimates for printing and shipping times, but it’s a complicated world these days. Sometimes minor delays do happen.
That said, we’re also an experienced publisher. We’ve been working as a creative services studio for 20 years, and have been publishing comic books since 2003 with Street Fighter #1.
Additionally:

All artwork for the comics, and bonus items in the campaign has already been completed, with the except of backer characters from the Ultimate tier.
Rewards will be fulfilled through the good folks at FocusAttack.com. Focus Attack has fulfilled UDON’s webstore orders for three years now. They’re a dedicated and experienced crew.

 
Estimated Shipping Costs
Below are the estimated shipping cost by region. These ship costs are only ESTIMATED and will be paid AFTER the campaign is closed via BackerKit. We hope to bring these costs lower with international shipping partners in the near future.

 
 
You Can Help This Campaign Succeed!
We’ve love if you would help spread the word about this campaign, by using the share buttons at the top of this page for Twitter or Facebook!
Or just share the campaign URL "randomveus.com" itself on your social media of choice.

story:
WELCOME TO HORNFEATHER...

A remote mountain town that has been terrorized by a serial killer who murders the parents of children while they sleep. As the orphans approach adulthood and begin to unravel the mystery behind the killer responsible, the killings suddenly begin again, setting off a chain reaction of fear, paranoia and suspicion.

Hi. My name is Drexl Crowley and that is the premise behind my new comic book series, Hornfeather. By contributing to this campaign, not only will you will be helping me bring issue one of Hornfeather to life, but you will also be helping me take the first step towards my dream of telling stories for a living.

Hornfeather is a dark supernatural thriller. It has the sensibility of a small town murder mystery, mixed with an 80’s cult horror film aesthetic. If you are a fan of cult classics like Twin Peaks and 80's Stephen King horror films, this will be right up your alley.

This book will be illustrated by the amazing Noreus Teves, which will give this limited series a dark fairy-tale-like quality. I am also lucky enough to have veteran letterer Patrick Brosseau on board for this project as well.

And...
You can now read the first nine pages of this disturbing supernatural thriller by clicking on the images at the top of this campaign!!!

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET...

Issue 1 of Hornfeather is 24 pages. Noreus Teves is the only artist on this project. He is doing an illustration style for this book that will have him working triple time, as penciler, inker and colorist. His rate is $200 per page. Which adds up quickly to $4800. Plus another $200 for the cover makes it an even $5000. As I mentioned above I also have veteran letterer Patrick Brosseau on board for this project. He has given us a great deal on his rate for this first issue. Adding that along with the fees from Indiegogo and Paypal and we estimate our total cost to be $5666.

I have put together a number of different contribution levels and perks to go along with them. So please check them out!

 

THE IMPACT...

By donating to this campaign you will also be opening up the door for more issues of this story to be told. Hornfeather will have a chance to live on, be seen and read by a wider audience. We will be able to self published this first issue for digital download in Amazon's Comixology. We will also be able to possibly print a limited run of Hornfeather 01 and take it to comic book conventions.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES...

I have decided to do this as a fixed campaign, meaning if we don't meet our goal, we don't get any money. The reason for this is just how expensive this project really is. I have also decided to make all of the perks digital only in order to keep the fundraising goal as low as possible. I have already spent money out of my own pocket to pay Noreus and Patrick to create the initial art that you see above. If we don't make it to our goal, then that loss will be on me. 

I have also included zero dollars to pay myself here. That's right. Even if this does fund, I don't make a penny on this. Why would I do that? Well because there is a greater long term goal for me here and that is to tell stories for a living. I have never had a problem starting at the bottom. I work tirelessly when I have a goal and my goal here is simply to tell good stories that will entertain you.

So there are risks for me here. But there are none for you. The main challenge is getting the word out there and finding enough good people who want to contribute.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP...

If you can't contribute but still would like to help, please share our campaign with as many people as possible. Exposure is just as vital as donating! So take to your instagrams, your twitters and facebooks and share, share, share! You can also share right here from indiegogo using their share tools. If you have any questions for me, please feel free to ask me anything! Thank you all so very much!

story:
It Begins:

Hi. I'm Dennis Mallonee, the president of HEROIC PUBLISHING. For more than three decades, starting in the mid-1980s, I've published a line of superhero comic books featuring awesome characters such as Flare, Liberty Girl, the League of Champions, WitchGirls Inc, and the Sensational G-Girl. 

Heroic Publishing's breakout, show-stopping character was (and remains) FLARE, the superhero supermodel, a sexy shining goddess of light.

The ever expanding Heroic multiverse has an amazing line-up of heroes, from Eternity Smith to the Huntsman, but our fans have always favored our beautiful and powerful women, whether as antagonist, protagonist, superheroine or supervillainess. 

Long before it became politically popular, the Heroic multiverse was home to a wide spectrum of the human family, including gods and other-dimensional creatures!

But always it was THE SUPERWOMEN who led the way. And now, as we near 40 years of fantastic adventures, it's time to pay tribute to those wonderful characters with a beautiful hardbound coffee table book of pin ups.

And the largest portion of the net proceeds from this project, fully 80%, will be earmarked specifically for the artists and for a worthy charity!

Here are the details:

Ulderico Fioretti is the producer and designer of the project. He has given the book a beautiful, elegant design style.

  • Hardcover, gold foil embossed cover
  • Full color 96 pages
  • 12 inches X 9 inches

 
"HEROIC PUBLISHING: THE SUPERWOMEN" is a pin-up art book that will be created specifically to try to help artists who have been impacted not only by the current global pandemic, but by other diseases around the world. We're also looking to raise funds for Médecins Sans Frontières (www.msf.org) through the sale of this art book.

And that's why we want your help with this project.
 
But we don't stop there, because a smaller part of the proceeds will go to help Heroic Publishing ramp up production of new comic books and art books. 
This particular art book will be entirely dedicated to the Heroic Publishing's superheroines (and supervillainesses). We're going to blow your mind with this gorgeous collectors edition!

Next, we reached out to some of the most talented artists in the world with this idea:
an art book of female characters to help raise money for a worthy charity, and specifically 
for artists having difficulty with health issues.

We have been blessed and inspired by the support and the generosity of spirit we've received from our line up of amazing artists:

Tanino Liberatore
Ariel Olivetti
Eduardo Risso
Mark Beachum
Onofrio Catacchio 
Kyu Yong Eom
Emanuele Taglietti 
Don Walker
Alessandro Scacchia 
Paul Abrams
Ulderico Fioretti
Daerick Gross Sr
BRÄO
Paolo Massagli
Andrew Pepoy 
Giancarlo Caracuzzo 
Beniamino Del Vecchio
Benito Gallego
Conny Valentina 
Uko Smith 
Antonio De Luca 
Andy Smith

Stefania Macera

 

The art book will also feature FOREWORDS by Roy Thomas, Steve Perrin, and Dennis Mallonee.

 

CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVES

Raise a total of $17,000 to cover the cost of producing and printing

  • 1000 units of a Hardcover premium limited edition art book

Every dollar above that will go 

  • 50% to the participating artists, specifically to help those who need help dealing with problems arising from the current global pandemic
  • 30% to Médecins sans frontières, an extremely worthy charitable organization
  • 20% to Heroic Publishing to support future projects

 

Why Médecins Sans Frontières?

Because it is an association that goes where it is needed. During this pandemic they are in Europe, Brazil, Africa, Syria, and other countries with great difficulties. And even after this is over, they will be in the front line!

 

The Time Frame

Many of our participating artists are already working on their contributions. We expect to be able to deliver the finished art book to our printer in late August or early September, and to receive the hardbound volumes within one month thereafter.

As soon as we receive the books we will package and ship, including any extra perks you may have requested with your pledge.

Among those extra perks you could get are ORIGINAL ARTWORK by several of our talented international contributors, or a COMPLETE SET of all 48 issues of the Flare comic book.

So: if you are a fan of comic book artwork that features good girls and bad girls, or if you just want to give back to the artists that inspire us with their dreams, or you're particularly interested in helping people who help other people, choose one of the available perks and make this a successful campaign!

Other Ways You Can Help

We can use all the help you can offer in making this project a success. Email your friends. Post on social media. Talk it up! And by all means share this link.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-superwomen

For your perusal, this is a sampling of artwork being produced by our incredibly talented contributors, including works in progress. We will update this gallery as new artwork arrives.​

SAVAGE TIGRESS by Eduardo Risso

 

MURCIELAGA/ SHE-BAT by Ariel Olivetti

 

JAY-NA The Jungle Queen by Emanuele Taglietti 


FLARE by Antonio De Luca

 

BLACK ENCHANTRESS by Paolo Massagli

 

SAVAGE TIGRESS by Conny Valentina

This, by the way, is the piece that will appear on the cover of the "nice" version of the limited edition Tigress comic book.

 

ICICLE by Ulderico Fioretti

 

TIGRESS by Onofrio Catacchio (work in progress)

 

JAY-NA The Jungle Queen by Ulderico Fioretti. 

PLEASE TAKE NOTE: If you like this piece, you can acquire the original artwork by selecting the "Art Book PLUS Fioretti piece" perk. That perk includes Ulderico's ORIGINAL ARTWORK for this JAY-NA piece.

 

LIBERTY GIRL by Alessandro Scacchia (work in progress)

 

BLACK ENCHANTRESS by Alessandro Scacchia (work in progress)

 

SYLVIA The Last Vampire by Stefania Macera

 

MIRANDA The Mermaid by Stefania Macera

 

FLARE by Stefania Macera (work in progress)
