Cavegirls and Dinosaurs?
Lost Girls #1 follows the adventures of three girls with wildly different abilities and foibles, each one lost in the dinosaur infested jungles of planet Avadon. This all-ages comicbook by Liminalsoup is 22 pages and features a pull-out poster. 

 
Lostgirls #1: Tambi was always the best hunter in her village, but when she is chosen for a virgin sacrifice she escapes into the jungle. At first she is  confident she can survive with her archery skills. However the gods of the jungle are not pleased they have been denied human blood! 
 

Collectable Ash Cans!
What's an Ashcan?
During the golden age of comics, ashcan editions of comics were printed to establish copyright. They often went straight from the printer to the "ashcan".  Later the term was used for digest-sized prototype versions which became sought-after  as a limited-edition collector's copies.

We are offering 4 ashcans editions that have never been available before. 
Ashcan edition of Custom of the Sea (10 pages, B&W)Ashcan edition of Amen Break (10 pages, colour)Ashcan edition of True Dinosaur Stories (10 pages, colour)Ashcan edition of  Post-Apocalyptic Dinosaurs (8 pages, colour)
Exclusive Cover Variants

"Sketch  Cover" and "Virgin Cover" editions are Indiegogo exclusives available only during the 30 days of the campaign and never again. This is your one and only chance to get these cover variants for Le Grande Osiris #1. 
Character Cameo
At this donation level, a character based on you will be added to the book. Nela has studied classical realism and will be able to capture your visage expertly. We will need to know what kind of historical dress you will wear and what monster-killing weapon or musical instrument you will use in the comicbook. You will also get everything in the other tiers,  including all printed and all digital rewards.  Plus a heartfelt "Thank You" credit in the book. This is not just some background character with your face stuck on it. It is a unique role, based specifically on you and your tastes and will add 2 extra pages to the book bringing the page count to 32!
Milestones
To reward early supporters, and encourage everyone to spread the word, we will be offering Milestone rewards!
At 25% funding ($444) - All current backers will receive the  comic PDF "Homer & Smithe" (2 pages)
At 50% funding ($888) - All current backers will receive the PDF of "Post-Apocalyptic Dinosaurs" (8 pages)
At 75% funding ($1333) - All  current backers will receive the PDF of "True Dinosaur Stories" (10 pages). 
None of these comics have ever been released anywhere before.  These rewards will be sent out immediately when the milestone is reached, regardless of whether or not the crowdfunding campaign is ultimately successful. 
Stretch Goals - by Futurama's James Lloyd
$2500 - A variant cover by Bongo illustrator James Lloyd (Futurama Comics, Simpsons Comics) will be added. If we reach this goal, all backers of the physical book will have their choice of original or this variant cover. Thanks so much to James for agreeing to help us on this project. It is truly an honor to have such an artist participate. 
$3500 - ?????
The Creepy Creative Team
Nela (Art) - a self-taught comic artist and traditional painter from Poland. She is quickly making a name for herself in the indie horror comic scene. Nela's fantastic web comic called "Znahar: Thanatos" is available on Webtoons (currently on hiatus) and Soccer Mom Killer  is launching on  kickstarter so please support that horror comic too!
Gary (Letters) -  Xeric awarded comic book writer and illustrator, comic book colorist and letterer with over 35 years experience in printing and publishing.  Gary's Lovecraftian horror webcomic "Gods of Aazurn" updates every Wednesday on Webtoons. 
Joey (Story) - Comicbook writer from Vancouver Canada. An engineer by day, at night he plumbs the depths of the human soul with his macabre and strange stories. The creative mind behind Liminalsoup comics such as Post-Apocalyptic Dinosaurs, True Dinosaur Stories, The History of the Amen Break and Lost Girls. For the full Liminalsoup catalog visit www.liminalsoup.com

Risks & Challenges
If we are so lucky as to have a successful campaign, we will take great pride in fulfilling every single aspect of it. This is our big chance in our burgeoning careers and will are not going to blow it. By hook or by crook, whatever challenges we face, we will find a way to overcome them. Of all the teams I have worked with in indie comics, this is the most professional and capable team. I have full confidence in their ability to deliver.  

Other Ways YOU Can Help
Some people just can't contribute monetarily.
But that doesn't mean you can't help:

Spread the word about this project on social media such as facebook, twitter, reddit, etc
Sign-up on our mailing list to stay up-to-date on future crowdfunders as well as receive exclusives found nowhere else. 

Finally, to everyone who helps it in anyway, whether it be by your generous donation, or just by retweeting us on twitter,  I want to say thank you very much. We've poured our rotting hearts and lost souls into this project but it's all for nothing if we don't have good people like you supporting creator-owned independent comics. Thank you!

story:
Overview

   

  Marysa is a young princess passionate about adventure and piracy. Yowel’s bloodline is piracy, but his everlasting dream is to become a great knight. When their destinies meet and they promise to help each other, several surprising twists and turns occur threatening the future of the Kingdom of Goral.

 

Our story

  Hi I’m Frederique , the author, originally from Reunion Island but born in France. With my husband Joel , originally from Guadeloupe and born there, we recently moved in UK and opened our multimedia company JDALIZ STUDIO.

  3 years ago, back from a trip to Martinique ( another french Island) I had this idea about a kingdom surrounded by the sea where adventures can take place (surprising for Island people, isn’t it!). Passionate about story telling since my childhood, I took a step of faith this time to launch this comic book, which is my favourite kind. Thanks to God a great team (Sander the illustrator, Mathlyn the reseacher/proofreader) gathered around this project, and thanks to you, we’ll be able to produce and launch it!

     

 

Funds application

 

Achievement goals

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

  It’s a flexible goal campaign.The minimum we need to reach is at least £4500 to produce and print a physical comic book. If we don’t reach this goal we will launch the story with what has been raised but it may take longer to provide the final product  or even change the quality (i.e. black and white version or only PDF version...)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you cannot give a financial  contribution then we would love if you could contribute  by sharing  the links on social media, the campaign, the video...

story:
What is DARK DARKNESS?

Three super natural misfits and a nerd vie for the highest honor of darkest dark lord at a comic con of darkness (and all of the powers that come with the title). But before the winner can be chosen, a grisly murder catapults them on a quest to clear their names. In the process they unveil a plot that puts all the Darkness attendees in peril. Will one of them betray the others to rule as darkest dark lord, or will they work together and save the world from eternal darkness?

Why a Graphic Novel?

Dark Darkness started as a serial stage play that morphed into a web series. Having had a little taste of power, the web series mutated into a feature film screenplay in search of Tony Stark-esque to back the movie. Since Tony is hard to get a hold of right now, Dark Darkness dawned the cape of graphic novel, a perfect way to tell this epic fantasy comedy adventure story.

What you get.

We're offering a full color graphic novel between 120 and 134 pages (depending on the final layouts and bonus content) adapted from our 117 page film screenplay. For those that like to get more involved, we've got lots of extras for you too. If we make our goal, we'll also be able to offer stretch goals to backers.. Anyone that chooses a reward for more than $50 will get their name in the back of the book on a "Thank You" page next to the credits.

What people are saying about Dark Darkness?

Dark Darkness, the web series has played at festivals all around the world.

The Fantasy Network  has also recognized our web series and invited us to be a part of their streaming platform. You can get 50% off your first 3 months subscription by using promo code BOUNDARYBAY.

Our team!

  • The story and principle characters of Dark Darkness were created by award winning playwright Ben Eisner. Filmmaker Wilson Large is the writer and has been the driving force behind this story for the last ten years. This process has included and been influenced by dozens of professional creatives from a broad spectrum of talents.
  • Ben Hansen is doing the linework for the graphic novel. Besides creating character designs, concept art and two posters for Dark Darkness, his artwork is featured in "Transformers Legends" mobile app game (NGMOCO Games), "Zombies Vs Cheerleaders" for Moonstone and the Transformers Trading Card Game Concept artist  (Wizards/Hasbro) to name just a few! When he’s not drawing or selling prints at conventions, he’s usually just getting more coffee.
  • Our colorist is Cristian John Sabarre from the Leyte, Philippines who has just finished "Neon Skies" for Rogue Comics Ireland. His use of popping colors and dark shadows make him a perfect fit to capture the production design of Dark Darkness. More of Cristian's work can be found here.
  • Our letterer is Cassie Anderson, an artist from Portland who is working on her own comic, Extraordinary, as well as the sequel to Lifeformed, both soon to be available from Dark Horse Comics. 

Why Crowdfunding?

After investing ten years and more personal finances than Wilson cares to admit, crowdfunding makes the most sense. With your help we can make a product we wouldn't be able to do by ourselves and reach out to the fans who would appreciate work like this.

Risks & Challenges

While failure is not an option for us when it comes to this project, we understand that every project has risks. 

  • This is Wilson's first comic project as a project manager, but with over 10 years of creative project management experience, he's prepared for bumps in the process and possible delays.
  • If anyone on the creative team has to stop due to injury and sickness, we will be able to transition other folks onto the team.
  • Pre-Press, printing, and shipping of books is a complicated process that can lead to delays, and we're doing our best to mitigate those as much as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please make some noises! Bleating sheep noises preferably, but also shout outs to your peeps about how much you wish Darkness would reign supreme or whatever... use your own words (still in sheep bleating voices though).
  • We made it easy to do a simple share with the social media icons swimming around somewhere up above. Keep in mind if you add a sentence or two about what you like about this campaign, your friends will be more interested based on your personal take on it. 

Roll Credits!

story:
Help us save print comics and help them evolve!

Evil Kat Comix has a mission to help comic books evolve. Comic Books have not changed their format since their inception, while other forms of entertainment have radically changed in order to survive. We don't listen to music on 8-track tapes or watch movies with film projectors anymore. Comic books have not changed and that refusal to evolve is leading to the death of print comics. The price of keeping the original format has skyrocketed to the point where comic book collecting has become a very expensive hobby and following even a single character's adventures can sometimes break the bank. It's time for comic books to evolve and it's time to put the 'book' into 'comic books'.

Our flagship title, Evil Kat Comix Presents, is an anthology title that will be released quarterly and contain every story from Evil Kat Comix. The best part is you will get at least 136 pages of stories and bonus material in every issue for only $9.99. So for less than $40 a year you get every story about every character we have for an entire year. We want to make comic books an affordable and enjoyable form of entertainment again! We also strive to give you a variety of entertainment spanning multiple genres. We have superhero stories, horror stories, and anything else that we think you'll enjoy. I promise that with the range of stories in each issue there is something for everyone in each one. So give us a chance and help us save print comics and bring them to their next stage in evolution.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are trying to raise $15,000 to fund the printing of the first two issues.  We do not expect any of our writers or artists to work on spec in the hopes that we can sell copies.  We want to pay a fair page rate up front so they are properly compensated for their work.  We also need to do some targeted advertising to get the word out about Evil Kat Comix.
  • As a thank you for helping us, we tried to think of the kinds of things we would like as collectors ourselves. We came up with some unique and cool ways to show our appreciation, and some truly are one of a kind.
  • If we don't reach our full goal we are going to print whatever issues we are able to while continuing to try and raise funds to keep our print runs going.

The Impact

  • We want to create the kinds of comic books that we grew up loving. Comic books that focus on great characters and putting them in incredible situations, characters whose adventures you look forward to reading as much as we enjoy creating them.
  • We also feel that indie creators are like a family and should stick together and help each other out as we all share a common passion.  We want to make it possible for indie creators to have a place where they can tell their stories and share the love of what they do with others who love it too.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge that we face is marketing and promotions. People have to know you are out there in order to buy your books.

  • We have taken on a Head of Marketing and Promotions who will focus on getting attention for Evil Kat Comix and it's properties and doing some targeted advertising.
  • An aggressive social media campaign is also being planned to coincide with the launch of the first issue.  The campaign will continue and will focus in areas with the most effective reach.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please, help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. What may seem like a small gesture can make a big difference to us.

Thank you and we look forward to putting our first issue in your hands.

story:
The story of farmer jack that turned into horror that one night. He returned home from work ,very exhausted and looking forward to having dinner with his beloved daughter, Renne. To his surprise, she was nowhere to be seen. After searching the whole house , he finds a bloody note in his daughter’s room that says;

From Goblin Lorenz ,

“Your daughter has been kidnapped, if you love her , come to Lorriax Park.” 

So begins the adventure and wandering in the fog of horror!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the story of farmer Jack that turned into horror that one night, he’s desperate to go to Lorriax Park to have his daughter Renne back. 

Goblin Lorenz was stalking the girl Renne , he exploited Jack’s gaffe by order from their master . Who could it be! 

 

Our goal in this project is a fixed 5000 dollars for 32 pages. 

If we receive more encouragement, we intend to increase the number of pages!

I’m super excited for your support  to create this novel. I will work passionately to excel in it to get your utmost satisfaction and enthusiasm.

Novel project Goblin Lorenz it’s not only about the pleasure of reading it , it’s about the mystery as well. We try to make this novel as thrilling and exciting as possible. 

As you go in the depths of this novel, you’ll encounter more secrets and puzzles on different levels. Jack will require your help to solve them in order to rescue his daughter.

 

 

   

 

 

 

 

All the correct answers to the puzzles at the end of the page, do not cheat ;)

story:
HELP US LAUNCH THE AWESOME NEW COMIC BOOK SERIES... FREED!

FREED #1: The Fourth Revenge is an action-packed, page-turning thriller for comic fans who love Punisher, Watchmen and V.  

After a vision quest, a modern Sioux warrior seeks to avenge his ancestors by going on a killing spree throughout America. Georgetown law grad turned DC Detective Kioni Freed is called by her friend President Elizabeth McQueen to stop "the Avenger." With the help of a grizzled former Bureau of Indian Affairs cop, Kioni pursues the Avenger to South Dakota, Los Angeles, Maryland, DC and New York City trying to stop the carnage. But the Avenger is staying one step and one murder ahead of her. Can Kioni stop the murders before the Avenger completes his fourth, final revenge?

watch the video  and visit the FREED website for more tidbits and trivia.

 

See FREED as featured in Fanbase Press (9/11/2020) in #CrowdfundingFridays.

PREVIEW: A few sample pages...

COVER A* 

COVER B*

COVER C*

* PLEASE REQUEST YOUR CHOICE OF COVER (A, B or C) for perks that include
digital or print versions of the comic book.)

The Avenger Splash Page

Sample Single Pages (text/word bubbles removed from some sample pages)

Sample Spreads (FREED uses many colorful double-spread pages showcasing Ian J. Miller's action-packed illustrations and Fredrik Mattsson's dynamic coloring) 

NOW, YOU CAN HELP US LAUNCH THIS SERIES!

Our creative team of creator/writer Carl Burcham, noted action comic artist Ian J. Miller and talented Swedish colorist Fredrik Mattsson have delivered a captivating piece of art and writing that will delight and exhilarate you. And you can help us bring it to print!

www.freedcomic.com

OUR CASE FOR YOUR HELP...

The electronic version of the comic is finished (and it looks brilliant!) Our team has been paid for their amazing work. The book is all set up for printing -- we just need your help to print and distribute it to you and other comic lovers around the world. Our goal is to raise $3,000 USD to cover those costs for this first 36-page issue to kick off the series. We think you'll love the comic as much as we do. And for your help, you'll receive a great comic book and some really cool swag! (Read the PERKS section for specifics!)

JUST ADDED... THIS ONE-OF-A-KIND PERK

A signed, printed spiral bound book featuring the original panel-by-panel description (by FREED creator/writer Carl Burcham) next to what became the final colored pages by Ian J. Miller and Fedde Mattsson (printing limited to 25 books worldwide!). For pledge of $150 or more.

YOU WILL ALSO GET THIS 11 x 17" POSTER AVAILABLE ONLY THRU INDIEGOGO WHEN YOU PLEDGE FOR THE PRINT VERSION OF FREED!

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE... A BONUS, SPECIAL HOW WE MADE THIS  SPREAD INSIDE THE COMIC BOOK...​

AND WE HAVE STRETCH GOALS! 

If we reach $5,500: Two additional full-color, signed trading cards specially designed for this stretch goal will be added to each order

If we reach $6,500: All orders get stickers featuring four of the main characters: Kioni Freed, The Avenger, Ben Soaring Eagle and Steve the Maltese

If we reach $7,500: Each order will receive two bookmarks featuring Kioni and The Avenger

So, imagine an African American Jessica Jones  versus a Native American John Wick. Throw in a dash of Die Hard and Death Wish and you've got FREED: The Fourth Revenge! ​We love this comic and know you will too! Thanks for making it a reality.

Learn lots more about the comic book at Kioni's website: www.freedcomic.com.

Watch this Creators' Cut video to learn more about the story and meet the creative team.

And don't forget to check out the cool Indiegogo thank you PERKS for your contribution!

But the Avenger is staying one step and one murder ahead of her. Can Kioni stop the murders before the Avenger completes his fourth, final revenge?watch the video  and visit the FREED website for more tidbits and trivia. See FREED as featured in Fanbase Press (9/11/2020) in #CrowdfundingFridays.PREVIEW: A few sample pages...COVER A* COVER B*COVER C** PLEASE REQUEST YOUR CHOICE OF COVER (A, B or C) for perks that includedigital or print versions of the comic book.)The Avenger Splash PageSample Single Pages (text/word bubbles removed from some sample pages)Sample Spreads (FREED uses many colorful double-spread pages showcasing Ian J. Miller's action-packed illustrations and Fredrik Mattsson's dynamic coloring) NOW, YOU CAN HELP US LAUNCH THIS SERIES!Our creative team of creator/writer Carl Burcham, noted action comic artist Ian J. Miller and talented Swedish colorist Fredrik Mattsson have delivered a captivating piece of art and writing that will delight and exhilarate you. And you can help us bring it to print!www.freedcomic.comOUR CASE FOR YOUR HELP...The electronic version of the comic is finished (and it looks brilliant!) Our team has been paid for their amazing work. The book is all set up for printing -- we just need your help to print and distribute it to you and other comic lovers around the world. Our goal is to raise $3,000 USD to cover those costs for this first 36-page issue to kick off the series. We think you'll love the comic as much as we do. And for your help, you'll receive a great comic book and some really cool swag! (Read the PERKS section for specifics!)JUST ADDED... THIS ONE-OF-A-KIND PERKA signed, printed spiral bound book featuring the original panel-by-panel description (by FREED creator/writer Carl Burcham) next to what became the final colored pages by Ian J. Miller and Fedde Mattsson (printing limited to 25 books worldwide!). For pledge of $150 or more.YOU WILL ALSO GET THIS 11 x 17" POSTER AVAILABLE ONLY THRU INDIEGOGO WHEN YOU PLEDGE FOR THE PRINT VERSION OF FREED!BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE... A BONUS, SPECIAL HOW WE MADE THIS  SPREAD INSIDE THE COMIC BOOK...​AND WE HAVE STRETCH GOALS! If we reach $5,500: Two additional full-color, signed trading cards specially designed for this stretch goal will be added to each orderIf we reach $6,500: All orders get stickers featuring four of the main characters: Kioni Freed, The Avenger, Ben Soaring Eagle and Steve the MalteseIf we reach $7,500: Each order will receive two bookmarks featuring Kioni and The AvengerSo, imagine an African American Jessica Jones  versus a Native American John Wick. Throw in a dash of Die Hard and Death Wish and you've got FREED: The Fourth Revenge! ​We love this comic and know you will too! Thanks for making it a reality.Learn lots more about the comic book at Kioni's website: www.freedcomic.com.Watch this Creators' Cut video to learn more about the story and meet the creative team.And don't forget to check out the cool Indiegogo thank you PERKS for your contribution!

story:
White Lies Matter, Trump for ExPresident 2020

The idea for this book came about at the end of the Muller investigation when the President declared himself “Totally Exonerated” and the Attorney General said, “Nothing to see here”. This was clearly not the case for anyone who read the report. Yet on social media we regularly witnessed people believing these lies. They would then perpetuate the falsehoods further. There were mean heated discussions. Often the answer to the question “Did you READ the report?” was met with a “No”. We realized that reading for Trump supporters was as much of an anathema as it was for their leader. We thought, “if only there was a way to simply explain how bad this man is for our country” in a way that they could understand. Maybe some of them would get it. If only there was a coloring book. That ought to be basic enough. That is when “White Lies Matter, Trump For ExPresident 2020” was born.

This project is a passion project and it is a cathartic release. When we watch the news and continue to see things get worse and worse every month that this administration is in office we often feel helpless. However, working on creating page ideas for this book helped channel anger, frustration and hopelessness into something productive and enjoyable.

This campaign is about making this coloring book a reality. One that the Trump opposition will enjoy. One that we will want to pass onto others in order to help explain why supporting Trump is harmful to the country and harmful to who we are as Americans. Buy a book. Help make this a reality.

Why Indiegogo?

To produce a book of this scope costs money. The costs of production goes down the more books we can print in a given run. Our goal is to be able to print at least 50,000 books in the initial run. We also need funds to be able to mail the books to our customers, and produce the rest of the illustrations. Currently we only have budget to produce a few more. With pre-ordering through Indiegogo, we can make this passion project a reality. Our belief in human nature, and our countrymen lead us to believe that there are at least 50,000 people out there who will see value in our project. If that is not the case, then anyone who has supported the campaign will receive a full refund if we do not achieve our goal by August 15th when the campaign ends.

Pages So Far

The entire coloring book has not been developed yet. This is where we need your help. We have illustrated 3 pages so far so you can see what we are going to look like and how we are handling Trump’s lies. As we raise money we will be adding more pages.

Stormy Daniels, Hush Money, Individual One

Poor Melania, while at home with her new born, Trump had an affair with  Stormy Daniels. Lying to his wife is not criminal, Paying hush money and hiding the payments to keep the electorate from finding out is. Trump, named Individual One in his attorneys sentencing memo, is party to the crimes committed.

Lies, Propaganda and the El Paso Shooting

Trump based his campaign on lies and divisiveness. His lies about immigrants and the rhetoric from him and his propaganda machine led directly to the mass shooting in El Paso Texas.

Covid-19 Denial, Response, and Incompetence

The lies and misinformation about Covid-19 coupled with an inability to lead lost over 110,000 American’s their lives. But at least Trump was #1 on Facebook.

Who needs this book?

We always imagined this book as having two audiences. The first are people like us. People who need a cathartic release. A nod to those who understand we really cannot take 4 more years of this administration.

The second group is people who need to understand. Here are a few examples.

Friends

We have lots of friends who we do not see eye to eye with politically. The flame wars on social media are time consuming. We want to be able to just give a copy of the book to those friends. At $10. Why not. 

Relatives

It is the perfect thing to send to that #MAGA hat wearing uncle you dread seeing at thanksgiving. 

Undecided Voters

There are going to be plenty of people who think that it doesn’t make a difference who gets elected and they don’t vote. Or they think that Biden isn’t worth voting for, so why bother. There are a lot of reasons why people are on the fence. They want to choose the lesser of two evils. Show them why Trump is the greater of two evils. Give them a book.

Trump Donors

The Supreme Court said money is speech. And heavy donations to the Trump campaign is public speech that endorses the positions and policies of the administration. Not just some. But all. If you are giving your hard earned money, that says I agree with you. Our education perk will let you buy a book for you, and if you want, we will send a copy to a Trump donor on your behalf along with a personal note from you. If you want to troll The Donald himself, we will send him one for you.

Risks & Challenges

We are launching this campaign in time for June 14th, Trump’s birthday. We plan to share this with him. The campaign will run for 60 days. That gives us a 30 day window to print and distribute all of the books ordered so that people will have them a solid month and half before the election. We are hoping that this book will make some people angry enough that they actually go out and vote. 

We know it is hard to believe that there are people who are not paying attention. In the last election only about 25% of all eligible voters voted for Trump. That means that  a lot of people just didn’t show up. The country can not afford that to happen again. We need to do anything and everything we can to get people to register and vote. Hopefully this book can inspire some people to register and vote.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute but want to help. There are some things you can do that would be amazing. 

  1. Make sure you are registered to vote. And VOTE.
  2. Spread the word about this book. Share the link with friends. Share our videos.
  3. Make sure your voter registration is current and you haven’t been purged from the roles. And VOTE. 
  4. Help at least 3 people register to vote. Make sure they vote. And share this book as a reason why they should vote to make Trump an ExPresident on November 3rd.

story:
From the dark recesses of the jungle comes the adventures of SHANNA, THE FIREHAIR! Lost as a child she is raised by a jungle tribe to become one of their fiercest warrior! But will she be a match when an alien invader arrives at her jungle home bringing destruction...and DEATH!

Exclusive cover by X-Men artist KELSEY SHANNON!

I have partnered with my good bud, STEVE ROSS, to bring you SHANNA the FIREHAIR ! It is my latest new creation worthy of standing among my other works such as NINJA HIGH SCHOOL, MARVEL MANGAVERSE and WARRIOR NUN AREALA! Be sure to get in on the ground floor of this fantastic adventure character that pays tribute to the classic stories of the past!

Presented in FULL COLOR, this 48 page graphic novel is will be offered in both a soft and hardcover version with plenty of different reward levels! There is one that will fit your need!

SO DON'T HESITATE! Be sure that back this project!

story:
What is Slava?  

Slava is a vast, beautiful forgotten world of old gods, heroes, pagan practises, magic and supernatural forces. Fantastical creatures fighting their battles in the clouds or ghosts weaving fate of newborns are just a tip of an iceberg.

 

Book 1 -  Between Words

The story starts with the group of druids who are traveling to the holy mountain - Sleza. On top of it they perform a sacred ritual which is meant to lock away evil forces and protect the world for some time. 966 years later, Naja, a young hybrid of a water nymph and a human steals a chest offered to the gods. The chest contents - three runic stones - are the very same runes which were used by druids in the ritual. She doesn't know what they are yet...

Slava is an action adventure story set in a pagan fantasy world.

First book is an adventure of Naja and Bromir, who are on a quest to protect and retrieve mysterious runic stones. They will encounter drowners, demons, strigois, nightwraiths and much more. They will have to fight to death and find the way out from dengerous situations. We will also meet Harrah, a one eyed fiend, who was strong enough to fight the Sun God and now is trying to bring his army to revange after his defeat.

Slava will be a great read for fans of mythology, paganism, viking or tribal stories, and also people who like:
the Witcher, Game of Thrones, Vikings, Warhammer, AD&D, Saga, Assasins Creed, Hobbit, Seven to Eternity, Indiana Jones or Avatar.


We want to treat the first book as an assessment. If you like it, we will be create more.
Book 1 is planned to be 80+ colored pages.

Art samples and sketches:



 

Who are we?

Kasia Zaleskiewicz - writer/designer.

Designer at work, Slavic da Vinci after. Spent hours with Herbert, Verne, Lem, gazed at the art of Dali, Malevich, Giger... She believes she has a lot in common with Han Solo from Star Wars or Geralt from the Witcher. For few years she's researching Slavic mythology, looking at its legends, beliefs, rituals, places and many more. Now she’s trying to be like Lovecraft at storytelling and Jodorowsky at ideas! Currently she became a mom of a 5 month girl. She's also a proud owner of one fat cat.


Patryk Brzezinski - writer/artist.

Manufactured in 85, raised on Dune, Tolkien , Blade Runner, AD&D just to name a few.
In art/design for nearly a decade. Worked in the games industry, created illustrations, user interfaces and all sorts of graphic work... Fan of mead and nature. Since 5 months a proud dad.

 

 

Perks

Digital Saver - £10 GBP ~ $12 USD
A digital copy of 'SLAVA Between Words'.

Essential - £20 GBP ~ $25 USD
A physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide. You're awesome! thanks for making it happen.

Make it 2 - £35 GBP ~ $45 USD
One physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide, one for you, one for someone of your choice.

Essential + Sketchbook - £43 GBP ~ $55 USD
A physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + sketchbook.

Pin it - £35 GBP ~ $45 USD
A physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + a set of pinups.

Treasure Box- £45 GBP ~ $58 USD
One physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + fold in poster +  set of stickers.

Art chest - £250 GBP ~ $320 USD
One physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide +  hand drawn page or illustration B&W ideal for framing.



 

Special thanks

In this paragraph, we wanted to thank you all, backers non backers, audience in general!
Creator wouldn't mean much, if he did not have people to share with. We won't lie, we're doing it for ourselves, because we like these things and to quote the great one:

“I always figure I’m not unique, and something that would please me hopefully would please a lot of other people that have the same tastes that I do.” – Stan Lee

We would also like to thank Laboraturium Piesni, who were so kind to let us use their awesome music in our teaser. If you would like to learn more about them visit this link.

http://laboratoriumpiesni.pl/en/

 

 

Polish version

Czym jest Slava?  

Slava to rozległy, piękny zapomniany świat starych bogów, bohaterów, pogańskich praktyk, magii i sił nadprzyrodzonych. Fantastyczne stworzenia toczące bitwy w chmurach czy też duchy splatające los noworodków to tylko wierzchołek góry lodowej.

 

Tom 1 -  Między Słowami

Historia zaczyna się od grupy druidów, którzy podróżują do świętej góry - Slezy. Na szczycie odprawiają święty rytuał, który ma na celu zablokowanie sił zła i ochronę świata, na jakiś czas. 966 lat później Naja, młoda hybryda rusałki i człowieka, kradnie skrzynię ofiarowaną bogom. Zawartość skrzyni - trzy kamienie runiczne - to te same runy, których użyli druidzi w swoim rytuale. Naja nie wie jeszcze, czym one są ...

Slava to historia przygodowa, osadzona w pogańskim świecie fantasy.

Pierwsza książka to przygoda Naji i Bromira, których celem jest odzyskanie i ochrona tajemniczych kamieni runicznych. Na swojej drodze spotkają utopców, demony, strzygi, upiory nocne i wiele więcej. Będą musieli walczyć na śmierć i życie i znajdywać wyjście z trudnych sytuacji. Spotkamy także Harraha, jednookiego biesa, który niegdyś był wystarczająco silny, aby walczyć z Bogiem Słońca, a teraz próbuje odbudować swoją armię i szuka rewanżu po swojej porażce.

Slava będzie świetną lekturą dla fanów mitologii, pogaństwa, opowieści plemiennych czy o wikingach, a także dla osób, które lubią: Wiedźmina, Grę o Tron, Wikingów, Warhammera, AD&D, Sagę, Assasins Creed, Hobbita, Seven to Eternity, Indiana Jones'a lub Avatar.

Chcemy potraktować pierwszą książkę jako ocenę ogólnego zainteresowania. Jeśli się spodoba, będziemy tworzyć więcej.
Książka 1 ma mieć ponad 80 stron w kolorze.

 

Kim jesteśmy?

Kasia Zaleskiewicz - autor/projektant.

Projektant w pracy, słowiański da Vinci po. Spędziła godziny z Herbertem, Vernem, Lemem, wgapiała się w sztukę Dali'ego, Malewicza, Gigera ... Wierzy, że ma wiele wspólnego z Hanem Solo z Gwiezdnych Wojen i Geraltem z Wiedźmina. Przez kilka ostatnich lat bada słowiańską mitologię szukając legend, wierzeń, rytuałów, miejsc i wielu innych. Teraz stara się być jak Lovecraft w opowiadaniu historii i Jodorowski w pomysłowości! Obecnie została mamą 5-miesięcznej dziewczynki. Jest także dumnym właścicielem jednego grubego kota.


Patryk Brzezinski - autor/ilustrator.

Wyprodukowany w 85 roku, wychowany na Diunie, Tolkienie, Blade Runner, AD&D....
Trudni się sztuka, projektowaniem od prawie dekady. Pracował w branży gier, tworzył ilustracje, interfejsy i wszelkiego rodzaju prace graficzne ... Miłośnik miodu pitnego i natury. Od 5 miesięcy dumny tata.

Nagrody

Chcielibyśmy wydrukować Slave również w języku polskim, to jednak jest zależne od ilości chętnych. Jeśli nie osiągniemy minimum do druku cyfrowego, pozostawimy wam wybór wersji angielskiej lub zwrot pieniędzy. Jeśli jesteście zainteresowani wersja w języku polskim prosimy o wysłanie maila po wyborze na nagrody. Obiecujemy, że będziemy informować a aktualnej liczbie zainteresowanych.

Digital Saver - £10 GBP ~ $12 USD
Wersja cyfrowa pdf  'SLAVA Między Słowami'.

Essential - £20 GBP ~ $25 USD
Wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat. Jesteś Wielki! Dzięki że pomagasz w tworzeniu tego projektu.

Make it 2 - £35 GBP ~ $45 USD
Jedna wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', (wysyłka na cały świat) dla ciebie. Druga na podarunek.

Essential + Szkicownik - £43 GBP ~ $55 USD
Wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + szkicownik.

Pin it - £35 GBP ~ $45 USD
Wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + zestaw przypinek.

Treasure Box- £45 GBP ~ $58 USD
Wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + plakat + zestaw wlepek.

Art chest - £250 GBP ~ $320 USD
Wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat +  ręcznie rysowana strona lub ilustracja z komiksu w czerni i bieli.


Mamy więcej pomysłów na nagrody, które niewykluczone pojawia się się później. Wszystko zależy od tego, jak przebiegnie ta kampania. Jeśli posiadasz jakieś sugestie co do nagród proszę dodaj je w sekcji komentarzy.

 

Specjalne podziękowania

W tym akapicie chcieliśmy wam wszystkim podziękować, wspierającym, nie wspierającym, publiczności w ogóle! Twórca niewiele by znaczył, gdyby nie miał ludzi, z którymi mógłby się dzielić. Nie będziemy kłamać, robimy to dla siebie, ponieważ lubimy te klimaty.
Cytując wielkiego:

„Zawsze uważam, że nie jestem wyjątkowy i mam nadzieję, że coś co zadowala mnie zadowoliłby wielu innych ludzi o podobnych gustach” - Stan Lee

Chcielibyśmy również podziękować Laboratorium Pieśni, które były tak mile, że pozwoliły nam wykorzystać swoją niesamowitą muzykę w naszym zwiastunie. Jeśli chcesz dowiedzieć się więcej o Laboratorium Pieśni, odwiedź ten link.

http://laboratoriumpiesni.pl/

Currently she became a mom of a 5 month girl. She's also a proud owner of one fat cat.
Patryk Brzezinski - writer/artist.
Manufactured in 85, raised on Dune, Tolkien , Blade Runner, AD&D just to name a few.In art/design for nearly a decade. Worked in the games industry, created illustrations, user interfaces and all sorts of graphic work... Fan of mead and nature. Since 5 months a proud dad.
 
 

Perks


Digital Saver - £10 GBP ~ $12 USDA digital copy of 'SLAVA Between Words'.



Essential - £20 GBP ~ $25 USDA physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide. You're awesome! thanks for making it happen.



Make it 2 - £35 GBP ~ $45 USDOne physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide, one for you, one for someone of your choice.



Essential + Sketchbook - £43 GBP ~ $55 USDA physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + sketchbook.



Pin it - £35 GBP ~ $45 USDA physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + a set of pinups.



Treasure Box- £45 GBP ~ $58 USDOne physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide + fold in poster +  set of stickers.



Art chest - £250 GBP ~ $320 USDOne physical copy of 'SLAVA Between Words', shipped worldwide +  hand drawn page or illustration B&W ideal for framing.

 

Special thanks
In this paragraph, we wanted to thank you all, backers non backers, audience in general!Creator wouldn't mean much, if he did not have people to share with. We won't lie, we're doing it for ourselves, because we like these things and to quote the great one:
“I always figure I’m not unique, and something that would please me hopefully would please a lot of other people that have the same tastes that I do.” – Stan Lee
We would also like to thank Laboraturium Piesni, who were so kind to let us use their awesome music in our teaser. If you would like to learn more about them visit this link.
http://laboratoriumpiesni.pl/en/
 
 
Polish version

Czym jest Slava?  
Slava to rozległy, piękny zapomniany świat starych bogów, bohaterów, pogańskich praktyk, magii i sił nadprzyrodzonych. Fantastyczne stworzenia toczące bitwy w chmurach czy też duchy splatające los noworodków to tylko wierzchołek góry lodowej.
 

Tom 1 -  Między Słowami
Historia zaczyna się od grupy druidów, którzy podróżują do świętej góry - Slezy. Na szczycie odprawiają święty rytuał, który ma na celu zablokowanie sił zła i ochronę świata, na jakiś czas. 966 lat później Naja, młoda hybryda rusałki i człowieka, kradnie skrzynię ofiarowaną bogom. Zawartość skrzyni - trzy kamienie runiczne - to te same runy, których użyli druidzi w swoim rytuale. Naja nie wie jeszcze, czym one są ...

Slava to historia przygodowa, osadzona w pogańskim świecie fantasy.
Pierwsza książka to przygoda Naji i Bromira, których celem jest odzyskanie i ochrona tajemniczych kamieni runicznych. Na swojej drodze spotkają utopców, demony, strzygi, upiory nocne i wiele więcej. Będą musieli walczyć na śmierć i życie i znajdywać wyjście z trudnych sytuacji. Spotkamy także Harraha, jednookiego biesa, który niegdyś był wystarczająco silny, aby walczyć z Bogiem Słońca, a teraz próbuje odbudować swoją armię i szuka rewanżu po swojej porażce.
Slava będzie świetną lekturą dla fanów mitologii, pogaństwa, opowieści plemiennych czy o wikingach, a także dla osób, które lubią: Wiedźmina, Grę o Tron, Wikingów, Warhammera, AD&D, Sagę, Assasins Creed, Hobbita, Seven to Eternity, Indiana Jones'a lub Avatar.
Chcemy potraktować pierwszą książkę jako ocenę ogólnego zainteresowania. Jeśli się spodoba, będziemy tworzyć więcej.Książka 1 ma mieć ponad 80 stron w kolorze.
 


Kim jesteśmy?
Kasia Zaleskiewicz - autor/projektant.
Projektant w pracy, słowiański da Vinci po. Spędziła godziny z Herbertem, Vernem, Lemem, wgapiała się w sztukę Dali'ego, Malewicza, Gigera ... Wierzy, że ma wiele wspólnego z Hanem Solo z Gwiezdnych Wojen i Geraltem z Wiedźmina. Przez kilka ostatnich lat bada słowiańską mitologię szukając legend, wierzeń, rytuałów, miejsc i wielu innych. Teraz stara się być jak Lovecraft w opowiadaniu historii i Jodorowski w pomysłowości! Obecnie została mamą 5-miesięcznej dziewczynki. Jest także dumnym właścicielem jednego grubego kota.
Patryk Brzezinski - autor/ilustrator.
Wyprodukowany w 85 roku, wychowany na Diunie, Tolkienie, Blade Runner, AD&D....Trudni się sztuka, projektowaniem od prawie dekady. Pracował w branży gier, tworzył ilustracje, interfejsy i wszelkiego rodzaju prace graficzne ... Miłośnik miodu pitnego i natury. Od 5 miesięcy dumny tata.


Nagrody
Chcielibyśmy wydrukować Slave również w języku polskim, to jednak jest zależne od ilości chętnych. Jeśli nie osiągniemy minimum do druku cyfrowego, pozostawimy wam wybór wersji angielskiej lub zwrot pieniędzy. Jeśli jesteście zainteresowani wersja w języku polskim prosimy o wysłanie maila po wyborze na nagrody. Obiecujemy, że będziemy informować a aktualnej liczbie zainteresowanych.


Digital Saver - £10 GBP ~ $12 USDWersja cyfrowa pdf  'SLAVA Między Słowami'.



Essential - £20 GBP ~ $25 USDWydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat. Jesteś Wielki! Dzięki że pomagasz w tworzeniu tego projektu.



Make it 2 - £35 GBP ~ $45 USDJedna wydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', (wysyłka na cały świat) dla ciebie. Druga na podarunek.



Essential + Szkicownik - £43 GBP ~ $55 USDWydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + szkicownik.



Pin it - £35 GBP ~ $45 USDWydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + zestaw przypinek.



Treasure Box- £45 GBP ~ $58 USDWydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat + plakat + zestaw wlepek.



Art chest - £250 GBP ~ $320 USDWydrukowana kopia 'SLAVA Między Słowami', wysyłka na cały świat +  ręcznie rysowana strona lub ilustracja z komiksu w czerni i bieli.

Mamy więcej pomysłów na nagrody, które niewykluczone pojawia się się później. Wszystko zależy od tego, jak przebiegnie ta kampania. Jeśli posiadasz jakieś sugestie co do nagród proszę dodaj je w sekcji komentarzy.
 

Specjalne podziękowania
W tym akapicie chcieliśmy wam wszystkim podziękować, wspierającym, nie wspierającym, publiczności w ogóle! Twórca niewiele by znaczył, gdyby nie miał ludzi, z którymi mógłby się dzielić. Nie będziemy kłamać, robimy to dla siebie, ponieważ lubimy te klimaty.Cytując wielkiego:„Zawsze uważam, że nie jestem wyjątkowy i mam nadzieję, że coś co zadowala mnie zadowoliłby wielu innych ludzi o podobnych gustach” - Stan LeeChcielibyśmy również podziękować Laboratorium Pieśni, które były tak mile, że pozwoliły nam wykorzystać swoją niesamowitą muzykę w naszym zwiastunie. Jeśli chcesz dowiedzieć się więcej o Laboratorium Pieśni, odwiedź ten link.
http://laboratoriumpiesni.pl/

story:
Short Summary

Lynx is an EPIC action adventure series from Awakened Entertainment.

  • My name is Elkin Ordenana, and I am a coder by trade, comic fan at heart.
  • This campaign is to bring some change to the comic industry.  For many years the major comic companies (Marvel, DC, Darkhorse, Image) have dominated story-telling, heroes, and role models for all of us.  I would like to contribute new stories, heroes, and diversity to the industry.
  • The contributions to be collected in this campaign will allow me to focus on the story-telling for Lynx while simultaneously building up the ability to branch out unique content currently in development such as "The Fair One", and "TimeX2".

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I am looking for $5,000 funding for the completion of Lynx issues 5-8.
  • I am offering digital and printed versions of the comic, as well as some special metal artwork for top tier contributors.
  • The funds will be solely attributed to the comic, if the campaign doesn't reach the goal, I will use whatever funds gathered to work on the series.

The Impact

  • This project is the first in the beginning of Awakened Entertainment, I have 3 major titles to be released by early next year.
  • Awakened Entertainment will bring a fresh and diverse look at comics that is much needed.
  • I have already completed Lynx 1-3 and have built a good following for the book.  4 is almost complete and on schedule to complete by July.

Risks & Challenges

  • Sometimes artists have issues completing work due to family or other obstacles.
  • I have addressed this with great experience as I worked on issues 1-3, and now have a great relationship with many artists, editors, letterers, colorers, and more.

Other Ways You Can Help if not contributing

  • Share on social media!
  • Purchase the comic (whoarethelynx.com)!
  • Tell a friend.

Thank you for your time and attention!

Short Summary
Lynx is an EPIC action adventure series from Awakened Entertainment.

My name is Elkin Ordenana, and I am a coder by trade, comic fan at heart.
This campaign is to bring some change to the comic industry.  For many years the major comic companies (Marvel, DC, Darkhorse, Image) have dominated story-telling, heroes, and role models for all of us.  I would like to contribute new stories, heroes, and diversity to the industry.
The contributions to be collected in this campaign will allow me to focus on the story-telling for Lynx while simultaneously building up the ability to branch out unique content currently in development such as "The Fair One", and "TimeX2".


What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

I am looking for $5,000 funding for the completion of Lynx issues 5-8.
I am offering digital and printed versions of the comic, as well as some special metal artwork for top tier contributors.
The funds will be solely attributed to the comic, if the campaign doesn't reach the goal, I will use whatever funds gathered to work on the series.


The Impact

This project is the first in the beginning of Awakened Entertainment, I have 3 major titles to be released by early next year.
Awakened Entertainment will bring a fresh and diverse look at comics that is much needed.
I have already completed Lynx 1-3 and have built a good following for the book.  4 is almost complete and on schedule to complete by July.


Risks & Challenges

Sometimes artists have issues completing work due to family or other obstacles.
I have addressed this with great experience as I worked on issues 1-3, and now have a great relationship with many artists, editors, letterers, colorers, and more.


Other Ways You Can Help if not contributing

Share on social media!
Purchase the comic (whoarethelynx.com)!
Tell a friend.

Thank you for your time and attention!

story:
The next chapter from Limitless Comics is a high-action book that takes us to the streets (and back to the sewers) of Boston! This story is the comic book, SOLO88 Issue #1.

The Story

 

88 is a character that Anthony Moore created in 1993, and like with The MuffenMan #1, the right team has finally been assembled to bring this story to life. This comic is about a merc who doesn't play by the numbers!

Picking up where The Muffenman #1 left off, SOLO88 #1 is picking up the story of the gun-toting, chain-smoking hitman of Limitless Comics. He has travelled around the world, but a tragic loss brought him back to Boston, MA. The only chance 88 has to rectify this tragedy, is by agreeing to work a job for the sinister crime-boss, Mr. Rushmore. His target? The MuffenMan!

 

 

Limitless Comics and 88

 

The gritty, action story of 88 is the next to join the Limitless line-up. If this is your first exposure to Limitless Comics, welcome! We are an independent comic book publisher, run by Anthony Moore and Gerald J. Jones. We have previously published 8 issues of 3 different series, ranging from the fantasy epic Realmz, to the horror sensation, The Muffenman, and our most recent sci-fi extravaganza, Driver.Eight.

The next title we are launching is 88! This mature, action-packed series will continue the story of the Boston-based characters from the Muffenman series. This story also introduces new characters, tells the next chapter of our story, and expands our universe. It doesn't get more Limitless than that!

 

 

 

Below, you can see the first 5 beautifully detailed black and white pages, right here and right now, drawn by the very talented Jo Galicia! The stunning levels of intricate detail caused us to decide against using color, and instead to publish the beautiful inks as is. 

Page 1 of Solo88 Issue #1

Page 2 of Solo88 Issue #1

 

Page 3 of Solo88 Issue #1

 

Page 4 of Solo88 Issue #1

Page 5 of Solo88 Issue #1

 

The Artwork

88 has his mission. He must hunt the MuffenMan. As can be seen above, this creature has taken a special fondness to Lil' Miss Patty Cakes. How low (both figuratively and literally) will 88 have to go to hunt this creature? We can't wait for you to find out!

 

SOLO88 is important for another reason, too. Not only is it the first meeting of 88 and MuffenMan, and the first appearance of Millipede, but it is also the first time Thirst, the Queen of the Dead, will fully appear.

 

Meet the Queen of the Dead, Thirst!

 

 

88 is a story that cannot be contained by one cover. These variant covers are the prized collection of many a collector. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The book is completely finished and all artists have already been paid. Covid-19 and the current climate might present a delay, but we will be completely transparent and open about any issues that arise. Limitless Comic has an excellent history of fulfilling campaigns, so you can pledge with confidence!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Remember, adventure is Limitless!

story:
This is the first episode of Mona Midnight. It's a story of Smokey clubs, moonshine, good music. passion, violence and naked ambition, all set in 1920's America. The music and ambition are provided by Mona, a beautiful young girl with an amazing voice, who is desperately looking for a break! 

Mona' s  father Daddy G sets everything in motion when he calls in a favour while selling his moonshine to one of his regular customers the owner of the local roadhouse. Daddy's customers come from far and wide, and he's built up quite a reputation, especially with the local mob! 

One thing leads to another and soon Mona gets her chance in the Blue Parrot club in Chicago, a long way from her home which is a small town outside of  New Orleans. Mona tells her parents, who are excited for her and worried at the same time. But a chance to see her name in lights is all that Mona wants.

The big city lights call Mona.

Mona Arrives in Chicago.

Maloney the owner of the Blue Parrot club gets the press to meet Mona off the train. After all, the publicity will help the club! 

Meanwhile......

The Scrivo "family"  are looking to expand their "business" and the Blue Parrot seems like an ideal opportunity, It's profitable, it's upmarket but more importantly, it's uptown!  

Some gentle persuasion form Eddie, Mr. Scrivo's right-hand man has the desired effect and Maloney hands over the deeds to the club.

Eddie arranges for the boss to see his new property.

The Blue Parrot Club.

 

The doorman knows nothing and is not impressed!

"This is Mr. Scrivo, he's your new boss show him some respect!"

 

                                 

 

Mr. Scrivo is impressed with his new club, it's busy and more importantly, it's making money.

 

 

Later on, Maloney recovers from Eddie's visit and calls in a favour! 

Mr. Scrivo remembers his promise to his wife and calls in at the bakery for a large chocolate cake,

something that he will never enjoy!

Eddie and Vern Mr. Scrivo's driver rush to his aid.

Is the boss dead? Is this the first shot in a turf war? Will Mona become a star?

 

 

 

What Indiegogo is going to Fund

Mona is a 36-page comic. Much of the artwork is already finished and the campaign money will enable me to finish off all the artwork, and some of the publishing costs. I also hope to start on Mona two very soon. 

 

Your impact

I guess it's lighting the blue touch paper, standing back and waiting to see what happens! Mona and the people she meets have so many stories to tell and I would like you to help me introduce them to the world.

 

Stretch goals

If we get £10,000+ I will create another 8 pages for the comic.

 

The bottom Line

I need £4,000 to finish all the artwork and perks and postage. 

If you are not in a position to help financially or are unable to please can you tell your friends about Mona's story and ask them to tell everyone they know, it's worth a try!  Mona's story deserves to be told please help me to tell it. Thanks, Paul.

If you have any questions about  Mona Midnight, please contact me @ blacktulipcomics@gmail.com

story:
MostlySAFE New Releases - now available on IndieGoGo!

Out Newest Release!
MostlySAFE presents: #FREEKEKISTAN! MostlySAFE Comic Volume 2!
Continue along in Season 3 with the adventures of the MostlySAFE Crew as they delve deeper into the underworld Kingdom of Kekistan, as Conspiracy Theories continue to unfold, and eldritch gods rouse from slumber.

Learn more about the culture of Kekistan!
Watch the Gypsies defend their Home from Hordes of Kekistan!
Continue to learn about Jabberwocks!
Bonus Comics!
And Moar!
112 Pages!
Croptober Inktober Special!
PLUS OMFG MOAR!

And don't forget to grab MostlySAFE Volume 1: The Not-So-Secret Space Bucket Society! We are offering this as a Bundle here on IndieGoGo!
Enjoy Season 1 and 2 as the MostlySAFE Crew venture forth in a world where Conspiracy Theories are real, eldritch gods of old lay sleeping, and the Cannabis is DANK!

76 Pages!
BONUS COMICS!
AND MOAR!

And while you are at it, pick up Mustache Ride Customs: The FANDOM MENACE - Side Quests! Every Mustache Ride Ashcan Comic collected into one Comic Book!
38 Pages of Sci-Fi Humor and Adventure!

Starring Kandu Krow and Ganja Squatch - Merc4Hire!
LORD FANTASTIC - with Harlythagn and Murderbot 9000!
The DIY Guy!
R1-74 and Daniel S. Pizza!
And MORE!

Start the fun with 5 stories set within the Mustache Ride Multiverse. Enjoy Issue Number One with 38 pages of Science-Fiction action and adventure!

MostlySAFE has published numerous How-To-Guides, Graphic Novels, and Video Series - and is bringing the FUN to IndieGoGo! There is no delay in completion Campaigns as all Art is completed and printing proofed before Launch.
Once Campaign completes: Orders print and MostlySAFE begins fulfilling!
This is the Way!

Written by CJ Cummings and Tammy Brant
Art and Lettering by CJ Cummings

CJ Cummings is Author, Artist, and Artistan of MostlySAFE. He and Tam journey around the Pacific Northwest in their Caravan making Toys and Comics along the way.
Tammy Brant is the best part of MostlySAFE and an Artist, Writer, and Photographer. She keeps CJ out of trouble. Mostly.


Share the MostlySAFE Campaign on Social Media! Use the handy Tools provided by IndieGoGo below. And don't forget to keep up to date with their adventures at www.mostlysafe8.com!

Start the fun with 5 stories set within the Mustache Ride Multiverse. Enjoy Issue Number One with 38 pages of Science-Fiction action and adventure!
MostlySAFE has published numerous How-To-Guides, Graphic Novels, and Video Series - and is bringing the FUN to IndieGoGo! There is no delay in completion Campaigns as all Art is completed and printing proofed before Launch.Once Campaign completes: Orders print and MostlySAFE begins fulfilling!This is the Way!
Written by CJ Cummings and Tammy BrantArt and Lettering by CJ Cummings
CJ Cummings is Author, Artist, and Artistan of MostlySAFE. He and Tam journey around the Pacific Northwest in their Caravan making Toys and Comics along the way.Tammy Brant is the best part of MostlySAFE and an Artist, Writer, and Photographer. She keeps CJ out of trouble. Mostly.
Share the MostlySAFE Campaign on Social Media! Use the handy Tools provided by IndieGoGo below. And don't forget to keep up to date with their adventures at www.mostlysafe8.com!

story:
The Story So Far...

In the fall of 2019, four friends created a cosplay group comprised of original characters from or inspired by the book series Tales of the Decoverse by John Pyka. They became The League of Impossibilists; time traveling paranormal heroes defending the space time continuum from supernatural threats!

Doug Oller joined the team and proposed creating a comic series. The comic series has been published incrementally as a web comic but now it is time to take it to the next level!

What We Need & What You Get

To finish the comic for proper publication we need $2,000. That money will go to:

  • Hiring a professional letterer to re-do the word balloons and captions to bring the book in line with publishing standards.
  • We will hire a professional digital colorist to bring the art to life in full color! 
  • All contributors will get 2 copies of the finished book - one in print and one in digital! 
  • Even if we don't reach our full goal, we will still use money raised towards this goal of finishing the work. 

This comic will be part of the Tales of the Decoverse series. It will become Volume 5!

  • Doug Oller fulfills a life long dream of becoming a published comicbook artist!
  • John Pyka rekindles a passion put on the shelf over 25 years ago!
  • And this comic becomes the first time a Middle TN based Cosplay Group are adapted in comic form!

Risks & Challenges

Are there risks? Sure. The risk is that we don't meet our goal and have to settle for less than the moon. HOWEVER, the publishing deal is already signed with Seventh Star Press and Volumes 1 - 4 will already completed. 

We've got publisher support for the finished product, and it will be produced. But with your help, we can get there faster

Other Ways You Can Help

We get it. Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • You can also contribute a small monthly amount via Patreon.com/impossibilists to see the progress so far and read the chapters as they are completed every week!
  • Help us promote! Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Indiegogo makes sharing easy! Just use the handy share tools to share with your friends on social media and everywhere you can!

Thanks for the support, and we'll catch ya on the flip-side!
